title: An abode of royalty....
desc: Great hotel.. loved it.. welcoming staff and very courteous.... Near to the national Gallery. Food was really delicious. Great view from my room .. rooms were clean. I really enjoyed my stay in this hotel.. A very good option for mid price range ...

title: Superb Stay!
desc: The hotel room offers a very good city view and is strategically located within 5 minutes drive to the city center,5 minutes driving distance to City hall area and 10 minutes to the shopping district area in Orchard Road. The hotel breakfast here offered is definitely one of the best I have ever eaten during my stay here.The nasi lemak and condiments,side dishes are awesome,there is also indian roti Prata available!So spoilt for choices! Will recommend this hotel to couple or families looking for a good hotel that takes care of your vacation needs during your stay.

title: 1st class accommodation “Grand”
desc: I stay here for my 1st trip to Singapore and have to say from the front desk and all the staff were so obliging. We were upgraded to a suite when we checked in for a minimal cost, which gave us access to the executive lounge on the 31st floor. Make sure you do this, breakfasts were amazing, evening drinks sandwiches for lunch all inclusive. Suite had extra large bedroom & lounge area, infact all the facilities were excellent. This place is if I had to use 1word “Grand”

title: Weekend stay
desc: The room was clean and spacious. Partner and I stayed there for our getaway over the weekend. Close to exclusive malls like Millenia Walk with all the amenities there. Hotel is situation in a very ideal location with walking distance to all the malls like Millenia Walk and Marina Square.

title: Great hotel
desc: Spent 2 nights here pre-cruise. Excellent service and one of the best breakfast buffets I've had. The rooms are large and well appointed and have good views of the city. Staff always attentive and helpful.

title: Superb
desc: It was an upscale hotel and very good accomodation. Very nice room and was new and modern. Very polite staff at all times at various hours of the day. Options to eat onsite and very clean. Definitly would recommend othere to stay here

title: Doesn't really stand out - but good, solid hotel and great value.
desc: A couple of stays in January. Front counter management is a bit off - there was always a wait-time during check-in/out, not due to crowd, but just not having the right number of people out there. There was also a few misunderstandings by their staff the complimentary benefits (e.g. pressing - housekeeping was trying to charge me but was corrected by Hhonors lounge manager). But....once you get hold of them, all the staff members sincerely were eager to please and all provided a high level of authentic and warm service. By Singapore's standard, the hotel is a bit dated. I think they realized it, and are renovating accordingly. Rooms are reasonable in size - luxurious enough, without being pretentious. The location is fantastic - very convenient, walkable to major shopping

title: Five Star Plus for the Service & Room
desc: I am totally satisfied with my stay in Conrad. Their staff are attentive, efficient, and quite friendly. There was no long queue for the check-in and check-out. Even though the room furniture is a bit outdated, but everything remains in excellent condition. I love the bathroom because they separate the bathtub and shower. They provide a range of toiletries brands and also have the pillow menu. Then, I love their nice gesture for my birthday. I stayed here during my birthday and when I went back to my room, I found a plate of fresh strawberries with chocolate fondues, a box of chocolates, and also a handwritten birthday card. Thank you so much!

title: My Usual choice
desc: There are a lot of good hotels in Singapore, but i have never had a bad experience here. Rooms are good standard, good gym and pool. Good price also. We generally meet colleagues at Clarke Quay, and although it is a distance away the half hour walk is quite enjoyable. All in all very good hotel.

title: Luxury and service combined
desc: There was no waiting for a room to be ready even though we were earlier than the check in time. Our room was spacious, with a view. The staff were courteous and efficient. The breakfast was as sumptuous with a wide range of offerings. The location is very central with many eating places nearby, and an underground station quite close. The pool and it’s surrounds are welcoming after a day of shopping and being a tourist.

title: The best urban resort
desc: We stayed at this hotel for 3 days. We wake up in the morning, we exercise a little at the gym, eat breakfast, a little desk work, and go out. In the evening return to the hotel, take a shower, swim in the pool, and have dinner. We can act on the same schedule as we are at home. The pool has a nice view and very good! We were able to enjoy a special urban resort at this hotel. 我們在這家酒店住了3天。 游泳池享有美景。 設備到位。 這是一個美妙的城市度假酒店。 私たちはこのホテルに3日泊まった。プールが見晴らしがいい。アーバンリゾートとしての設備が整っているので、デスクワークや運動なども、自宅にいるのと同じようにこなすことができる。

title: Luxe with comfortability
desc: Be it for leisure staycation or for a business purpose, Conrad Centennial indeed provides the comfortability and welcoming atmosphere for everyone. With full & wholesome amenities catered for your needs, my staycation for some mother & daughter time with my beloved mum was truly great and relaxing. Do go for the in-room breakfast which you can have over-looking the magnificent view of Singapore’s city-scape!

title: Family 4 night stay
desc: Arrived from a long flight from Manchester early morning, after a few issues on check-in regarding Hilton honours amenities (minor concern) Our rooms were ready for us and we got changed and headed for the pool, which is small but got sunbeds no problem, ordered some bar food which was good quality. Room: clean and big enough Restaurant: Breakfast was excellent, good variety Overall good hotel a couple of small bars and restaurants close by, just across the road is a big mall (cant remember the name??) you can walk through to the esplanade metro station, which you can use to get to sentosa island. Would return again.

title: Great Hotel
desc: Stayed here for 3 nights with my boyfriend who is a Diamond Member. Therefore we had an upgraded room- beautiful view, lots of lovely modern features such as the button to open and close the blinds without leaving the room, and the huge luxurious bathroom. I think they are refurbishing the pool area/executive lounge this month so this review might not apply. The executive lounge on the pool floor was well stocked. My only complaint, and this may not bother anyone else, was that it was very cold with the air con and I personally would have preferred a seating area outside where we could enjoy the refreshments (much like the Hilton Hotel in Bangkok for example) The pool area was large, although in April it did not get sun until after 11am, but once it arrived there was enough

title: family trip
desc: I have a HHonors tier and I have been to Conrad for a family trip. I booked an executive room to use the lounge, but the lounge was poorer than I expected. But it was good that children could use it together. We were able to enjoy light drinks and snacks with children. At regular Hilton hotels, they provided welcome amenity with a gold tier. However, there was nothing in this stay I guess check-in time was late. Instead, pretty Conrad bear and duck could be received. There was an outdoor swimming pool, and at night we saw Singapore Flyer shining beautifully. The temperature of the pool was a little cold, and very young children were not good at playing. There was no children's pool. I got a room with a view of the beach, but I saw a panpacific hotel and a madarin oriental hotel

title: Spacious Rooms, Great Location
desc: The Conrad in Singapore is in an amazing location, right across the road from Suntec City in Marina Bay. The standard rooms are very spacious and have a great layout. The rooms are clean, and bright. It’s a very large hotel, so when asking for towels, etc, it takes some time, but I could understand that.

title: Conrad Singapore is like 'coming home'
desc: Well located for sightseeing, shopping and dining, the Conrad is a peaceful haven in a bustling city. Each time we stay here it is like coming home and that is just something you can't easily create. With 24/7 service and very comfortable rooms with luxury finishing, this hotel is a special place. Located close to public transport, it is easy to come and go using the excellent transport system that is available in Singapore.

title: Fantastic Hospitality At Conrad Centenial
desc: Conrad Centenial Hotel offers Fantastic Hospitality in Singapore's Marina Bay. The view is fantadtic both on the daytime over Marina Bay as well as in the evening as Singpore night cones to life. Breakfast Buffet to top-quality. Close to everything Marina Bay and shopping so highly recommended.

title: Work stay
desc: A pleasant stay; work meetings efficiently run by the hotel staff in their business centre. Meals in downstairs dining room were of wide range, and beautifully presented. The biggest problem was not overdoing it.

title: Good for short staycay
desc: I stayed in Conrad from 25th May to 27th May. It was simple to make a reservation and is fuss-free. Anandh from the Front Desk was very precise in explaining on the process of booking the F&F rates from the Hilton website. Thank you for the detailed explanation! I was checked in by the Receptionist, Som, who was very caring and friendly. I was actually sick for the past month and when I was coughing, she offered to get me a bottle of water. I enjoyed myself for this staycation and will not hesitate to come back again. Only down side was the unclear explanation of the carpark coupons when I called the mainline. My friend had parked at the lots outside the hotel and we did not know that the parking lots belonged to the mall nearby and was charged $78 for our 3days staycation.

title: Sensational !
desc: Extremely well presented and luxurious. Staff were fantastic, customer service over and above. Stayed in the rooms and used the business rooms one Level 5 for the week and couldn’t fault it. Executive Lounge was great. Thoroughly enjoyed my time there with the service provided by the staff being the highlight.

title: Good Business Hotel
desc: The Hotel is a business hotel and have average service. The room service is timely but you may not get exactly what you have ordered. The Breakfast in nice but very crowded. Usually you need to wait for 10 minutes before you are seated. The Check-in/Check out time - Usually a wait, Was offered a good room with Fountain View.

title: Good service
desc: Good location and good facilities for family .Rooms are clean and good view The executive lounge same level with swimming pool ,lower ceiling make me feel uncomfortable. I think should be in higher floor it better,

title: Better than ever!
desc: I reviewed the Conrad centennial about a year ago. That time my main complaint was that after over 20 years of operation the place, especially the guest rooms, started to feel worn and torn. The crispiness was missing. This is natural and management was well aware of it, indeed the renovation was already planned at the time. Now a year later it was time to (literally!) revisit the Conrad centennial. All the things that I got to love about this place was as good as ever if not even better. The very friendly and professional service must be mentioned first. The staff is what truly sets this place apart from almost all other luxury hotels I have stayed in. Although we arrived quite early (10 am) we were given a room right away. I guess my HHonors status might have had a part in

title: Beyond Impressed
desc: The room is very spacious and clean, toilet comes with a double vanity and bathtub is bigger than that of many hotels. Fruits and amenities are consistently replenished. Staffs are friendly and approachable. Very polite as well, greeting you even in the lifts. Had to go to the reception a couple of times to extend my stay and for a late check out and I was always attended to with a very pleasant and helpful attitude. Even at check out, they would make the effort to remind if you have taken your passport and left anything behind, with a staff that even came over to help with my suitcase and taxi booking. I am thoroughly impressed by the hospitality and customer service of the staffs at Conrad. Thank you for making my stay a very enjoyable one!

title: Nice enough hotel, but they got off to a bad start
desc: I booked a centennial suite, and arrived at the hotel at 6:30am (off an overnight flight), so I wasn't expecting my room to be ready. I was then very pleasantly surprised to be told that the previous guests had already checked out and the room just needed to be cleaned. I was shown to the executive lounge and offered a coffee while I was waiting. After waiting around half an hour I asked for an update and was told it should be ready soon", so I went out for a walk for an hour and returned at 8am. Reception told me the room had been cleaned and just needed checked, so should be another 20 minutes. When i returned 20 minutes, I was then told the room would be ready at 10am, which is 3 and half hours after I had been told the room would be ready "soon". I don't mind waiting

title: Luxurious Stay
desc: Hotel is in a really good location in Marina Bay and close to all of the other luxury hotels in the area. I liked that it was close to lots of dining places and malls and within walking distance to the flyer and other places but too hot to walk. Check in was seamless and the room was great. Service was amazing, especially the amazing breakfast spread. The executive lounge was also really good and spacious and never too crowded. Only downside is that the pool is on the smaller side and not very deep, maybe 5 feet. I was granted a late checkout at 4pm which was great thanks to my status. Overall, nice experience.

title: What a wonderful place to stay!
desc: We had a wonderful experience at this hotel! The rooms were spacious and beautiful-really nice large bathrooms. The staff was incredible - they really took time to look after every need. The breakfast was delicious every day-it was a buffet with an incredible number of choices. The people at the omelet station really knew how to make the perfect omelet! The bar on the first floor was also excellent - great drinks and food. The chief concierge was a gentleman by the name of Mohamad Fasle Bin Rifaeh. He was wonderful!!! He gave us a great recommendation of a nature preserve to visit - it exceeded our expectations and was a great place to spend the day. He also spent about 45 minutes working on finding us a place for dinner that night. He found us a great place called Artemis

title: Suite Sensation
desc: Only stay for one night for transit, the hotel was chosen because it's offer better price from Orchard counterpart. Check-in is fast, I saw from the app that room was upgraded to cen suite, yeay, very nice check-in staffs, explain a bit about hotel layout, what benefit do I get, ect ect, Very modern, large and felt luxurious room I have, just face Suntec Convention. I think the room was renovated because it's not the same as my fellow dmnd share to me. very comfy sofa, sturdy bed, Shanghai Thang amenities, and of course Nespreso Coffee machine. Fruit platter was extended with a box of delicious chocolate, a teddy bear charm is a very kind gesture. The renovation of the original lounge was not done, temp lounge just beside the pool not bad at all, although felt a little

title: Amazing
desc: We stayed for 5 nights (room 708) in this amazing place. Clean bedroom , comfy bed , amazing ambience and perfect location makes this hotel a true 5 star Hotel. Friendly staffs, particularly housekeeping staff (especially Alice) , are really perfecting our perfect stay in this hotel. Keep up the good work and Thank you for the great experienced!!!

title: Luxurious
desc: Would go back in a heartbeat! Their service, and comfort was just beautiful. Singaporeans really know how to run their hotels with a touch of their Singaporean flair. We walked everywhere from here, and also took the train (3 min walk to the MTR) to Orchard Road, and China Town. Look for their special room rates.

title: Great if you are looking for luxury
desc: Spent 5 nights there in June 2018. Was looking for an upscale hotel and Conrad provided. Great rooms, good pool area, excellent service and the breakfast is super. Everything you wish for, and a little more. Location is convenient and it just takes 10 minutes on foot to get to the Bay Area (once you find your way through Millennium Walk and the shopping centers). Nothing to complain about and I can only recommend the hotel. Good value for the money.

title: Great Conrad - enjoyable top class business hotel
desc: Rooms were wonderful, as usual, though there was a mix-up with my booking and I had to wait a few hours for mine. Conference facilities and support are excellent as well, and the location itself is pretty much perfect. Food and dining are excellent, breakfast very enjoyable and quiet.

title: An excellent hotel in a great location
desc: My colleague and I stayed at the Conrad Centennial in Singapore during a recent work trip. The hotel was chosen as it is a Conrad brand which always guarantees great service and style. The Conrad is in a great location for exploring Singapore. With Suntec City mall beside the hotel and a quick 10 minute walk to the Marina, the hotel provides the best mix of proximity while not being too centralised. The room I had (1721) was really spacious with all of the expected amenities and some added novelties. The Teddy bear on entering is a nice little touch and adds a homely feel to the place. The shower was always at a great temperature and the bathroom and room were immaculate and always well looked after. All of the members of staff were very friendly, helpful and informative.

title: Excellent
desc: Great hotel in a great location and friendly staff. I will most likely return when I visit Singapore next. Best add some more words to reach the 200 word minimum or I won’t be able to submit. A lot of words.

title: Another great stay at the Conrad
desc: I stayed in this hotel 5 years ago and really enjoyed my experience. The hotel is still great and has been renovated since my last trip. The amenities are very high quality and the facility shows little signs of wear. We tried the international buffet at Oscars which contained high quality ingredients. The hotel is conveniently located in Suntec City in walking distance to Marina Square Mall and Suntec Mall as well as the Esplanade and Merlin which is on the far side exit of Marina Sqaure Mall. I am a Diamond Honors members and the only fault I can find with my stay is that they no longer upgrade Diamond members to the highest floors of the hotel and offer access to the club lounge on the top floor. We did however have access to the lounge on the 4th floor which also has very

title: Excellent stay
desc: Excellent hotel in Singapore - room, pool and Executive Lounge very clean and friendly, helpful staff. Location is close to the city centre. I definitely will be back during my next stay in Singapore.

title: Luxurious
desc: Stayed at this hotel for 3 nights whilst attending a conference. It was excellent in all departments; comfy room with a lovely bathroom. Breakfasts were varied & delicious, WIFI worked a treat, very well equipped gym for a hotel. Would definitely stay again

title: Top Notch Hotel
desc: We stayed here for 4 nights. This hotel is in suntec city ..near marina bay. Close to MBS and Garden by bay. Lobby is nondescript .We were upgraded to king centennial Suite. Suite has excellent interiors. Breakfast is amazing with nice varieties of salads, fruits, omelette station, breads and cheese.Special mention of ice creams of different flavours in breakfast. Service level is excellent and very prompt. Highly recommended.

title: Great
desc: I had a great Experience staying at Conrad. The place is excellent, it walking destination to multiple malls and streets. The service is great, they are fast, very friendly, The hotel is very clean and elegant. The hotel view is amazing.

title: Good choice
desc: Good staff service. Very accommodating. Great location. The breakfast is good. The lounge service is also wonderful. The amenities are of good quality. Good views. I am particularly happy with early arrival check in the morning. Most hotels do not allow for early check in. They do.

title: Anniversary Stay...
desc: The hotel is in a great location, within an easy walk of the MRT, the whole Marina Bay area, plenty of shopping and restaurants. Stepping inside, the Conrad is serene and refined and pretty. The staff was consistently gracious. Our room 1626 was lovely, comfortable, and thoughtfully appointed, with outlets and light switches exactly where you need them. They offered every amenity and a comfortable setup. We were also allowed to opt for breakfast in the main lobby restaurant, that was a nice experience. I'd gladly return.

title: Improved service standards, revamped hotel
desc: I am very impressed with the exemplary service displayed by the staff at Conrad Centennial Singapore. As compared to my previous stay earlier this year, I can see the great improvements in the front desk, executive lounge, The Oscar’s and Conrad Service. The management was rather flexible in the early check in and late check out extended to Hilton Honors Gold/Diamond members. Every time I stay at Conrad, I was granted at least a 4pm late check out. I was upgraded quite a few times to the Centennial Suite during my previous few stays. However, understandably on the high occupancy on public holiday, I was upgraded to the Executive Room with a Marina Bay view. The executive lounge was great but I was saddened to hear that the previous lounge at the Level 31 was changed to The

title: Very nice.
desc: Stayed here over the weekend. It’s a very grand looking hotel conveniently located to the marina square, Suntec city locations. The room is what I like most about the hotel. Very new and we have a nice room overseeing a part of the bay (mostly you see the other hotels opposite). The lounge is quite comfy, with the kitchen opening at certain timings. Otherwise there are device people attending to your needs. Service wise, it’s not perfect. The manager at the lounge she is friendly and nice. The service personnel in the lounge, she serves with a straight face. Not too bothered by that, but I would prefer just picking up my own drinks anyway instead of being served by a straight face. All in , good stay.

title: Business hotel, good location
desc: Stayed for a conference. Hotel was stylish, modern, and up to date. Staff was helpful. I would highly recommend it. This is a very good hotel, not excellent, but will not disappoint. The location was close to many things, but away from the marina.

title: Very good
desc: I was here for a company meeting hosted in the hotel. 3 night stay. The overall feel of the hotel/public spaces is very luxurious; up there with the good luxury hotels but not overly ostentatious. The room was clean and spacious. Nicely decorated if a bit bland. No stupid lighting and temperature controls that you can’t work out (the ones that are like an IQ test), relatively straightforward switches which is always a bonus. Temperature control was fine, and the room was very quiet. Not much of a view. The bed was huge and very comfortable. The bathroom was nice, clean, sizeable. Good toiletries etc. The shower was a walk-in which is always so much better than one over the bath. Good pressure but hot water takes a few minutes to come through. The bathroom didn’t

title: Fantastic hotel in a fantastic location.
desc: We regularly visit/layover in Singapore, but this was our first time staying at the Conrad. We decided to stay here as we are Hilton Gold members and decided to try it out with a points stay, we were not disappointed, and this will now become our hotel of choice when in Singapore. Staff are of the highest standard, courteous, friendly and highly professional. Rooms are very well equipped with everything you need and are very spacious, with extra little touches that make the hotel stand out from the crowd. Executive lounge is fantastic, with both service and food/drink offerings being high quality, we particularly liked how there are two lounges, making it easy for both business and leisure guests to enjoy the enhanced experience in a formal or less formal environment dependent

title: First Class Hotel Experience in the heart of the Singapore CBD
desc: Set amongst the hustle and bustle of Suntec City, the Conrad is shining light on quality. The staff are warm and welcoming. The “app” checkin experience is quick and efficient. The rooms are luxuriously appointed and most have good views. Very short walk to shopping malls with cheap-eat restaurants and food courts along with supermarket and other shopping. Close walk to Clarke Quay, Boat Quay and the Esplanade areas and other tourist destinations. A top notch hotel experience.

title: Location Service 5 Star
desc: Booked a executive level room so we could try the new Club Conrad concept. Check in was smooth and friendly. Had booked 2 nights using points and 1 night free reward. We were upgraded for the first night stay to save changing rooms which was very thoughtful. Rooms are recently upgraded and are very well done. Bathroom has the best rain shower we have ever used. The best part of our stay was using the Club Conrad lounge. Service was outstanding. Many choices for breakfast without the crowds. Evening drinks looking out over the city is a great way to finish the day. Special mention to Gerlie from the executive lounge staff for helping with our bookings. All up the hotel is what you expect and more.

title: Best suite in Suntec/Millenia Walk area
desc: A must stay is the Conrad Centennial Suite recently refurbished with large living and bath rooms with en suite toilet. Views are brilliant with top to bottom glass windows with fully automatic blinds. Shanghai Tang toiletries completes this amazing stay

title: 5 stars. Excels in customer service.
desc: Just finished 4 nights at Conrad. First of all, I’m not a gold member here. I’m nobody to Conrad (or Hilton). I don’t deserve anything for loyalty as I don’t normally stay at Hilton hotels. I was pleasantly surprised. The standard room was excellent, super comfy and large. Front desk efficient with a smile. Housekeeping were like stealth, only visible when you needed something. Food outstanding. Bar was classy and drinks strong. Front door guys on top of everything. It was dumping rain outside and I ran into the executive chef in the lobby. I was looking for saffron....he had some delivered to my room. How often does that happen? Yes, I engaged with ALL the staff. All well trained. 5 stars all the way around. Well done Conrad! By the way, look at my profile. I don’t give 5

title: Beautiful hotel in great location
desc: It’s hard to stay at a hotel in Singapore that is poorly located and this hotel is in a great location near the MTR, close to Marina Bay Sands & Sun City Shopping Centre. We chose an executive club room that included breakfast and evening drinks & snacks. We loved that the club room was located on 31st floor so the views were amazing. There was also one on the pool level. The room was really comfortable and included everything we needed. Bathroom products were Shanghai Tang and the bathroom had a rain shower & a bath. Loved staying here.

title: Memorable stay
desc: I have just completed 3 nights here. I was lucky enough to secure a room with a great view of the Singapore CBD skyline. The room was big and newly renovated. Toiletries were by Shanghai Tang, and the hotel location is just a few mins from the Promenade MRT station and Suntec Mall and Milenia Walk. The breakfast buffet had a nice spread of both Asian and western dishes, and overall the staff were friendly and helpful. I will miss this classy hotel, and will seriously consider staying here for my next Singapore trip.

title: Awesome!
desc: Booked the Conrad while spending a couple of days in Singapore. The newly refurbished rooms look great. Service was always friendly and courteous. Small details like housekeeping visiting you in the evening asking if you would like ice or extra water is a nice touch. Located to a number of great eateries at Millenia walk and the brauhaus is a plus. Would return.

title: Unexpected gem
desc: This was our first time staying at a Conrad, and based on our stay, I'll be looking to stay in another one. This hotel was everything and more during our stay. Our flight arrived at 6am on the day of check-in. I didn't expect our room to be ready, and it wasn't, but I did ask about a facility to shower. They offered a shower room to use for an hour to clean up - it was basically an unused room in the hotel. It fit our needs perfectly, and it was much appreciated to clean up after a long couple days of flying. We then left our bags with the front desk and headed out for the day while the room was being prepared. When we did finally return and get our room keys, the bags were already up in the room! We had a Grand Deluxe King, which was a big room with lots of seating along

title: Very nice
desc: Nice hotel is a good location. Was not impressed that because I booked through a 3rd party my HHonours Diamond status was not recognised, so much for looking after your best customers! Given this fact, I will probably head to Orchard St for my next visit

title: Excellent
desc: This is my second time here and it didn't disappoint. We stayed here a series of 3 weekends while traveling in Asia and the hotel was a welcome home base with an excellent staff and clean facilities. The executive lounge is under renovation but they do their best to accommodate. Breakfast buffet is great. The location is accessible to everything but a little quieter than the marina.

title: Conrad Contennial King Suite
desc: We were there for family staycation with 2 kids (5 & 3 years old). Overall the staycation is quite well with some fireworks view from the room. We have been placed at 12th floor which you still can hear some Live performance (until 11pm then stop) from downstairs & the road traffic noice. The food served during the cocktails session at Executive Lounge is quite nice. Noted that if you are traveling with kids, you will be placed at another room which means kids are not allow at certain area. I like the breakfast live station for local food which the portion just nice and delicious. The egg stations is quite long queue while there is only one chef is serving there. The room is quite new and heard that is just revovated not long ago. Cleanliness is no need to comment. Just to

title: Another Visit
desc: We transit through Singapore once or twice a year and sometimes opt to spend a few nights before moving on to our next destination. This time we decided to spend two nights at our "go to" Singaporean hotel. While on our prior three stays, we were in a Centennial Suite, this time the hotel was fully booked and we received an Executive room on the 31st floor. This hotel has recently been renovated and the Executive rooms now have a double sink in the bathroom. It also has a long bench along the window that can serve as a bed for a third person. While I initially pouted that I didn't get a suite, the hotel more than made up for it. While I am not encouraging complaints, this hotel strives to make its guests happy. It also has the most caring staff members who jump in to help

title: Singapore Sling
desc: This is a very nice hotel located convenient to the Milienia Tower office complex. Nothing worse about a hotel stay than the old tub shower, if you are used to a walk in shower at home. MAN did this hotel out do that!! Loved the overhead walk in shower. When you are on business, the shower is how you start your day!! I had a lovely view of the Marina and could see the MerLion. The breakfast buffet was quite the spread and very delicious. The bed was very comfortable and I got a great nights sleep. Along with my room, I got a S$20 laundry allowance daily.. be careful, they take a service charge and tax out of that and combined with the prices they charge to laundry, that did not go very far and was not the bargain they advertised it to be. If you are there for three weeks,

title: Nice Location and Good Hotel
desc: The best part of the hotel is the location, it is centrally located and most of the tourist attractions are within 3-4 kms. It has a mall across the road and the location is very lively even late in night. The rooms are nice and equipped with modern fittings. The view from the hotel is amazing, overall had a good stay. Only drawback is food options if you are pure veggie.

title: Stayed in an Executive Room
desc: We stayed for 3 nights in an executive room with executive lounge access at the end of July. The rooms were very nice with an amazing bathroom with lots of amenities & complimentary water bottles & fruit. The beds were extremely comfortable although the rooms are not sound proof, we had a baby next door which woke up during the night crying for a feed every 4 hours like clockwork. The view from the rooms are amazing. I loved the automatic blinds which kept the room dark. Staff in the executive lounge were extremely friendly going above & beyond to look after my husband with a food allergy, they organised the chefs to cook him something special as he wasn’t able to eat any of the food in the lounge. Breakfast in the main restaurant downstairs was amazing, everything was very

title: Who Knew?
desc: I arrived at the Conrad in the middle of the night after flying 27 hours. Immediately, the property screamed luxury hotel. From the grand entrance, to the ample room, the warm and friendly staff, the immaculate condition of the property; and the amenities like the executive lounge-with free-flowing Chandon during happy hour. And, unmatched cuisines and selections offered by its numerous on site eateries. Also the spectacular views of the city from my suite. My stay at the Conrad was unmatched by any Hilton property that I’ve been a guest. This stay exceeded my expectations. A respite after an arduous flight and definite rebook if I am ever in Singapore again!

title: All Good
desc: As part of the Hilton chain. All good. Standards maintained. No complaints. Except for Buffet Breakfast. The food quality of the Asian segment needs more improvement. If this hotel was in Europe, it’ll be rated excellent. But sadly, it’s in Singapore. Hence, the Asian food segment has to live up to its expectations but it didn’t. That’s the only flaw.

title: Good Hotel but does not match the newer Conrads
desc: We stayed a week at this property after having stayed at 2 other Conrads in Japan earlier in the Spring. While the service and amenities are top class, the downside is this is a re-purposed property being turned into a Conrad. It is not like a new property as it continues to remodel some past decorations such as the 80's elevators and the business-like lobby and the spa/pool area. This is a very large hotel with many rooms and it shows in the traffic in the reception area and the large buffet restaurant with lines. The business floor lounge is better in terms of design but it also is very popular and not as quiet as typical at happy hour. It has overflow rooms although service is prompt and with smiles and the food selection is very good. It may be that we were so ecstatic with

title: Comfortable biz hotel
desc: In the city and very comfortable. Good cuisine too.very hospitable and decent rooms. Access to the business centres. Good connect with the private cabs. Walking distance to the shopping areas too. Recommended.

title: The only Hilton brand with a true standard
desc: The hotel is magnificent in all its areas. The Conrad brand is the only reliable brand in the Hilton system. It is the only brand left on Hilton with a quality service and standard. The hotel is well located and impecable. Great breakfast and decor. Loved it.

title: Conrad Excellence with views
desc: Conrad hotels you always know what you are getting, a solid luxury hotel. This was a nice surprise to get upgraded to the Executive floor with the lounge, which has to be one of the best lounges at a hotel I've been in anywhere. The staff are so very attentive, the food/drinks/space is very nice and no crowd. It gets busy for breakfast, but always a place to sit and enjoy the views. The hotel itself is centrally located and easy to get around Singapore. The rooms are very large and everything is very clean and the decor is modern along with the amenities. The shower has amazing pressure - an important item for traveling. I didn't get a chance to use room service, so i can't tell you that - but the food in the lounge was great, so I'd assume it to be good. Laundry service

title: Good service
desc: All of the staff is very good service. They are always smiling and willing to help all of requirements. They offered cute bears to all of us in the room. For amenities requirement, there is no charge.

title: Lovely Hotel for a good rate
desc: We booked this as a family of 3 for 5 days primarily because the rates were very reasonable in comparison to other 5* in the immediate area of Marina Bay. Lovely hotel, great staff, clean and spacious room. Not overcrowded and central with a good hawker centre next door next to the Fountain of Wealth to get great meals for $5 each instead of $25 elsewhere / in hotel. Walking distance / 1 tube stop to Marina Bay. At a fraction of the price of other hotels in the area, well worth it.

title: Concierge service does not meet my needs
desc: Overall stay was good. Good location, friendly HSKP staff, however the concierge service...... This morning around 11am, I approached the concierge to ask any buses around hotel to the Zoo. At beginning I spoke in Chinese. I thought the staff who talked to me would find out another staff who could speak Chinese to serve me, but he let me speak in English. I mentioned my question again, he simply answered the question without patience. He just mentioned it's behind the hotel, at Suntec Shopping Mall. He did not give me an explaination how to walk there. Then he just gave me one CitySightseeing Singapore map and indicate No.6 bus. Whole conversation no any smiling on his face, I guess because I am Chinese. I am working in the hotel as well, and always think the service of

title: Outstanding in every respect
desc: I cannot fault one aspect of this hotel. Our room was amazing with a direct view over Marina Bay, Merlion and Marina Bay Sands. Room was lovely with supersize sofa and very comfy bed. The lobby is tranquil and the lobby bar has amazing cocktails served with a smile. What really made our stay was the exemplary attitude of the staff. Nothing was too much trouble for any member of staff. However Fate was exceptional in her care of us. Buying us a cocktail because of a short delay accessing our room then taking up to our room to show us the facilities. Later seeing us asking if anything else was required. She made us feel very special and is a real credit to the Conrad.

title: Always exquisite
desc: The Conrad Singapore is my favourite hotel ever and as I've said many times, I'd live there if I could afford it. This year we were treated to refurbished rooms and a Club Lounge that were amazing. Service here is first class and the general ambience is understated elegance. The drawback is price. It's expensive even by Singapore standards but if you're ok with that then do yourself a favour and stay here. Great pool area and well located for access to everything.

title: Excellent! Worth the stay.
desc: Although the lobby is not that grand of an entrance compared with Raffles and Fullerton, the stay is worth it :) The staff are welcoming and very professional. They know how to take care of you. The food was great and the view from our room at the 28th floor was amazing! The lounge at the 31st is a must-have and see! Conrad Hotel is a worry-free hotel and if you’re attending a conference in the business district, this is what you should consider. It’s right across 2 major convention centers and shopping malls are just a stone throw away.

title: As always great!
desc: Conrad has been my favorite hotel brand since I went to its hotel in Tokyo! The service is always amazing and the rooms are well kept and modern! The view from the rooms are great and it is located really close to many restaurants and stores! The food is also really good! I recommend this hotel to everyone looking for a great hotel with the best services!

title: Fabuolous stay at Conrad Centennial
desc: For the 3rd year we returned to the Conrad and it didn't disappoint. The staff are still wonderful, the location is fabulous and the refurbishments are extremely tasteful and luxurious. Spend the extra and enjoy the Executive Lounge and associsted facilities, it's certainly worth it. We plan on returning again next year. The hotel is a very easy stroll down to the Esplanade.

title: Classy hotel
desc: We booked here for our holiday stay. Upgraded to have access to the executive lounge and that was well worth the extra cost. The rooms are good. Nespresso machine in the room. Service is friendly and efficient. Sundowner drinks and snacks in the lounge each afternoon that made our stay special. The food at the sundowners as well as the breakfast seems to work on standard items with one or two which get changed every other day. If you are staying longer than two nights it gets repetitive. The breakfast does need more variety......perhaps fried rice and other Asian dishes. We normally choose a different hotel each time we come to Singapore so that we can be in a different part of the city. Would come back to the Conrad though. The staff are delightful!

title: Water and service is scarce
desc: The service in the hotel is mediocre- the food is average. And they definitely do NOT give you the sense of the “luxury of being yourself” nor to “stay inspired” I had put my team in this hotel for an event we were organizing. Had a lot of issues with the booking but the worse thing we experienced was the lack of water. The bottled water is tiny. My team had asked for water to be sent up- albeit they asked for 20 bottles which they did send the 1st 2 nights - on the 3rd night the front desk- rejected their requests- threatened to charge (to which I replied I was happy to pay) and then limited them to 6 bottles that night. Singapore is hot and humid and one would require lots of water to stay hydrated. Happy to pay for bottled premium water BUT wasn’t given that option either.

title: Good customer service with reasonable price
desc: I reserved 2 rooms for 6 family members with good customer service from the female japanese staff at the check-in counter. When we check-out it was glad to learn that the quoted hotel fees included one additional buffet breakfast for 2 members. What a surprise to us. My sister felt that this was the best hotel that she visited in Singapore.

title: Great Spot for Singapore visit
desc: We started our asian adventure in singapore and this is the first hotel we visited. We also stayed at the marina bay sands which I also reviewed. I really loved this hotel. I thought it was the perfect location to sight see around singapore for visitors. 1. the hotel was beautiful. The rooms are nice and spacious. As a diamond member, I may have gotten a room upgrade and had access to the executive lounge which was nice. The breakfast was phenomenal at oscars. The selection was amazing and the staff always very helpful. We also visited the conrad bali and the singapore conrad blew it out of the water. 2. location - this hotel is located next to the suntech mall which houses hundreds of stores and restaurants just across the street. The hop on hop off bus also runs

title: Ok but not same as other Conrads
desc: We stayed for over a week with the kids in 2 rooms. Having stayed 3 weeks earlier (without kids) at the Mandarin Oriental, I had a good reference point. The Conrad hotel is recently renovated so rooms are nice quality. We stayed in Executive level rooms, which was nice until they closed the Hilton Honors lounge and those people had to come up to Level 31 to use the Executive Lounge. Unfortunately there clearly is not enough room for both so we had to wait repeatedly for a place to sit and then had to share tables. This was very disappointing as we’d paid for the use of the lounge and couldn’t enjoy it. Food range is more limited and much lower quality than Hong Kong and Tokyo Conrads. Its ok, but not in same category. In the end we gave up going to the lounge. Dress standards

title: Excellent Dinner @ Golden Peony
desc: We had a wonderful dinner at Golden Peony last evening and the food were amazing! Service was excellent and flawless; special mention to the Shirlene, Jean and Esther for ensuring we have a memorable experience. And most importantly, not forgetting the Taiwanese server who have tirelessly working and making sure everything for our dinner is tip-top while maintaining an attitude full of sincerity and warmth! A true passion for the service industry. A great place to hold your event!

title: Service and Comfort at its BEST
desc: Upon arrival after an 18 hour flight was top shelf. The attention and care that they gave to us was far more than ever expected. The food was amazing the room was very comfortable and the attention to detail was at its best.

title: Enjoyable Staycation
desc: I stayed in this hotel on 7 July 2018 for a night. I had previously stayed at their Presidential Suite so I am very familiar with the hotel amenities. This time the Centennial Executive Suite I had was newly refurbished, warmly decorated with spacious bathroom having a deep soaking bathtub.....super nice:-). The two bedside lamps, lamp beside the chair in the bedroom and the lamp beside the couch in living room were all not working, but its just a small glitch for me since I did not use them and I did not inform the hotel. This was the first time I used their swimming pool and the pool staffs were attentive and helpful. If you want a good tan you need to be there before noon, after 2 pm the sun get blocked by the building structure. I went to Oscar's restaurant for breakfast

title: Comfortable, updated rooms
desc: According to my colleague, the rooms have been updated. I found them to be very spacious, comfortable and well appointed. The hairdryer is powerful, which isn't always the case for hotel hair dryers. Comfortable beds and the blackout curtains are lovely and open and shut with the touch of a button. Lots of free water bottles are provided, a necessity to stay hydrated in the humid climate.

title: Upscale Luxury Experience Feels Transactional
desc: In July 2018, in the midst of completing the Hilton Honors Diamond Status Match, I checked into the refurbished Centennial King Suite at the Conrad Centennial Singapore, which gave me access to the Executive Lounge on the 31st floor exclusive to suite and premium guests. Whilst the Conrad brand of upscale luxury provided suitable indulgence, the hotel appears unable to fully accommodate its immense popularity, resulting in frequent lapses of service standards which distracted from the Conrad experience. The recently-refurbished 63sqm Centennial King Suite plays it all sunlit Japanese business modern in design, with a separate living area with a long daybed and a bedroom with a king-sized bed. The spacious bathroom comes with a double vanity sink, bathtub with complimentary bath

title: Fabulous rooms and excellent customer service
desc: The Conrad Centennial is a great hotel. It lacks the immediate wow factor of some rivals in the city, but compensates with fabulous rooms which feature spectacular views of the bay area and outstanding customer service. The pool area - with its cabanas and hand-rolled towels - feels upmarket too. Don't get too carried away in the bar though, as drinks are very expensive.

title: Great Staycation
desc: A refreshing look after the club room and club lounge's renovation. Like the coziness, long sofa bench, Peranakan (local culture) inspired furniture and a round and practical working table in the room. Equally impressive were the great services by various staff of the hotel as mentioned below. They were friendly, helpful and served with passion and smiles. Operations : Christop Club Lounge : Michelle, Gerlie, Mark, Jane, Aris, Mkchele Sarah, Gajan, Ivy Lela, Jeet and Regina. Guest Services : Aika san and Intan Front Office : Ila Cho Gym : Khai and Sathiya Will be back again when the gym renovation is completed but one still has the option to use next door hotel's gym or to use a temporary small gym in the hotel;

title: GreaT Stay!
desc: I was there for a weekend staycation with my sister from 14-15 Jul 2018. We had a musical to catch at MBS that evening & had decided on a staycation at Conrad as I had been there years ago & was impressed with the great service. Truly, Conrad Centennial Singapore had lived up to its name once again. We were attended by Mohit when we were checking in & he was friendly & made us feel at ease. I asked for the higher floor & a late check-out & he was able to accede to our request. Initially there was a problem with the bathroom door but they managed to get it solved. And not to mention the turn-down service & the BEE-YOU-TEE-FUL view! Gorgeous view especially at the Executive Lounge! My birthday’s coming in Sept .. may just swing by yet again for another stay! Thank you, Conrad

title: Good rather than great
desc: Nice stay there as a Diamond member. One category upgrade (no more, no less), a lot of choice at the restaurant breakfast downstairs though the quality is not so great by Singapore standard. Since the renovations, Diamond members have been able to access the 31st floor lounge which is a great improvement over the 4th floor one. Nicer views, good snacks for dinner though only sparkling wine (apparently no Champagne) during my visit. Rooms are large and well equipped with pleasant bathrooms, I preferred the marina view side despite the views being more obstructed by nearby buildings. Generally good location but reception and concierge staff surprisingly not very clear when giving walking directions and you really need to know what you are doing as there are very few pedestrian

title: OUR 41st Anniversary
desc: A great hotel,the staff were very attentive. We had access to the lounge on the 31st floor which was ideal for breakfast after shopping tea and scones. all staff were excellent ,all spoke English. Overall it was quite expensive but the service was worth it

title: Lovely staycation with excellent service
desc: Requested for a quiet room as we were light sleepers, but since we arrived early, they offered another room which was available, but us was behind the elevator. Surprisingly, the room is quiet & we weren’t affected by any loud commotions from the corridor. Special attention to the friendly service we had countered throughout the stay was worth mentioning. Evening turn down service can be easily arranged via the Hilton app. We returned to the room after dinner & were surprised to catch the fireworks rehearsal, an added bonus. Only con: the bed was too hard, seems like the pillow topper have either worn out. We didn’t enjoy the firm mattress. We checked with the staff upon checkout if they have other mattress options, but we were told they used the standard mattress, but they do

title: Definitely WOW
desc: Stayed here for a short 3 night holiday before heading off to the UK. Booked the Conrad as we got a good rate and being Diamond would have the usual Hilton benefits. Had stayed in Singapore earlier in the year and run the gauntlet of the officious breakfast police and sardine packed pool of the Marina Bay Sands hotel, never again! That place is best experienced, at night from the other side of the bay, whilst sipping drinks from one of the numerous rooftop bars. Standard room was upgraded to an executive King on the 31st floor, next to the Executive lounge. Staff superbly professional and clean hotel, unassuming and quietly very upmarket. The lounge on the 31st floor was exceptional, took advantage of the lovely afternoon tea and even better the free Laurent champagne every

title: Poor Service
desc: Receptionist/Concierge forgot to book taxi to airport - causing almost 3 of my colleagues and myself to miss the plane departing the country Poor Check out service (or Check in) - waited >30 minutes for both check in and check out - counter poorly staff - other staff walked by to office but did not man counter even though they knew of the long wait

title: Great Service and Hospitality!
desc: I recently stayed at the Conrad Centennial with my family while I was attending a conference. Rooms are clean and comfortable with plenty of amenities. The newly refurbished rooms have roomy baths with rain showers! The hotel staff is excellent - everyone was friendly and helpful throughout our whole stay. The location is at the heart of the city, close to the metro, which can take you anywhere. Plenty of shopping malls and foodcourts to choose from. The executive lounge staff were particularly accommodating, and we had a fabulous time. The only area we found lacking for this type of high end hotel was the gym/spa facilities which have been relocated as the hotel upgrades its spa/fitness rooms. Nevertheless, we enjoyed the service and the quality of the facilities

title: Great Property
desc: Booked the hotel through Visa Signature Hotels (free breakfast for two, prem wifi, room upgrade preference, $25 F&B credit.) Room was great, view was great, beds were very comfortable. Bathroom was large, great tub. The breakfast really wow'd us. Normally not breakfast people, but went every morning for over an hour. Pool was nice enough for a mostly corporate hotel. Lobby is attractive and fun place for evening cocktail. In-room dining is a bit of a rip, as is the onsite dining for dinner. Staff is great!

title: An old friend, refreshed and glowing.
desc: I love this hotel. It has been a part of my business life, for decades, and I rate it as my favourite hotel, anywhere. It has not always been perfect, and we have had our ‘moments’ but the quality, service and simple feeling of “coming home”, make me one of its strongest advocates. I had stayed away during the renovations, as I’m very intolerant of disruption, but delighted to return last week and experience it’s new shine. The new room layouts I think are great, practical, comfortable and generous in space. My only criticism is the executive lounge, which has been refurbished but is still too small, and not a pleasant experience during the busy times. In particular I don’t like the communal table, which takes up a lot of space, and is just awkward for couples and single

title: Great High Tea at Conrad Lobby Lounge
desc: The weekend high-tea was a 3-course affair, starting with a seafood platter of lobster, oysters and prawn served with a glass of prossecco, followed by a 3-tier assortment of savouries and sweets, hot scones with home-made jam and clotted cream, with a cheese platter to finish, and free-flow coffee and tea (wide variety of traditional, fruit, wellness and green tea). The presentation and quality of the food was superb, although there are a few misses with a couple of the sweet desserts. Service was pleasant and attentive. It was a relaxing and value for money high tea.

title: Always a favourite in Singapore
desc: We have stayed here twice before and this time didn’t disappoint as usual. We had a king room on level 16 overlooking the Merlion. Staff are all generally attentive and efficient. There was an international trade conference on at the time of our stay so there were many “important people” in the lobby and lining up for the lifts .. much too important for lowly tourists! This happens in any good hotel. What we particularly like about this hotel is the easy connection to the nearby Suntec City and Marina Square malls. Heaps of shopping and eateries, all under cover and protected from Singapore’s afternoon thunderstorms! It’s also not too far to walk around to the Marina Shoppes for some serious high end purchases. We tried to book into the hotel again on our return trip in 2

title: Great hotel and location
desc: Great hotel, rooms are large, clean, full of amenities. Service was great. Gym was being renovated was only disappointing thing but it has to be renovated at some stage. Wifi free for Honors members as always and was quick, would be back no worries.

title: Staff Service Poor
desc: Quality of room was great as was food, but service of staff and management was extremely poor. Executive Floor was particularly disappointing - certainly not 5 star. Gym under renovation but advised only once checked in

title: Lovely Hotel
desc: We arrived early and had an early check in to our executive room which was nicely refurbished, we had a couple of issues that where addressed the next morning by the Manager on the Executive floor whom moved us to a suite which was lovely and clean. The Executive lounge is fabulous all day refreshments including alcoholic drinks which was big bonus after being out exploring this beautiful city to come back to a glass of wine no matter what time it was as long as it was prior to 8pm at no charge. The staff at the lounge are very professional the only criticism I have is the evening canapés are cold where they should be hot. Overall fabulous hotel and friendly professional staff enjoyed our 6 day stay. I would highly recommend this beautiful hotel and would stay here again on

title: Great location
desc: Best part about this hotel is its location imo. It’s close to a MRT station and Singapore probably has one of the best underground train systems in the world - high frequency, elaborate, and clean. As a diamond member, I was upgraded to a higher floor room, no suite unfortunately. We had breakfast at the executive lounge on day 1 and the Oscars on day 2. Since 4th floor lounge is currently under renovation, Diamond members get to use the top floor lounge. Executive lounge has a wonderful view but breakfast selection is subpar, we had way more fun at Oscars. It’s something to think about. However, great service was received at the lounge. Pool is an ok size. It was pretty much empty in the morning for both days we were there. Three cabanas available. We also managed to get

title: Singapore is something special
desc: Our first trip to Singapore was delightful. The beauty, energy and diversity of the city was made even more special by our stay at the Conrad!! The hotel is beautiful and centrally located and the staff is superb!

title: Great hotel and good location
desc: The hotel is in a good location. It has great rooms and an excellent breakfast service. The service can vary during busy periods so allow plenty of time when checking in or out, or are wanting breakfast in a large group.

title: Great hotel in Singapore
desc: The place to stay in Singapore. Excellent hotel, staff and service. The hotel is centrally located, and is within walking distance, or a short and inexpensive taxi ride of some of the attractions and parks in Signapore.

title: A hotel which gives you what you pay for; expensive for a very good reason. Definitely value for money.
desc: I stayed in this hotel for two nites on the executive floor. The rooms are amazing, view is good, you get to see the entire CBD of Singapore. Housekeeping is so professional that you probably think you are staying in a suite costing thousands of dollars. Good linens, pillows and comfortable beds make for a good sleep that is so important for business travellers. Staffs address guest by name and try their best to meet the difference preferences and needs of different guest. The buffet breakfast on the executive lounge was good, warm food, cereals, cheese, bread... Etc but the main difference is that they keep smaller portion on the tables and replenish them regularly to keep it fresh. On the second they I thought I might want to try the bigger spread of the breakfast buffet at

title: Great location and immaculate rooms
desc: Great location next to pan pacific and can see the singapore flyer and marina bay sands close by. Superior room on floor 20 overlooking the bay was fantastic. Spacious and clean with great ammenities. The only down side was the lack of appropriate numbers of seating at breakfast and having to line up for 5-10 mins to be seated.. very annoying. A hotel that size needs a bigger breakfast room. The breakfast itself is great with a lot of variety and excellent quality esp the fresh selection of juices. We also loved the afternoon high tea. Beautifully presented and great service. Overall would definitely stay here again when next in Singapore.

title: A great experience
desc: We stayed one night in an executive room. The room was excellent and the club experience was outstanding. The staff were helpful and pleasant. The view was fantastic and the quality of the food was outstanding.

title: amazing stay
desc: just checked in yesterday 19th august 2018. the hotel is amazing. centrally located. close to most of malls and easy access to alot of eateries. hotel amenities and service is fantastic. breakfast is fabulous. room view is amazing facing the wealth fountain

title: Pleasent stay
desc: My family really enjoyed the stay at this hotel. All of staffs are very kind and professional. The staffs at the door remembered my kids' name and always called their names, so my kids felt comfortable and always welcomed by staffs.The location of hotel is close to most of attractions such as MBS, Gardens by the Bay, and etc....

title: Family mini break
desc: We stayed at the Conrad for 2 nights then on to marina bay sands for one night of pool fun. This was a lovely hotel, super friendly staff. We paid for club access which was very civilised, so enjoyed my glasses of champagne. The staff even remembered our names. The bed was so comfy, topper on mattress, super fine sheets and even a pillow menu. Champagne and mattress topper - sleep was bliss. Buffet breakfast excellent. Pool functional for dip in hot day. I would really recommend this hotel, far superior than Marina Bay Sands.

title: A Great Visit
desc: I am just finishing up another stay at the Conrad and have no complaint on great memories. The service is top notch and the executive lounge is a great touch and welcome escape. The central location makes it easy to get around to any where you need to go.

title: So close to perfect, but one big service miss
desc: I spent 5 nights at the Conrad and enjoyed my stay overall. I was in the city as part of a birthday trip, and the concierge sent up some chocolates and wine in honor of the day, which was really thoughtful. I had executive lounge access, and enjoyed the daily breakfast and afternoon tea service overall, though at breakfast the hot items could have been warmer, especially if you were eating later in the morning. The location is very central, walkable to a number of top attractions, as well as several malls with plenty of good eating options. The staff were friendly and welcoming, especially the young man who checked me in efficiently after a very long day of travel from the States. The pool area was on the smaller side, but spotlessly clean and well attended, and the city views

title: Central Location
desc: First time in Singapore and very happy that I chose the Conrad Centennial. Arrived in Singapore only to find that the airline lost my luggage. After traveling over 30 hours to say this was disappointing is an understatement. Mentioned this to Amirah who checked me in and she sent me up a kit with toiletries, an underwear and undershirt. The other person who went above and beyond was the Glazier at the concierge desk. She was there each morning and help me out with all my questions and giving me the best directions to my destinations. She even helped me when the shuttle service I had reserved didn't show up at the scheduled time. This hotel is also walking distance to the major sites such as Singapore Flyer, Garden by the Bay, Marina Bay Sands and Merlion. They also have

title: Great Location to see Singapore
desc: This is a good five star hotel and as a long time Hilton member I usually head towards their brand. The hotel is in a very good position at Suntec City and walking distances or short taxi rides to shops, restaurants, Gardens by the Bay , and a lot of the local attractions . While the hotel itself was very nice and rooms clean and high quality, I didn’t overly feel welcomed as a Hilton honors member. The staff while efficient in most areas didn’t make you feel like a special guest. As the other hotels i stayed at during this hotel. The lobby bar staffing were the most disappointing and fairly inefficient. Overall a good hotel, great spot but seems to cater for the business trade rather then the holiday maker. I would still use the hotel again due to the higher standard of the

title: Beautiful hotel
desc: Beautiful hotel located right next to the downtown area (easy walk or subway). The restaurant was excellent and the pool deck was a welcome reprieve from the heat (it was blazing hot when I was there).

title: Beautiful and convenient hotel
desc: A very lovely hotel. We had a beautiful view, both day and night. The electric blinds and curtains were fantastic. Nice to lay in bed and be able to see that view first thing. The room was well equipped. We had a good iron and a proper hair blow dryer. Lots of complementary water, which was very nice. Great toiletries and really nice robes and slippers. The shower was excellent, great water pressure and a choice of a rain shower. I even took a bath in the huge tub with the provided bath salts. A very nice luxury after a 14 hour flight. As Diamond members we enjoyed the complementary evening drinks and snacks and the afternoon tea. Lovely view from such a high floor. We never tried the executive floor breakfast, as the one downstairs was so nice. HUGE variety and wonderfully

title: Reasonably Good
desc: Very good service, great bar and location. Surrounded by some very good restaurants and mall should you chose to opt out for cheaper meals. The bar on the ground floor is very good and the overall service is good.

title: Great hotel as you’d expect from Conrad
desc: I stayed at the Conrad Centennial for the first time in Singapore. I’d previously stayed at nearby hotels for work. The food, facilities and service was excellent. Despite the gym being closed for renovation that week, the hotel and setup a smaller gym on another level. I was lucky to see the finished gym and it was excellent. The hotel is close to nearby shops and a great pizza restaurant over the road at Suntec Tower. Would highly recommend this hotel on your next stay in Singapore.

title: Amazing Hotel with Impeccable Service!
desc: After an enjoyable cruise we arrived at the Conrad Centennial Singapore to be showered with impeccable and friendly service! Our stunning room with amazing views was ready for us before noon and greatly appreciated after a cruise. Executive Lounge was amazing! Concierge desk was very helpful! I travel a lot and by far this one of my favorite hotels! Definitely enjoy the breakfast buffet during your visit! Mohit Samtani at the front desk made sure our 24 hour stay at this amazing hotel was spectacular! Thank you Mohit.

title: Obnoxious staff
desc: Had an event on 29/8 and our company are one of the sponsors. The staff DID not mention the time we have to vacate the area for a wedding banquet. We are told to clear up immediately when the wedding guest has come. 3 managers started talking out loud about a report on what time my vendors came to tear down my poster. And there was NO smile, NO apology, NO basic courtesy to even tell us in advance, when they are there throughout the event. Overall, a poor service in a posh or so called luxury hotel. But too bad, the staff thinks too highly of themselves. Even when I apologise to them, they don’t even look you in the eye and walk away. Disgusting service.

title: Would absolutely stay here again
desc: It was an absolute pleasure to stay at the Conrad Centennial in Singapore. The staff were amazing in every aspect of the hotel from check-in, to room service, housekeeping, and the restaurant. Our room was exceptional, and large enough to accommodate a table and couch without feeling cramped. Everything was clean, and our room was refreshed at least twice a day. We were there for the F1, and they kept the restaurant open 24 hours over the weekend. We went each night for supper after returning from the track, and on the third night the staff knew our order by heart. It's close to the MRT station, the F1 track, and taxis are always available. We felt welcomed in the hotel, and will definitely stay at the Conrad Centennial next time we visit Singapore.

title: Not bad at all
desc: This rating might seem harsh because the hotel did nothing wrong. I am, however, judging it by the very high standards of Asian 5-star hotels. If you've stayed in other 5-star hotels in Asia you will know that some of them try to do more than simply tick boxes and meet minimum requirements. My room was spacious for the lowest category of room, nicely equipped with a nespresso machine, and kept beautifully clean throughout. But it was hardly the box of delights that, say, the Conrad in Seoul can offer. The breakfast was very respectable, but was not quite the amazing spread I expected from reading the reviews here. And there seemed to be a curious reluctance to cook fresh eggs - again, compare it with the wonderful Conrad in Seoul and with certain other 5-star hotels in

title: Very special
desc: Celebrating our 52 wedding anniversary. Staff went over and above to make our stay very special. Friom check -in to checkout quick and easy. Staff extremely effficient and friendly and accommodations just perfect. Thank you Conrad for making our anniversary so very special!

title: Luxurious stay - didn’t want to check out!
desc: RECEPTION Professional greeting from Vivien. Her lovely gestures and warm smile made us feel very welcome! LOBBY As pictured. VIEW PHENOMENAL - see photo attached LOCATION A few minutes walk from the MRT and there is a mall nearby so plenty of late night food options too. BATHROOM A little dated compared to the room. Don't get me wrong - The bathroom looked amazing. I just wish the shower head was 10/10 like the rest of the room. There was rain shower as well as the usual shower head. The bath was great along with the Conrad bath duck! So cute! I took a bath every day to spend some quality time in the bathroom. The basin, the layout of towels and baskets etc were all on point. AMENITIES As you would expect from a 5 star Asian hotel. You get everything including

title: Good hotel in great location
desc: Great location down near the bay. If you have a high enough room the views of the city at night can be spectacular given it’s Singapore which does excel in a nightline. The rooms are large with plenty of storage space, as are the bathrooms. There is a surprising lack of any on demand TV or even much in the way of capability to hook up laptops etc. Pool is nice but a little on the small side. Rather what you would expect for a city centre hotel. It did feel a missed opportunity not to serve drinks or food there in the evenings though.

title: Amazing Hotel in a great location but...
desc: We stayed at Conrad from the 22nd to the 24th. Everything about our stay was amazing apart from when we checked in. The lady who checked us in was very rude and unwelcoming. We were directed to the reception by a smiling young lady. When we got there, the lady looked up and trying hard to smile said passports and credit card. I knew our booking was bed only as that was the deal we got at the time, so I waited for her to complete the check in process before I asked her about breakfast. Her response was ' you dont have breakfast included in your booking' but did not go on to say if we wanted to add breakfast, it would cost us a certain amount. We had friends staying checked in the day before and they were given a warm welcome and given the details on breakfast. While waiting for

title: Excellent Experience turned bit sour at Checkout
desc: This was my first stay experience with Conrad. I was here to attend a business conference for 3 days. The experience was immaculate right from check in until checkout. The staff at the checkout was not truly helpful as the hotel charged $200 on my card as a security. On checkout they mentioned that would like to physically see the credit card, which I had left in my office. So had to walk up to my office, get my wallet only to be told that they don’t see any amount being held as deposit. So a bit of disappointment there. Now I’ll have to wait for the refund. The rooms have been refurbished with modern look and feel. I had a room with a view of Fortune Fountain which was very soothing for eyes especially the ever changing fountain lighting. Our conference was on level 4, next to

title: a great find in Singapore!
desc: There are simply too many hotels in Singapore, and I've stayed at quite a few too. If you are looking for prime location, comfortable room, good service and good value for money, this is it! The hotel is 20 years old, however rooms have just been renovated earlier in 2018. Buffet breakfast was high in quality. I'm a very fussy eater and usually don't have anything else than fresh fruits and yogurt unless it is really good. Eventually I filled my plate with the dim sums twice because they were simply amazing! Location is great too. Walking distance to almost everywhere. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone.

title: Conrad SG
desc: One of the best experiences and services I've had at a hotel. Love the blackout curtains.Personally liked how we were given a room for 30mins to freshen up before our check-in at 3PM. These are located on the 5th floor.

title: Very nice hotel
desc: This was my first time staying at this property. The staff is very helpful and the hotel is very nice. My room was large and comfortable. I never heard any noise from the hall or neighboring rooms. I am a light sleeper and was concerned because my room shared a wall with the elevators and the noise might wake me up. I could hear some humming when the elevator was moving but it wasn't loud. I slept with earplugs and wasn't bothered by the humming. In the evening they have live piano music in the lobby which was wonderful.

title: Intuitive service with great views
desc: Don’t think one can come across a better example if world class intuitive & efficient service in a world class hotel brand. The breakfast was truly busy yet efficient, do try the lobby bar, the barman certainly is inventive & interesting 😁

title: Excellent by any Measure.
desc: This is my fourth stay at the Conrad in Singapore and I did not believe it could get any better. Comfortable, well appointed suite (upgraded thanks to Hhonors membership) in newly renovated wing. Access to VIP lounge means breakfast, afternoon tea and Dinner included. Comfortable bed, pillow menu for the discerning head and wonderful bathroom. It's the Conrad staff that make the five star hotel appear six stars. The special and genuine attention is so welcoming..special mention must go to False Bin Rifaeh who led us to secret locations for a photographer's delight and all the staff in the 31st Floor Lounge are exemplary, especially the knowledgeable and so helpful, Aris. If you have the opportunity to stay in Singapore make sure you stay at this wonderful hotel in such a great

title: Stay at Conrad - Excellent service
desc: It was a cery nice stay for my business trip. Close to the city centre. Taxis readily available. Good business area and conference rooms. Wifi at good speed. Breakfast to be recommended. Excellent service by Mohit Samtani

title: Great location and hotel
desc: The Conrad is perfectly located if you need to be at a conference or meetings in Suntec city which is right across the road. Rooms are spacious and well appointed. Staff provide very good service. The breakfast is great with lots of options to choose from. Staff are extremely friendly and helpful. From the hotel it is easy to access shopping centres and malls nearby and walk to Marina bay in air conditioning.

title: Extremely Comfortable
desc: Stayed 5 nights here with a 4yo. Booked a standard room, but ended up upgrading to the executive for what I consider to be good value. It was a spacious room with a large king bed that could fit all three of us, breakfast at Oscars each morning (buffet) or in the level 4 lounge (couldn't go to the top level lounge due to child, but no issues with that), got some clothes pressed and could access the lounge at any time. Breakfast in the hotel was important to get us going each day without having to look around the area for a place to eat. There are a lot of restaurants and cafes around though which is convenient. Suntec City Mall is across the road which is very convenient. The level 4 lounge did not have the same variety as Oscars, but was less busy with more attentive

title: One of the best
desc: The hotel staff was extremely friendly and courteous. Fantastic service and great hotel. One of the best on my list as a global traveller. This will be my hotel during every singpore trip. Their executive lounge service was also top class.

title: A great hotel!
desc: First visit to Singapore and this hotel was in an ideal location close to conference venue, metro and attractions. The hotel is quite traditional in style, well maintained and good attention to detail. Staff were friendly but not overbearing. Breakfast had a range of cuisines,traditional English and choicebof asian food. Egg station, juice bar and wide range of fresh fruits. Room service was excellent and all items used were replenished daily. Thoroughly recommend this hotel.

title: Great stay and fine location
desc: This is an upmarket, comfortable and distinguished hotel, as should be expected from the Conrad brand. My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. The hotel is well situated with great views, which we appreciated more and more as we got to know Singapore better. Staff are very attentive and courteous. They go out of their way to make everything just right. We met the very experienced General Manager twice around the hotel. He initiated the conversations, showed real interest, and remembered us the second time. His good attitude has clearly cascaded to his team. As I am a Hilton diamond card holder, we had access to the executive lounge on Floor 31. This is a great facility with strong provision throughout the day. Breakfast, afternoon tea and the evening reception are all

title: Super hotel, great service
desc: My husband and I stayed at the Conrad Centennial for 3 nights in October 2018. If first impressions count for a lot, the friendly and highly efficient greeting we received on arrival set the tone for our stay brilliantly. We upgraded to the Executive Club which includes excellent breakfast, afternoon tea and pre-dinner canapes.
