In fact the canapes in the Executive Lounge were substantial and meant that we didn't even need an evening meal during our stay. We requested a room on an upper floor and this request was honoured by the hotel. The hotel was busy but there was always a table in the Executive Lounge on 31st floor. Our room was spacious, well equipped with a large very comfortable bed and great view of the Singapore skyline and Marina Bay. We found the room exceptionally

title: Ice Cream for Breakfast is Always a Good Idea!
desc: As a Hilton Honors Diamond member I was upgraded to a King Executive room with a view of Marina Bay as requested. It was nicely decorated with comfortable furnishings. Afternoon tea and evening drinks and canapes in the Executive Club Lounge were generous and of a high standard. Glasses of champagne (yes champagne, not sparkling wine) were topped up regularly. The dress code and child policy are adhered to and guests with children are asked to use the lounge on the 4th floor. :D We took breakfast in the restaurant which was excellent and included ice cream! All members of staff we met, from front of house to waitstaff in the restaurant were exemplary, being both friendly and efficient. Pre- stay emails were answered promptly and all requests granted.

title: Excellent base while in Singapore
desc: Stayed for several nights and for the most part, was a very enjoyable stay. Rooms are very comfortable and was lucky enough to get river/gardens view. Cant fault the hotel for cleanliness as every thing was immaculate and polished. Taxis frequently 'overshoot' the entrance but has underground rail within minutes of front door. Concierge staff were some of the best I have seen anywhere. Helpful, informative, willing to go the extra mile, and offered up some great suggestions of food, venues and transport. Unfortunately staff at reception, restaurant and executive lounge, while I found them very professional, lacked any rapport. While I understand this appeals to some, we found interactions to be cold, clinical and 'forced' politeness. They appeared scared to interact with

title: Staff & personality
desc: We travel frequently, always for pleasure. Like many travellers we have stayed in a range of hotels. However we always enjoy staying in a Conrad. The rooms are a delight and the little touches such as the bears are a great touch (and, like many, we collect them). However, good the Conrads have been, this one is by far the best. What has made this one stand out is the staff. From the concierge, to the check in staff, to the maid service, all have been excellent. The staff in the executive lounges on both the 4th and 31st floor are exceptional. A refreshing mix of professionalism and informality means that you will have have your needs taken care of whilst feeling truly special. Thank you to all of your for the truly wonderful Singaporean hospitality and we hope to be back soon.

title: Modern, comfy room and service with a smile
desc: Stayed at Conrad for 3 nights, what can I say, really impressed with the facilities and customer service. To start, stayed in an executive room with king size bed. The room has drapes and sheers that open/close with a simple switch, lights are bright and can easily be controlled near the bed. The bed and pillows are comfy soft, and just bring you to sleep. Washroom has separate tub and shower area. Loved the rain type shower. The fitness area is great with several equipment, weights, pull machines and even yoga mats that is beside the pool area. Breakfast is limited and could use a bit more variety. Customer service is excellent, from checkin/checkout, the lounge and breakfast staff are all happy to serve with a smile. Special mention to the asian concierge with the

title: Simply the best
desc: I am currently staying at the Conrad in an executive room with all the benefits of being a Hilton Honours member. I cannot fault a single element of service, location and comfort. The room, on level 26 has great views looking out to the fountain of wealth and Suntec City. It is 3 minute walk to the Promenade Metro station on the Circle line. Renovated rooms are lovely and a new executive lounge on level 4 is only 5 days new!! The pool area is fantastic and a great place to unwind after a hectic tourist day out and about.

title: Exquisite service with a smile
desc: A luxury hotel with their guests' best interest at heart. Chose an overnight stay to celebrate my mother's birthday and I had no regrets. From start to end we were taken care of by the incredible staff of Conrad. Special thanks to Duty Manager Shar Mayn for helping us to settle down on the first day and arranging the birthday amenities. The cake was delicious! There was a slight delay to access the 2nd room (booked 2 rooms) however Shar Mayn automatically offered a late checkout and I appreciate that very much. The executive lounge access was also a plus point. Room was beautiful, overlooking the Marina Bay area. Equipped with Shanghai Tang bathroom amenities and I also loved that the room had a plethora of mirrors. Sumit at the Lounge by the Pool is superb, he was friendly

title: Good standard higher end hotel
desc: Let’s face it, most 5* hotels in Asia are usually of a good standard and the Conrad is of no exception. The location of the hotel is great. It’s right opposite of the Suncity Mall so you can get all you possibly need from there including a range of eateries. Right by the mall is the Esplanade MRT station which can take you anyway in the city - though taxi ride is reasonably cheap if you cannot be bothered to take the metro. The hotels has very good range of international breakfast and guarantee satisfy your taste buds and fill your tummy. You can also walk (20mins?) to the marina bay if you fancy venturing into the over-hyped Samds and the luxury shops that’s that ‘compliment’ the hotels. They do have a chocolatier that’s worth a visit though - and don’t forget the Garden

title: Good central point
desc: We visited for two nights, check in simple, our room spacious with windows and seating to look at the view towards the bay. We decided to use the main breakfast restaurant where you were spoilt for choice with lots of fresh items including gathering honey from the honeycomb. As gold members we also accessed the lounge, which does get very busy. They have a mini buffet to help yourself to and drinks they bring to you. A reasonable convenient location where you can stroll to Raffles or the large shopping centre opposite called Suntec. About 20 minutes walk to the gardens by the bay, however there is bus stop just outside for the no. 97 if you struggle with the intense humidity.

title: Very good hotel and great location
desc: Single night trip into Singapore with 2 meetings in the Marina Bay Area and one closer to Raffles. Hotel is perfectly situated for either side of town and the team are top top. Would have loved to stay for longer and will absolutely stay again. Thoroughly recommend the Conrad Centennial even if my trip was totally uneventful.

title: Brunch of Sundays
desc: This is the second time I have sampled the delightful Sunday brunch session at Oscars which is housed within the Conrad Centennial Hotel Singapore. Feeling completely stuffed and satisfied after eating and drinking for 3 hours! As soon as we entered, the staff were so attentive and helpful. A banquet of different foods laid out, so much choice difficult to pick which to indulge first! I dived straight into the roast meats and veggies! Meats were succulent and juicy, variety of vegetables, different styles of cooking accompanied the meat on the plate with some flavour able gravy lashed on top. Next was a variety of curry and assorted culinary tastes. The seafoods of lobster, prawns, crab claws and scallops went very quickly with the wife. Numerous deserts, cheeses, pasta, bbq

title: Excellent Service and Location
desc: Our recent stay at the Conrad Centennial in Singapore was extremely pleasant. The hotel was very clean, breakfast was excellent and had a lot of choices. Concierge was helpful and provided information on local sight seeing. The pool is situated in a quiet spot so it was great for relaxing. The hotel was within walking distance of many sights to see in Singapore. The main stop for the Hop on Hop off bus was also almost across the road. Very happy with my choice to stay here.

title: Nice Hotel
desc: Celebrated my 56th Birthday at the place! My wife really surprised me with this treat!!! Wow!!! Can’t complain much about the amenities as they’re great. The one thing that could possibly stop me for a return visit would be this: shower and bathroom lacks privacy. Has opaque tempered glass but your silhouette can be seen. Imagine your are sitting down at the throne with your silhouette. There are no locks on the shower and toilet so you have to hold the handle door as you are doing your business. Imagine your silhouette as your Ate sitting on the throne and holding on to the handle as you’re doing your business. I can see and hear you......... You may also want to install towel hooks in the shower room. You may also want to consider installing a bidet.. My thoughts on the

title: Improvements that are subtle and effective
desc: I have reviewed this hotel before. Since that review, and my last stay a year ago, the hotel has undertaken some refurbishment in the rooms and a change of policies around the lounge. Both changes have been very positive. The good news is that what was good in the hotel has not changed. The wonderful foyer and entrance remain as striking and warm as before. There’s a slight growth in drinking space outside under the walkways, which is in line with everywhere in Singapore from what I can see. Reception was warm, efficient and I was in my room quickly. The quality of the staff was clearly as high as ever. The rooms are much brighter than before, the bed moved to a new wall, with enhanced TV, seating and décor. There are improved electronics, power (including multiple USB ports).

title: Short luxury break
desc: Loved this hotel and the time we spent there recently - Club floor is highly recommended 👌 Location is wonderful, staff were exceedingly helpful and courteous. Rooms were large for Singapore standards and well appointed

title: Great location in Suntec City
desc: I've been several times in this hotel. The location is superb - in Suntec City . There is a passage from the hotel through Millenia Walk to the Esplanade and to Marina Bay Sands area. It is worth to be a member of Hilton club. Ther is a very nice lounge on the 31th floor for gold members.

title: excellent - professional and always friendly
desc: You arrive in a ver nie bby, somebody accompanies you to the reception. There no queue, served extremelly friendly and in 5 min you have your room I had a very nice room, all you need in there. The airco, nearly no noise and you can leave it on whilst you sleep, no direct blast to you. Cofee machine in the room. Bathroom, very nice Breakfast all you need is there, and specialities just ask they will provide. Checkout as checkin, extremelly friendly and fast.

title: Great from start to finish!
desc: Everything about this place is great! The service is top notch. The rooms are great. Very tastefully, modestly decorated rooms. The rooms are on the bigger side and have very comfortable beds. Great big bathroom with great amenities. The executive lounge is on the smaller side but they do offer the best food I ever had in a lounge. Finally a hotel (manager) who understands that the food you put in the lounge should speak to the quality of the food you serve in the hotel restaurants. Guess where I dined tonight?

title: Great hotel and excellent service - great city view
desc: We stayed here for three days and the service is excellent. One of the best Hilton hotels we have ever stayed at - service was excellent, room is clean and have everything we needed. We had the executive lounge - we have requested for the marina view which we have but was a little disappointed as this does not reflect on what was advertised online. Pan Pacific and other high rise hotels surrounded the Conrad - therefore there is only a partial view of the Marina Bay Hotel and Marina Bay. However the night views of the city is stunning and I still give this a five star rating because of the excellent service and we also received other compliment services which was a lovely surprise. We had fruits and luxury chocolates delivered upon arrival and the next day we had

title: Great service!
desc: Stayed here few months back with my family members, and we certainly enjoyed our stay! We absolutely love the service provided here as the staff went the extra mile to make us feel comfortable! Location was great! We also enjoyed the breakfast with such wide variety for everyone! Just booked our stay here in May, and we simply can’t wait to stay in this hotel again.

title: Exceptional in Every Way
desc: I stayed at the Conrad Centennial Singapore several times many years ago when Singapore was on my work circuit, and always enjoyed my visits. When I returned in November '18 after a long hiatus, I was absolutely blown away by the improvements they have made. The rooms and bathrooms are modernized, spacious and exquisitely appointed. There are numerous amenities including plush slippers and robes. The room was as quiet as a mouse and I slept like a baby. The pool and deck are large and inviting; an outdoor oasis right in the midst of the booming city. The staff simply could not have been nicer or more efficient, particularly at the Executive Lounge, which is 5+ Star. The food and libations at the Lounge are First Class; this hotel goes all out for its guests by serving nothing

title: Always love this place
desc: The first time I came here in early 2018, I had lost my mobile before I came to Singapore so was unable to take photos. I loved this hotel then, I still do. A lot of people compare with this hotel vs Pacific but I prefer Conrad from the lobby of the hotel. I like the flow of the area, welcoming atmosphere, nice decoration and it has warm feelings. The reception is always efficient, don’t keep people waiting and they are very polite. I had a king bed the last time and 2 double? This time but the room was the same. I love their extra gifts such as a teddy bear, bath ducks, chocolates. I love the space and the warm feeling of their rooms. What I also appreciate is the socket. Being a Mac user, with an enormous socket/plug, it’s just great to have a socket on a table rather than

title: Luxurious
desc: Luxurious, spacious, and clean room. Bed is very comfortable too. Comes with complimentary bottled water, chocolates, mini teddy bear, and fruits. Big mirrors in the bathroom with bathtub and shower area. Love it! WiFi is free if you’re Hilton honors member, if not it’s chargeable at $12. Highly recommended!

title: Extraordinary
desc: This hotel was spacious and close to all attractions. Staff were gracious. Our room was spacious and nicely decorated. The subway was a1 minute walk. We enjoyed the executive lounge at breakfast and also the cocktail hour. All food was superbly prepared.

title: all the five star amenities you need during your luxurious stay
desc: Conrad Centennial Singapore is ideally located for exploring the beautiful city and offers all the five star amenities you would require during your luxurious stay. Relax in the plush and elegant guest rooms boasting city views and modern design, jump into the refreshing, large outdoor pool after a long day of sightseeing, or workout in the fully equipped gym. Upgrade to Club Access and take advantage of both Club Lounges complete with city views, delicious fare, and nightly cocktail hours. We loved the dining options on offer including the sumptuous buffet at Oscar’s with freshly shucked oysters, a Chinese BBQ station and a delicious made to order laksa station. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful throughout our stay and there was plenty of shopping and fun right on

title: Great view from the 31st lounge, nice renovated suite
desc: My 3rd stay at the Conrad and this time in the all new renovated centennial suite. Love the room, the Location, the free Flow champagne in the lounge and the fantastic breakfast Buffett. I do only miss the frozen yoghurt machine there 😜 thank for treating an honors Diamond so well.

title: Excellent Service
desc: This hotel is completely fancy, buffet has many choices with various types of Japanese, Chinese, Western. Perfect location indeed, it's opposite to Suntec City - very big mall with Fountain of Wealth which is very famous in Singapore; just 3 mins walks. It's also near to Marina Square, only 7 mins walks to there. There'are alot cafes, convenient stores, japanese restaurants around.

title: A Well-Deserved Oscar’s
desc: I stayed at the Conrad Centennial Singapore in November for business. I had breakfast at the hotel’s Oscar’s restaurant. The choices are many but I missed the Laksa. The place gets busy so I came early. I was excited to check the array of fresh fruits, breads, hot and cold entrees as well as sweet and savory dishes for a diverse palate. It satisfied my sense of taste and sight. And the staff are fast and helpful. Overall, I give it a thumbs up. It’s the Oscar’s after all!

title: it is S'pore! hard to find anything bad or wrong
desc: I love this Country where I go every year. A very special Country, no doubt. Death penalty for drug trafficking. Result: No drugs. VERY strict laws, and so very happy people everywhere. The Conrad is no exception. All the personnel is so efficient and attentive. Excellent Spa as well. Ask for a room in 31st floor. The lounge with free breakfast and drinks in the afternoon is in the 31st.

title: Warm and friendly
desc: Great stay yet again, efficient and friendly staff. I am a Hilton member and stayed on the 30th floor. Rooms are clean and I love the bathroom! Breakfast is busy and a little chaotic but excellent food!

title: Brilliant
desc: Fantastic hotel highly recommended in the marina bay area room was huge and bathroom is bigger then my room back home definitely stay here when i come back to Singapore staff are wonderful and will help you with anything you need

title: Small family staycation
desc: It was my husband and my first time booking this hotel for staycation to celebrate wedding anniversary with a baby less than 6 months old. It was baby friendly enough for us - baby cot can be provided upon request. To our surprise, the hotel gave a mini baby pack for the shower needs of my baby. The breakfast buffet spread and quality were good. Recommend to go early before the queue gets long. Complimentary parking available. The carpark is easily accessible at the basement of the hotel. Check in and out were prompt. The room looked like it was refurbished recently. Based on the recent stay at the clean and well lit room with good view, we would definitely go back again!

title: Prefer the Conrad over any other hotel when I stay in Singapore!
desc: Best hotel experience in all of Singapore for the price! The rooms are spacious, luxuriously appointed, and the staff is highest quality! Location is good, with easy access to the MRT and a great evening walk to the Marina Bay area.

title: Lovely hotel. Albeit a bit stiff.
desc: I had a lovely stay at the Conrad in Singapore. I was warmly greeted upon my arrival and taken directly to my room for check-in there. The room was nice. Spacious, clean and comfortable with a great view. They also had a solid gym. My only complaint, and why I might not stay there again, was that the hotel felt a bit cold, detached, and impersonal. It could have used a bit of charm.

title: A 5 star luxury hotel with outstanding service for business travellers
desc: Conrad Singapore has now become my preferred hotel when travelling for business or leisure in Singapore. The hotel offers higher end décor and design with a great range of food options. I booked a club room and was upgraded to a luxurious suite. I had a separate lounge area, bedroom and the biggest bathroom I have seen for any hotel in Asia. The difference in Conrad is also the service. On the level 31 executive lounge breakfast was great with a wide variety of food. The staff attended to offer food and drink all day. Evening canapes and drinks were also a highlight. The gym on level 4 is well equipped. The location at Suntec City is convenient for Marina Bay or anywhere else in Singapore. Michelle Wong made the reservation process seamless and the GM should be aware

title: Great service & fantastic location in Singapore
desc: My family and I had a one day stay in Singapore and wanted someplace close to the main sights of Singapore but njobot too far from the airport, the Conrad met our needs. Location:close to the Gardens by the bay, Marina Sands hotel. Cost about a $12 taxi ride to Orchard road. Check in: Friendly and helpful staff willing to accommodate our needs. Rooms: Very clean, modern luxury. We had the opportunity to enjoy their executive lounge which was very well stocked.I will certainly return for a longer stay.

title: Lovely but not as lovely
desc: This was my second visit to this hotel and was not as good as my previous visit, though still lovely. It was the front desk that had worsened. I told them this was a return visit and I received a cool welcome back. The room I had was lovely, but it was next to the staff service lift, which kept me awake all night. I complained and was moved. There was a comment about me being sensitive to sound. I told them anyone who travels knows the worst room is next to the lift. The breakfasts were lovely with lots of choice.

title: Fantastic hotel.
desc: Spent 3 nights after a very long 2.5 business trip that included Germany, Japan and Hong Kong. This was without doubt the highlight of my trip. Comfort, service and food was outstanding. Access to club floor on 31 and 4 was included and breakfast. Location is great with easy access to all major attractions. Highly recommend this Hilton property.

title: Great for top-tier Honors members
desc: We had used Hilton points to reserve a base deluxe room and learned at check-in that you can only be upgraded one level as an Honors benefit. We chose to pay the difference (approx $50/night) in order get a superior room that would qualify for an upgrade that would get us executive lounge access. It was money well spent. I love that this property offers a casual lounge on the 4th floor with pool views and a dress-code enforced lounge on the 31st. Children are not admitted into the latter. Oscar's does a fabulous breakfast spread, but crowding is a problem and big families dine alongside solo business travelers. The kids running around in the buffet area were very annoying, not to mention dangerous but I guess the management can only do so much. Notwithstanding we chose

title: Tiny bowls
desc: The hotel is located in the heart of central Singapore. Millenia Walk and Suntec City are two good malls right next to the hotel where you have plenty of food options. Cabs are plentiful and their are always Grab cars waiting around. The hotel is well-maintained and the rooms are on the smaller side but are clean & smell good. My only gripe is the size of the toilet bowls. The last time I saw a toilet bowl this small was when I stayed in a tiny business hotel in Japan. It's not befitting of a 5-star brand such as Conrad to skimp on toilet bowls. Funny thing is, I searched the past reviews in 2014 and someone brought this up to which management replied they would certainly address it at their next renovation, which I guess they never did since here we are 4 years later.

title: 5th Anniversary Staycation
desc: We did not know what to expect from Conrad as it’s nestled among many hotels and Suntec City towers. Was given bay view room and it was an enjoyable stay indeed which we can spot Merlion, a bit of Gardens by the Bay domes, MBS and Fullerton bay. The pool was simply designed but you can spot the Flyer from there. Conrad provided us with complimentary chocolate to commemorate our anniversary celebration. My son loved the little bear and rubber duck in the room. One of the best hotels with competitive rates available in the most accessible location. The staff were all attentive, friendly and approachable. Would love to return again!

title: Great Hotel
desc: Great hotel in Singapore! We were fortunate to get upgraded to an executive floor room. Very nice and spacious room. We experienced great service in the executive lounge. Wish we could have stayed longer.

title: Spectacular stay in every way
desc: What a wonderful hotel from the moment you encounter the delightful staff. Check-in was very pleasant and smooth, and I was lucky enough to receive a suite upgrade. The room was spacious with a very generous living space and a large bedroom. The bed was comfortable and the bathroom was spacious with a separate toilet. The staff were more than accomdating when in need of a late checkout due to a midnight flight. The pool and gym are top notch with friendly staff there as well. Location wise, the hotel is within the vicinity of many shops, walking distance to downtown and museums, and also close enough to walk to Marina Bay Sands for the evening. I will not hesitate to stay here again - 10/10.

title: Refurbished with well appointed rooms
desc: Had a pleasant short stay over at Conrad Centennial Singapore. Check in was quick and smooth, and soon I was in my Executive Room. I understand the rooms have recently been refurbished, however some parts of the hotel exudes its vintage charm such as the lift buttons. Nonetheless, the room’s earthly tones are definitely a warm welcome. I really like the long bench by the large windows and the curtains can be controlled by buttons just beside the bed. Note that the ‘privacy’ setting is also by the bed, instead of usually right after the room door. The bed and pillows were comfortable and the bedroom slippers are definitely one of the fluffiest I have ever tried. Power sockets with USB ports are aplenty in the room. The bathroom comes with a separate bath tub, rainfall shower and

title: Excellent service. Well worth the price.
desc: We were warmly greeted on arrival to this hotel which was able to accommodate our request for a free upgrade to an executive suite, even though only for the first 2 days of our 3-day stay. The hotel has 2 wonderful executive lounges, where you can have more or less 2 free meals per day. The one in the 31st floor is stunning, but crowded during the limited breakfast and evening food times. We grew to prefer the 4th floor executive lounge, by the pool, which was laid back enough that staff remembered our names and preferences. The room is stunning with great views of the fountain, the Ferris wheel and some of the city. The electric curtains and wonderful rain shower were great. My wife loved the plush slippers, though they were too small for Western men’s feet. Location is

title: happy to stay here again, still as good as ever ...
desc: Stayed here a few days this week and everything's as good as I experienced them during my previous time here. Received a cheery welcome upon check-in, which is always a good start. My room 1410 was great. Slept soundly in my bed. Lots of choice at the breakfast buffet - a great way to begin the day and keep on going. Always happy to be here for a return stay ...

title: Luxury and fine service, good location.
desc: Conrad Centennial is only about 60 meters from Exit B of the Promenade MRT subway stop. Although this requires a line change from the airport, Promenade has two lines that are very handy for sightseeing. (Note that 1, 2, and 3-day unlimited tourist cards are only sold at a few stations (not Promenade), including at the airport.) To get to the hotel, turn right as you step down from the escalator landing. Walk straight ahead, continuing past the Millenium Mall (with a Starbucks visible). Turn left at the corner, which currently has a franchisey-looking Koreanm, Tofu restaurant. After a few outdoor dining tables, you'll see the Conrad across a curved driveway. Watch out for taxis in both directions. (Like in England, "look right" first. This driveway is the only part of the walk

title: Beautiful luxurious city hotel
desc: Had a short getaway from the hustle and bustle of the city in a executive room. The hotel has just been fully renovated in 2018 and the rooms are modern yet classic which is not easy to be achieved. The long couch is great accompanied by the Kallang view. Amenities are from Shanghai Tang with a option of Temple Spa and Refinery (for men) which was a nice touch. A small box of pralines was provided with a small fruit bowl. For executive rooms, you do have a choice of breakfast in Oscars or Champagne Breakfast in the lounge, high tea from 2.30pm to 4.30pm and evening cocktails from 5.30pm to 8pm. Although the spread isn't very big, they do change 1-2 items through the session which is a nice touch. Service is absolutely fabulous with compliments to Garfield and Rafie and they

title: Singapore oasis
desc: We made a trip to Singapore and booked a two night stay with family through Visa Signature for the breakfast and late checkout perks . Location is in Centennial plaza which is near Marina Bay and two MRT stops - esplanade and promenade . The lobby was filled with beautiful Christmas decorations and trees. Check in was professional and courteous- even allowed us to check on one of the rooms early at 1230. The rooms were quiet, clean , spacious and had nice city views - could see the landmark Merlion. The bathrooms were spacious with a separate tub and shower . The beds were ultra comfortable and air con efficient. There was a convenient safe to use as well. The breakfast buffet at Oscars was amazing with both Chinese choices and western items with fresh fruit. The gym was

title: Great hotel and the right location
desc: Visited the Conrad during the Christmas period and the quality of service was at the highest level. Rooms are well maintained and clean. Pool and surrounding areas looked after well. Breakfast was amazing with plenty of options. Being a vegetarian I had many option which helps. Lots of sites walking distance and plenty of restaurants with many different cuisines right outside the hotel

title: The Best Hotel!
desc: I dont know where to start, i had a rocky few hours with my room and then Faye comes along (duty manager) and changes everything. Right from the second i spoke to her she made my stay so comfortable and kept me smiling which is not always easy! We had a great room with a view, the rooms are beautiful with all the right amnities. bathroom is lovely and overall the rooms were kept clean. So many little touches made the holiday, i was sick and they bought up soup, kids activites to keep them occupied, personal hand written notes, chocolates - you name it! It felt like a home away from home, and its really child friendly. Over all the staff were brilliant, they only downside was buffett for brekie was cold, but i could totally live with that as the service is great! Exec

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: Stay Report - 12/27 - 12/29 Location: The location worked very well for me touring Singapore.  It was nice having two MRT Stations (Esplanade and Promenade) within a few blocks and it was very easy to get cabs from here.  Speaking of cabs, it's a 15-20 minute ride from SIN and it costs 20-30 Singapore Dollars depending on whether you have to pay the toll leaving the airport.  There's a bunch of nearby restaurants and bars plus a lot of shopping in the nearby Suntec City.  Do note that restaurants seem to close by 9:30 PM around here. Hotel: I love Asian Conrads and this hotel fits ranks with the best of them.  There's a large lobby with a small piano bar, a restaurant that has outdoor seating and does breakfast and dinner and two executive lounges: one on the 31st floor and

title: Real 5 star hotel
desc: We arrived at the hotel after an intercontinental flight and the check in run smothly. Every thing worked perfect during our stay and we appreciated the service inte executive lounge very much. We will stay there again during our next visit in Singapore.

title: Enjoyable stay
desc: Excellent facilities and friendly, attentive personnel. The hotel appeared to be full and perhaps the wait for breakfast was a little too long. Coceirge won the day for being the most helpful we’ve ever come across.

title: Wonderful Hotel
desc: We stayed in the deluxe room which was spacious and very comfortable. Breakfast had a good variety. We had to que everyday for breakfast and would suggest that the breakfast time close at 11am instead of 10:30 during peak times, as some mornings we would only be seated after 10am leaving very little time for us to enjoy the buffet. The house keeping service has very impressive. My kids fell sick during our stay and we were greatly assisted at all times of the night for bedding changes, ice packs and whatever we needed. A big thank you to Conrad for this!! We enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back.

title: Christmas Night
desc: We were transiting through Singapore and spent Christmas night at the Conrad Centennial. Staff was amazing from check in to check out. We were upgraded to an executive floor room and enjoyed the Executive lounge for drinks and light snacks. The rooms are very comfortable, shower and tub and the bed was super comfy. The location was a 20 minute ride from airport and within walking distance of all the tourist sites of Singapore. Breakfast buffet was very nice with both Asian and western cuisine. I would recomment the Conrad if you are looking for some luxury in the heart of Singapore and at a reasonable price!!

title: Xmas holiday
desc: Stayed here for 5 nights from 28th December before traveling to Thailand. What a fantastic hotel, we had an executive room with a roll away bed for a 9 year old. The staff and service was first class, the executive room by the pool was excellent- free flowing champagne!! The pool area is fantastic with sun beds And cabanas. The Suntec area is also excellent for getting around by the Mrt rail system which is a great, cheap and easy way to get around. After staying in other places in Singapore, I’ll definitely be back again.

title: Amazing service with super convinient location
desc: my 2nd time in SG, it's really unforgetable. This time I was to attend my friend's wedding. I think of Conrad because of the location. It's just next to the MRT station (promenade). It's really easy to find. Suntec city is just closed by. We did some shopping there and there's a super market and restaurants. Our room is faced to the fountain of fortune. it was nice,and the staff at concierge were very helpful.

title: Wow!
desc: Loved this hotel. Fab room and view. Sons bed was not in the room on arrival. After phoning was sorted within 5 mins. Lovely breakfast and afternoon tea I. Executive lounge. Fab pool. Good location and we were given a recommendation of a great place to eat 'Satay by the bay. We will be back!

title: Check in terrible
desc: After a long haul flight we waited for 40 mins to check in. 3 x staff were checking in the same guests for most of this time....they seemed flustered and disorganised. There was no avknowledgement of us and 6 other guests waiting. The staff seemed to leave the counter and return several times while trying to organise checkins. We finally checked into our executive suite.....then went out for dinner. On our return...our 2 x swipe door keys did not work. We had to go back down to the checkin counter ...wait another 10 mins....to have. our cards changed. Not a great start. Suite seems nice tho.

title: I have the best experience ever!!!!!
desc: We went for a staycation with our two young children. The room that we were staying in was of a great size. It has a dining table which makes meal time a breeze! The amenities in the room are top notch and the quality of the items are amazing. Oscar's has the best and highest quality of buffet line. Dinner and breakfast were simply delicious that I wish I've has a bigger tummy!!!! YUMMY!!! The location is perfect as it is right opposite Suntec City which gave us plenty of choices as far as meals are concerns. Utmost convenience! As our children are young, the staff actually made an extra effort to ensure our stay is as smooth as possible. They ensure the children are comfy and entertained and they are very very patient. THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR THE WONDERFUL

title: One of Singapore finest!!
desc: One of Asia's fine gems! Great service, friendly staff!! Always with a smile!! Positive attitude, makes every stay special!!I stay in Hilton chain hotels over 200 days a year, world wide, and Singapore is always my best!!

title: Perfect layover
desc: Have a long layover in Singapore before going on to Indonesia.. this place is very luxurious in the marina area. The staff is very helpful and cannot do enough to make your stay enjoyable. The rooms are up to date and very clean. The executive lounge is outstanding.. the location next to the marina is perfect..there is abundant shopping and restaurants within walking distance. Will be staying here again on my return trip.

title: December Dawns
desc: An annual treat to end the year. This time, chose this hotel as it had recently completed its refurbishments and it shows, in the rooms. Friendly staff. Usual bear and duckie amenities with fruit and chocs. Bed is comfortable. Adequate bathroom facilities. Shanghai Tang Mandarin tea toiletries. Proximity to three malls. Lots of food choices. Glad to have returned after a decade. Still in good condition. From the room can see the pool areas of the surrounding hotels, as well as pockets of the Marina bay and the city.

title: Simply pathetic & appalling
desc: Two words speak best about the property simply pathetic. My suggestion- don’t even venture staying there. The level of staff courtesy and hospitality - 0 and if you could put a minus number it is -100. The local staff is appalling, rude, don’t speak a word of English. Completely un-empathetic to a guest’s need. No consideration for the guest what so ever. The srilankan and Indians there are lovely but so scarce. The Singaporean staff is abhorring. They can just disgust you with their indifference and care a damn rude attitude.

title: Good stay
desc: The room was nice and clean, had a comfortable bed and a great view to the bay. Also the diamond recognation was perfect, only the check in could be a little more faster. The lounge offers good food and drinks for invited guests. Unfortunately, I missed the breakfast because of the good bed.

title: Excellent
desc: Huge modern design room complimented with a big toilet. Staying on the executive floor entitled me to have high tea and evening cocktail in the executive lounge. Aside from the lavish array of food, what impressed me most was the service from the staffs in the lounge. The welcome, attention and willingness to please and make customers happy is possibly the best ever example of customer service I have ever experinced. Syukran made sure all our needs were met and ensured that we were satisfied. Will definitely stay here again.

title: Wedding Reception & Dinner
desc: Came for a wedding reception and dinner. Excellent ambience provided by the hotel. Nice cocktail and ballroom is very spacious for almost 30 tables. Food quality was very good. Top marks. Highly recommended.

title: Comfortable stay
desc: Great location for business travelers. Good service, friendly staff. Had a good room with the view of suntec & Singapore skyline. Breakfast could have more vegetarian/ vegan options. Express laundry service was efficient.

title: An amazing hotel ... highly recommend it
desc: This was my second visit to this hotel. It's excellent in so many ways. Very friendly and helpful staff. Luxurious rooms and beautiful decor. Convenient location with easy connectivity to various tourist attractions. A very memorable stay for us.

title: Nice location
desc: I had a short three day stay at the Conrad hotel and the room/ bathroom was neat and chic. Regarding the food, the vegetarian options were less but the ice cream dessert was really awesome. The location of this hotel is also good, with a walking distance to the Suntec convention centre and surrounding malls as well as near to the Merlion park and Marina Bay Sands.

title: Comfortable and friendly stay
desc: I was last at the Conrad around 2 years ago...and while the lobby is largely the same (and that’s no bad thing), the rooms have been given a bit of a makeover. On check in I was asked if I’m a light sleeper - I am - so that helped determine my room. I could have taken a king room with harbour view but it was right next to the elevator...so instead settled for a twin facing the city. Shame to miss out...but considerate to check when other hotels don’t. Good size room...the air conditioning is still a little noisy, and has a new ‘feature’ - you can only reduce the temperature by a certain number of degrees at any point...I couldn’t quite get my head around it....probably would have asked if I had been there longer than a couple of nights. Oscars restaurant busy and efficient

title: Top Class Service
desc: Good Location Comfortable,Clean and above all the service we received was above excellence. 1/ Check in/out a breeze-friendly and efficient 2/Lost a watch in Hotel Lift and staff, took great efforts to help me locate the watch and also track me down to the Ballroom where I was attending dinner to handover the watch. Thanks to all involved. 3/A member of my dinner party at the Ballroom was allergic to shell fish and he informed the wait staff not to serve him shell fish. Not only was his serve of food was without shellfish but replace with other specialty food -caring wait staff and supervisor No doubt the staff in this Hotel are well trainned and committed. GM Conrad -please pass this on to your staff

title: Staying at Conrad Singapore
desc: It was an amazing stay at the Conrad Centennial Singapore. The food, ambiance, hospitality, service provided were excellent. The staff was very polite and helpful. I stayed for 4 peaceful nights and couldn't leave the hotel without a handwritten Thank you note. I will love to stay again. And thank you for the small Teddy and Chocolates :)

title: Business at the Conrad
desc: Stayed at the Conrad for 2 weeks for intense work project. Had Delux Exec Suite with Club Room Access. Rooms were quite appointed with adequate items and all were working and modern. Food and Bev inside hotel and club rooms were good value for money. Staff very quick, happy and helpful. Check in and out was fast and a lot of desk staff as well. Beautiful foyer and decorations for Christmas were up. Pool and lifts great, clean and well maintained. Found a great array of restaurants and wine bars in the circuit around their precinct too. Morning walks around Marina Bay refreshing!

title: Conrad Singapore
desc: I have stayed at this Conrad twice. The staff is well trained and the service and rooms are great. The hotel is situated in a great location close to the Marina with a 4 minute walk to the MRT station. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Splendid Christmas Dinner
desc: My friends and I had the most memorable Christmas dinner at their lobby lounge. Lovely ambience and unique Christmas tree with bears. Special thanks to Mr Teun Engbers and his wonderful team for their impeccable hospitality!

title: Fabulous, fabulous service.......luxury too!
desc: The Far East usually has attentive service levels, but just sometimes it even exceeds the expectation. My recent 3 day stay in Singapore was enhanced considerably by the delightfully pleasant and considerate service of all the staff. As tempted as I am to mention specific names of those who were just wonderful, it might disturb the overall impression of this review to those not mentioned - everyone made super efforts which were truly appreciated. The property is also very comfortable and luxurious, but where would luxury fit into our landscape without the service. Well done, and thank you everyone. Happy holiday Season!

title: Perfect Stay
desc: Stayed here on 13 dec and 15 dec. Got a room upgrade to the Marina View as a Gold member benefit. Room was really good and spacious, you have your own bathup for relax. Buffet breakfast was amazing, plenty of choice, lobby style was elegant, a bit dark but maybe that's the style. The christmas teddy bear was exceptional to welcome you 😁 And thanks to Safiqah / Safina for the good service at the Front Desk.

title: Amazing hotel!
desc: I absolutely love this place! The staff is excellent, everything is clean and pristine, and the food is delicious. You’re steps away from a mall with lots of shops and restaurants. I would stay here again in a heartbeat!

title: Premium Comfort and Spaciousness
desc: Staying at Conrad Centennial for 5 nights. Two rooms on 10th floor (wish we had higher floor upgrade). THE GOOD. We got two rooms close to each other as requested. The room we have at the end of the hall has great views of Suntec City Fountain of Wealth, Gardens by the Bay, Marina Bay and Marina Bay Sands. The other room has an ok view of the Financial District and partial glimpses of MBS and the National Gallery Dome. The room is very spacious with a long seating area next to the large window. Great for looking out at the view. Plenty of storage space. Plenty of USB charging ports. Good-sized room safe. Large and sharp television. And the remote works great (which isn't always the case in hotels). Wide selection of amenities - all the stuff you expect of a 5-star hotel and

title: Nice club in good location
desc: Stayed for 4 nights. As a Diamond member got upgraded to a corner suite and had access to the club lounge. Breakfast in the club was ok but a little limited but evening drinks and canapés were amazing with hot and cold options, good selection of drinks and excellent service. My only comment would be given we are in Singapore there should be more focus on Asian food particularly at breakfast. The room was amazing and the bed was one of the most comfortable I have ever had the pleasure of sleeping in.

title: Staycation Highly Recommended
desc: Had a 3 days 2 nights stay with the hotel in Premium Twin Room. Excellent Service.Front Desk personnel who assisted us with the check-in. Housekeeping- Excellent Service. Awesome turn down service provided by the Staff. Oscar Breakfast was good but the variety of food is the same for both days. Probably they wanna to change different variety of choices. Only downside- booked Premium room was not allowed to enjoy the lounge services. Asked the reservation- mention that it is only given to Executive room booking ONLY.. Sad to say that even with normal Honors member it is not entitled. Probably the management can consider including Premium Room Guest for the lounge services will be great!!

title: Conrad Centennial Singapore
desc: Excellent stay and service. I've stayed in the hotel in the past, and I would say that the hotel has maintained or even improved the experience from that stay. Would recommend to anyone planning on a stay in Singapore.

title: Wonderful service, great HH benefits but dull room
desc: Service is absolutely outstanding at the Conrad Centennial. Staff could not be more charming and helpful. We had an executive floor room and enjoyed the wonderful 31st floor lounge for afternoon tea and evening drinks. We preferred breakfast at Oscars because we could sit outside and enjoy the warm morning air. My only criticism of the hotel is that I felt the decor of our room was very bland and didn’t feel luxurious for a top range room. The carpet was pale and looked a little stained - though that might be the pattern! I remember the rooms feeling much more glamorous last time I visited. Gym is great here and I like the pool set up. We used the pool lounge one night for a late cup of tea and it seemed nice - but not in the same league as the 31st floor lounge.

title: Luxurious stay
desc: I stayed for 2 nights in this wonderful hotel last January 25-27, 2019. I had an early arrival flight @ 7am so me and my friends explore Changi airport to kill time as it’s still early for check in. We took the mrt to the hotel on east west line and transfer to Bugis station and take the downtown line and got off the Promenade station and exit B. It’s about half hour or more which is very convenient if you don’t have much luggage and i paid $2.50 Singapore dollar. It’s about 10am when we got to the hotel, which i just try my luck for early check in. The lobby was beautiful with nice decor for Chinese New Year, i was greeted with a nice smile by Nik by the front desk. I was acknowledged for being a Diamond member and surprised that my room was ready. My room was on the 31st

title: Beautiful hotel with spacious rooms, outstanding service and great location
desc: We stayed at the Conrad Centennial Singapore three times over two months and enjoyed our stay every time. We found the rooms to be wonderful. They were spacious, with a very comfortable bed, a large, beautiful marble bathroom and good views. The service is what you would expect from a top notch hotel: outstanding. The location is also excellent. It is next to three shopping centers so there is a huge variety of dining close by. It is also close to most tourist attractions and a block away from the Metro to get to those that are a little further. There are two executive lounges, one next to the pool and one on the top floor. They serve a very good breakfast, with a chef station for egg dishes. Tea is very nice, and cocktail hour is fabulous. We will definitely stay here

title: Honeymoon stay nothing special
desc: After our wedding in the Philippines we decided we would honeymoon in Singapore and stay at the Conrad. Being a Diamond member and having stayed at this Conrad and others we were hoping for a nice upgrade or at least a premier view. We got nether. I had ordered two dozen roses from the hotel in a basket for my beautiful wife wishing her a happy honeymoon they were beautiful, the hotel added a tray of chocolate that said congratulations neither one of us cared for the chocolate but it was a nice thought. This hotel is showing some age but is still very beautiful and in a great location. The staff was friendly and the Sunday brunch was fantastic at Oscars. I loved this hotel when I stayed here on business but maybe it wasn’t the best choice for a honeymoon stay. Both lounges are

title: Great place
desc: Just a wonderful hotel with great staff. The rooms are huge and the fitment is very luxurious, it is in a perfect position to shopping and the harbor. Easy to get to from the airport and cabs are always available to take you around the city from the front door.

title: A really fantastic hotel
desc: This is a fantastic hotel. Stayed there for 4 nights in January 2019. It is located in a really great area. Just across the way is the Suntec City area with shopping malls and great places to eat. The Foutain of Wealth is just there also. Both with in a short 5 minute walk. Also nor too far from Raffles Hotel, although this was closed for reservations while we were there, but the Long Bar was open to have your Singapore Sling, as must when you visit Singapore. The hotel staff are friendly and very helpful. The rooms are spacious and very comfortable. There's a great pool area and fitness centre, but unfortunately didn't get the chance to use either. Would really recommend this hotel.

title: Awesome Stay
desc: Stayed at Conrad centennial hotel for 3 nights 4 days in Jan end . Awesome hospitality. Extremely efficient and polite staff . Beautiful property and Plush hotel with all amenities imaginable . Best location - in the heart of the city and all action . Overlooking Marina Bay . View from the room was stunning - be in bay view or the city view . Breakfast spread was as good as it could get . Freshest delicious fare . Concierge very helpful. Staff very attentive and courteous. I will come back and stay at Conrad once again and will recommend everyone to experience their hospitality.

title: Great location and efficient
desc: A hotel close to suntec, marina area with access to transport to most shopping and attractions Service and staff were very friendly and efficient. Both check in and out was hassle free and very helpful. Amenities were great, clean and well maintained.

title: The Perfect Stay and Great Location
desc: We had an amazing stay here for 3 days in January 2019 in a Club room with super views across City and Marina Bay (closest station Promenade) As soon as you walk into the foyer you feel relaxed and calm from the bustle outside. The service was really excellent and there was literally nothing we could have needed which wasn’t accommodated. The Club Room was spacious and very clean as you would expect and the staff were always friendly and professional. The one exception was our evening meal at Oscar’s which we would definitely NOT recommend. It lacked atmosphere, the food wasn’t great and as the buffet closed at 10pm the whole restaurant emptied out within minutes so it felt very rushed. One of us was quite ill after our meal which was worrying. We would highly recommend the

title: Great refurbishment
desc: When I visited last year the Exec Lounge and rooms were being refurbished - had another stay this January and as ever were struck by the superb staff and lovely facilities. A particular highlight is the Oscar's breakfast buffet. Treatment as a Hilton Diamond customer was excellent.

title: All about the service!
desc: Great hotel in all respects - room quality, location, amenities and service! All staff were extremely helpful and courteous and a special thanks to Mohit Samtani for his service during our stay. Will definitely stay again!

title: Awesome stay
desc: It’s so awesome that longed for the trip to Singapore next time. Arrived at the hotel a bit late, but everything is already and really feel at home. Maybe i will plan to travel to Singapore and stay at conrad again!

title: Consistently excellent hotel
desc: My partner and I have stayed at the Conrad several times over the past 12+ years and always thoroughly enjoy our stay here. We tried a few other hotels before finding the Conrad and there are admittedly a few more that we’d like to try but ….. the Conrad is now like “home” to us. What keeps us coming back? It’s the superb comfort of all of the hotel accommodation and facilities throughout for sure but, primarily it’s most definitely the excellent and exemplary service we receive. All staff, without exception are extremely polite, courteous, friendly, welcoming and efficient. They are a credit to the hotel and this makes it so comfortable and a pleasure to stay here every time we are in Singapore. I hope to return yet again next time we visit Singapore.

title: Not as predictably flawless this time around
desc: Diamond. Third stay at this hotel. I never thought I’d detract stars from one of my favorite hotels in the world, especially not now, after renovations and the addition of the business lounge, but on arrival, we were very firmly and clearly offered a refresher room by the person checking us in. When departing, this offer was rescinded (it wasn’t even our suggestion in the first place, it was the initiative of the person checking us in, and so we planned our last day in Singapore accordingly) and to our surprise we were only given access to the level 4 lounge, with horrible, screaming children everywhere. Zero explanation given. We ended up going to the airport several hours earlier than planned - very sour note to our last day. Expected much better of the Conrad.

title: Great hotel in the heart of Singapore
desc: This is a great hotel in the heart of Singapore, worth every penny of its price. The rooms are new, clean and spacious, the staff is extremely friendly and responsive. We did really felt well all the time and in all occasions during our stay. As for the hotel position, it is situated in the core downtown of Singapore with excellent subway and bus connections. (Although for an European visiting Singapore for the first time it might take a while until you understand how the myriad of shopping malls, subway stations and busses are interconnected. ) All in all, we would recommend Conrad Centennial without any hesitation.

title: Great views
desc: This was our second stop on our honeymoon , amazing service from the moment we arrived. Foyer was still set up from Xmas and the tree was spectacular. Once we checked in we were taken to our room by the lovely receptionist staff, shown all room requirements. We were 14th floor up with a view of the marina. We had a few little honeymoon treats which was a lovely gesture. Room was a great size, bathroom was lovely and amenities left each day for your use. Pool area was great and was nice to have iced water brought around while you lie near the pool. Great distance from the Singapore sights

title: Fantastic service
desc: Dropped into Singapore en route to Penang. Absolutely fantastic hotel with staff who really care. So much so, together with how welcoming the place is, we have changed our plans to go back via Singapore.

title: Good mix of comfort & Luxury
desc: we stayed for five nights during middle of January. The place is very convenient to important sites from a tourist’s point of view. Nice lobby, registration was painless. Rooms are very very clean with good lighting. Breakfast spread is realy extensive(see photos). we didn’t use the gym or swimming pool. Check out was easy. Every body was very helpful. We will come again. Note: There is no transport provided to airport but it is not far s$24-30.

title: Very nice
desc: Stayed 2 nights before a cruise. 4 star large business hotel. We had an upgraded room, about 400 square ft. Very nicely appointed. 24th floor great view. Excellent buffet breakfast with western and Asian selections. Very accommodating service. Great location near Marina Bay area. 2 minutes from big bus tours if you are a tourist. Would definitely stay here again

title: One of the worst Conrad hotels on the world
desc: As a Hilton Honors Diamond member i have been to lots of Hilton and Conrad properties around the world. This hotel by far is the worst Conrad hotel i have stayed at. The facilities were below par, rooms are okay, clean and adequate. Instead of offering breakfast in the executive lounge, Conrad Singapore has created a 'premium floor lounge' next to the swimming pool to cater its size and over crowding. The lounge is a disgrace for a hotel like Conrad, it has less than 15 choices IN TOTAL of food items. The lounge most of the time is completely unattended, with one grumpy waitress servicing around 20-30 tables.you want a coffee, help yourself or wait 20 minutes. Anyone can walk into the lounge and eat, as for the entire 3 days i was there, i was not checked or even asked

title: Excellent
desc: Great room facing the bay, great breakfast, great location, we walked everywhere, subway station close by for botanical garden, concierge provided maps and information, don miss Singapore at night, gardens by the bay and the fountains show!

title: Enjoyed my stay
desc: Nice, spacious and clean room. Staff were helpful and friendly. My children enjoyed their time at the pool. Only couple of minor issues which can be over looked as my children and myself enjoyed our stay.

title: Family visit with lounge access
desc: Great place to stay with a family. I stayed here with my two children, one is 14 and the other is 10. The rooms are very well appointed and comfortable with great amenities provided. We have lounge access which has been great. The staff are very professional and the service was excellent. You were able choose from a variety of dishes that were suitable for the whole family. The staff at the concierge were most helpful booking a tour to universal studios which was very well organised and we all had a great day. The staff provided maps and directions of the area to be able to walk to the gardens Next door to the hotel you also have a shopping complex with a good range of shops and places to eat. We did eat at the Chinese restaurant peony’s. The meal was quite nice but very

title: Great Location, beautiful hotel, attentive staff
desc: Wonderful hotel in prime area, central to everything with huge adjacent mall. Plenty for food options within hotel and surrounding are and adjacent to Big Bus Tour starting point. Very attentive staff with knowledgeable concierge.

title: Great place to stay
desc: The benefits of staying at Conrad are easy to understand- close to the mrt, close to marina bay and the gardens by the bay. It has lovely rooms large with good views, fast wifi, no plastic water bottles in the room and a very comprehensive breakfast selection. There are many restaurants and shopping places nearby. A walk to Marina Bay is easy 15 to 20 minutes along good pedestrian walkways. What is there not to like.

title: UPMARKET PROPERTY THRU AND THRU
desc: I arrived late from Kuala Lumpur and got checked in very quickly in a nice room overlooking the Marina. The room was very nice with a great work and relax area. The staff provided true 5 Star service and the Internet worked without any problems which is rare in this part of the world for a Hilton managed property. A very comfortable stay in the heart of the Singapore attractions and also not too far from Orchard Road.

title: Short family holiday
desc: Excellent hotel very clean and staff are excellent and very helpful. ideally placed in the Marina Bay Area very close to MRT station so getting around is very easy. Would recommend this hotel to anyone to stay in.

title: Great Hotel,
desc: We stay at this hotel after a cruise and can Recomended, it is beautiful, clean, everyone is polite attentive to your needs and if you need anything they will run to help you. We love our stay at Conrad and look forward to stay there again!

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Pros Great location Next to suntec city Next to many restaurants and malls 2 minutes walk to MRT station Spacious room and bathroom Soft slippers Amenities Shanghai Tang Water pressure ok Espresso machine Comfy bed Nice view Friendly staff Cons There’s a weird smell near housekeeping room The food can be better at the lounge The welcoming fruit bowl, fruits don’t taste good, mandarin oranges are dried Would like to thank Fazli Junior for the good service!

title: Great position
desc: We stayed in the club section with a luxury escaped special deal and were very impressed with everything the hotel had to offer. The hotel is positioned close to the MRT and a large shopping complex with a large number of dining options nearby although the food in the hotel itself is excellent. The club section offered great views and a very good selection of wines, beers and nibbles. The room was excellent, a great bed and pillows and a large bathroom. The service as expected was first class, a great option when visiting Singapore. The only drawback had nothing to do with the hotel as the local MRT couldn't sell a three day tourist ticket and we had to walk to another station further down the line, with today's technology this seemed out of place in a country like Singapore.

title: Very good breakfast!
desc: It was in business hotel in a business district across the street from a huge shopping complex. It was very convenient only a 3 minutes walk to subway and bus stops. Bars and eateries right besides the hotel. Sightseeing tours and hop on and off tour buses were available, just walk through the shopping complex. The thing that stood out for me was the breakfast buffet; the best Eggs Benedict ever! I think we stayed on the 22nd floor in a deluxe room and had a glimpse of the sea, but it was nothing spectacular. Overall, a good hotel with comfortable bed and pillows, conveniently located just a few stops to Little India and Chinatown and most major attractions. I would recommend this hotel.

title: Excellent Location and Wonderful Service
desc: We spent 6 days at the Conrad Centennial Singapore prior to a cruise last February. As diamond members we were upgraded to a beautiful room with a view of the Marina. Since we were celebrating our Anniversary there were chocolates and champagne in our room for us to enjoy. The Executive lounge was fantastic. We had breakfast there every day. They also had an afternoon tea plus snacks and drinks in the evening. The service in the lounge was the best. The hotel is located across from Suntec City and close to the train station. One has access to shopping, transportation and many restaurants. Great location. We truly enjoyed every aspect of our stay here and wouldn't hesitate to return.

title: Near Singapore Flyer, and Super Trees.
desc: Great stay. Staff was attentive and friendly. Great gym facility. Well appointed rooms and the value for the price is excellent. Arrived super early but the staff made arrangements for me to check in. That’s service! Like the night light feature. Will stay again.

title: Nice Hotel but with some flaws
desc: Stayed here with the family for two nights on the way to the Maldives we stayed in two Centennial Suites. Rooms were very nice good size and offered everything you would want for a 5 star hotel. The down side of this hotel was the club lounge, we had access due to the room class we purchased, when we first checked in we were told by reception staff that there was a certain dress code for the upstairs lounge, now that does not bother me but we were told that my husband and child had to wear long dress pants, no jeans etc. But when we get to the lounge most of the occupants were dressed extremely poorly, stuff that I would not wear at home let alone in a club lounge that is supposed to have a strict policy about the dress code. Also the food choice was very disappointing the

title: Colorful
desc: Love it here at the entrance you get a warm feeling that you’re entering Disneyland lol because of the colors, the ambience and atmosphere are amazing. Great room, good sleeping bed and the views from the lounge is also great. Breakfast was delicious maybe a bit too loud when the tourist groups are together. Will suggest the music to be reduced a little bit to create that chillrelax feeling. Otherwise I must recommend you stay here

title: Conrad Tokyo is better than Conrad Singapore
desc: We checked in as Gold member with my family. There I redeemed our one night stay using Hilton Honors points. They have secret scoring system how they should treat each guest at Conrad Centennial Singapore. Our experience was good not excellent. We tried Lounge Club for afternoon tea and breakfast. It was mediocre and okay but I could say nah. There I faced a double problem with evening drinks and a breakfast at club lounge on 4th floor. 1st problem with evening drinks..My family and I entered into the club lounge for members after 21:05 early night hours. It was closed but we sat down. Distraught anxied lady with Chinese background was mad angry at us and poked at us and told us to get out. We were confused because of wrong place to have evening drinks. Later we found that we

title: Business trip at a great hotel
desc: Enjoyed business days in a busy area, but hotel was quite and relaxing. Great service, wi-fi worked well, clean and nice. Short way to several shops, restaurants and bars. Would recommend to go to he area and stay at the hotel.

title: Outstanding Service From Check In To Check Out
desc: Apologies for the delayed review! From the moment I walked in to the moment I walked out, the service and hospitality was faultless. I was assisted by Intan N. upon check in, surprisingly I was brought up to my room for check in despite the check in counter being available. After she promptly went through the details of checking in I asked for directions to the nearest food court. She was able to clearly direct me towards where I wanted to go, for those who have not been to the Suntec area, it can get pretty confusing to navigate! The room was very spacious, the stand out feature for me was the wall length lounge along the window, it was relaxing to lay by the window watching the streets below. There was a small desk enough to do some brief work on the laptop and long

title: Fantastic Location
desc: My wife and I recently stayed at the Conrad Hotel in Singapore. The hotel is located within walking distance of the Garden by the Bay, the Marina Bay Hotel, the Helix Bridge and the Water Show plus many other places. There is a hugh indoor mall across the street, The room was fantastic and had everything including a small teddy bear on the bed and a yellow rubber ducky in the bathtub. The buffet breakfast was super. The staff is friendly and helpful in providing direction. This is a great hotel and the location cannot be beat.

title: 5th Stay, Great location to explore the city
desc: On the last visit, we were upgraded to a corner room facing the Merlion. Executive Lounge was good and had LP champagne, not something that was previously available. Dining at Golden Peony for the dim sums is a must for us each stay. Overall, service is good but can be improved. Still a hit-or-miss for us.

title: Not Over-the-Top
desc: You'll expect clean rooms, with great service. Was able to find a room for early check-in.Nice wide windows, soft bed, adequate channel lineup on the tv.Good bathroom amenities, except for the lack of a bidet.Breakfast was ok. The menu consists of 3-5 regional cuisines. I would suggest to do it for two mornings, then go out for the rest of your stay.

title: Still excellent!
desc: We returned to Conrad Centennial this February for the third time in recent years. Last time the hotel was undergoing some renovations of the rooms. This was now finalized resulting in beautiful rooms. We had the Executive lounge access which includes breakfast, afternoon tea and evening cocktails and canapées. Already last time the lounge had changed its concept for enening cocktail and canapees to be more refined. This was now taken even one step further, which makes this one of the best lounges out there for predinner drinks and appetizers. We were greeted in the afternoon upon arrival with a glass of Laurent-Perrier Champagne served by the very friendly and professional Ashwani. We had the pleasure of being served by him on several occations during our stay. We are looking

title: Singapore Conrad
desc: Very convenient location at center of the city. Easy access to subway train and starting point of many tourism bus lines. Excellent view of the worldbay but not able to see Marina Sands. Many restaurants nearby and suntech or sunway building also have manychoice. Staffs are very friendly and helpful. The 31th floor executive lounge has nice view of the city and bay but the space is relatively small. Love the omelette made by the kitchen lady.

title: Amazing
desc: This is a pretty spectacular hotel. Service, room and position excellent. This is a wonderful choice for either a quick visit or a longer stay. The hotel facilities are amazing and so are the staff.. nothing was too much trouble and the breakfast is fabulous! We stayed before and after our cruise and I would definitely stay again. The proximity to the Suntech shopping mall is amazing.

title: Perfect location
desc: Everything about this hotel is fabulous. The staff are all incredibly friendly and helpful, the rooms are spacious and luxurious, the breakfasts are among the best I have ever had in a hotel, the location is perfect for ease of getting around.........No complaints whatsoever. When we arrived, we were personally taken to our room and shown how everything worked. There was a bowl of fresh fruit, a small box of chocolates, a teddy bear tucked up in our bed and a duck sitting on the side of the bath! There is a control panel at the side of the bed which controls the lights and curtains. Also plenty of charging points and UK sockets. The bed was huge and very comfortable with a choice of pillows. Picture windows were all down one side of the room with seating and cushions for your

title: Still my favourite in Singapore
desc: 2nd time staying at this Conrad, love the reno. Really spruced up the place. Got a Deluxe King, which was plenty big with a view to the bay (partial). Clean, comfortable, etc., all the stuff one would expect from Conrad. Very good staffing level, and you can get help in whatever you need. Tried the breakfast at Oscar’s, I think that is my only disappointment. Food variety was good, and quality was good, but not great. That said, this is the only place you can get noodles, congee, and ice cream for breakfast! I will always choose and recommend this hotel when I am in Singapore. Thanks again!

title: Singapore
desc: Stayed 2 nights. Very good and attentive service. Excellent service up in the 31st floor lounge. Breakfast and lounge had a variety of Asian and western food but more oriented to western palate. Spacious and comfortable room with a nice view of the bay and city. MTR is a few minutes walk away and malls are close by.

title: Excellent Hotel and Good Location
desc: I had a wonder stay for 4 nights at Conrad Centennial Singapore Hotel. The staff was polite, friendly and courteous. My room was clean, well maintained and very luxurious. I would like to take this opportunity to thanks Jerry Chiew and Mohit Samtani for their exceptional service. They were very friendly and courteous to all of my needs. They showed pride in providing exceptional customer service.

title: A short walk to the Singapore Flyer.
desc: The Hotel is located within a 10 minute walk from the Singapore Flyer. The staff at the Conrad Centennial Singapore were so very helpful giving us directions to attractions, explaining the superb subway system, and booking some tours for us. The rooms are large and the amenities are plentiful.

title: Great family holiday in excellent location
desc: We thoroughly enjoyed our experience at the Conrad. The rooms and beds were excellent. Staff were pleasant and very helpful. The location of the Hotel was a big plus - walking distance to many attractions.

title: Perfect base camp for a quick visit to Singapore
desc: We stayed in Singapore for three nights before heading off for a longer visit to Vietnam. In deciding amongst the Hilton offerings in Singapore, we chose the Conrad based on its location and are very happy we did. We booked a grand deluxe room being offered through a special sale and were upgraded to a premium room. Service, amenities, room standards, and restaurant choices and quality were all what you would expect from this brand. The only minor nit I have to pick is there was no outlet for a shaver in the bathroom. I guess that's something I have come to expect. The reason the location worked out so well for us is we decided to utilize one of the hop-on, hop-off bus tours as a way to explore the city. The concierge suggested one of the companies which was based a

title: Good choice for family vacation with great location and services.
desc: We spent 4 nights at Conrad. Our room had a view of fountain of wealth with well-maintained. It was bigger enough for our family and sofa bed bigger for adult to sleep. The hotel was closed to Suntec city mall so we could easily joined duck tour and SIA hop bus. The location also near Marina bay and Garden by the bay too. However, breakfast queue was quite long. You should have breakfast before 8 am to avoid waiting. Staffs service also satisfied us.

title: Very Modern Hotel With A great Location
desc: We stayed at this Hilton Brand Hotel for three nights while on our way to Perth, Australia. We have nothing but the best to say about this hotel. All of the staff our amazing, very profressional, knowledable, helpful, and personable. I am a diamond member so we had Diamond member so we had access to the lounge on the 31st floor. Just an amazing view with great food choices for breakfast, afternoon snacks, and dinner. The hotel is only one block away from the On-Off Bus Tours. The front desk gave us a voucher for buy one day, get second day free, plus two bottles of water. We verybsblr go see the whole city in this two day window. The location is great, right across the street is upscale shopping stores.

title: Another great return to Conrad Centennial Singapore.
desc: It's always such a pleasure to return to this wonderful hotel. We stayed on the 24th floor in one of the refurbished Centennial suites - wonderful views, super comfortable bed and excellent amenities. We love the lounge on the 31st floor although it does get busy the service always remains attentive. Excellent drinks and great food too! As families and children are welcomed in the forth floor lounge it's a peaceful place to enjoy breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktails. Special thanks to Patel Jeit, Deepak, Baoli and all the wonderful staff who provided an excellent service!! Thanks also to Shar Mayn for ensuring our arrival was so well taken care of. We look forward to retuning later in the year.

title: A memorable experience
desc: From the moment we arrived to our departure - excellence! Every staff member did so much to ensure our experience was amazing. We arrived by taxi and received a very warm welcome and our luggage quickly and efficiently taken care of. There was no waiting to check in as we were immediately greeted and as we had purchased an executive lounge access room we were taken there to complete the check in process in comfort. The executive lounge offered spectacular views of Singapore and drinks and snacks with top quality service. The room is very comfortable with super comfy pillows and quality all around. Again spectacular views of Singapore with automatic blinds for convenience. The bathroom was amazing especially the shower. The location is very convenient to everything- MRT, shops,

title: Chinese New Year staycation
desc: Stayed at the hotel (Grand Deluxe King room) for 2 nights together with my wife and 5 month old. Requested for baby crib at check-in and they were able to accede to the request. Check-in was fast and the staff was polite. They offered a room with marina view and it was great (there were fireworks every night during that period). The staff warned us that the room was beside the lift and the noise might affect baby. But baby slept well for the 2 nights. The location of the hotel is very convenient. There were restaurants and shopping malls within walking distance. Room was spacious and clean. We visited the swimming pool but it was quite small. But again, we were not planning to swim. Overall, one of the best stay-cation. Definitely will come back again.

title: Excellent location and service!
desc: We had the opportunity to stay in the Conrad for 3 nights, We bought our deal through Luxury Escapes and was pleasantly surprised. The service was exceptional as well as all the amenities. :) Singapore is not considered as a cheap city, but our deal included drinks, canapes, etc that made Singapore more affordable. Do not hesitate to do the hop-on-hop off tour and Singapore Flyer. Almost everything is near by. We are going back to Singapore in future,

title: Great Hotel, Location and Services
desc: My room was large clean and very comfortable and the staff throughout were very welcoming and helpful. I didn't get to explore the hotel much but the breakfast buffet is meant to be the best in Singapore and I can agree that it's really good, lots to choose from and all fresh.
