Obviously I couldn't try the others but the Conrad's was good. Finally, I was flying out late at night so I was already checked out, but the hotel was really helpful and let me use the SPA to freshen up before I flew home, very nice!

title: Good sized rooms and good service
desc: Stayed for three nights in a premium room. Check in was friendly and efficient. The room was well sized with plenty of wardrobe/storage space. The safe is a good size - easily large enough for a laptop and other belongings. The bed was comfortable and the room has a Nespresso machine as well as a kettle. The hotel is within easy walking distance of many sights such as Raffles, the Merlion Park and Marina Bay. I would happily return next time I am in Singapore.

title: Wonderful Hotel
desc: Our stay here couldn't have been better! Friendly and accommodating greeting at check in . A spectacular large room with all you could want. Solid wifi. Excellent location for exploring the marina District. The rates are fair in this very expensive city. Highly recommended.

title: Luxury In Singapore
desc: We decided to stay at the beautiful Conrad Centennial as a stopover to our next destination ~ what a lovely stay we had (should have stayed longer). Loved discovering Singapore for the first time! The hotel is very central to transport, shops and restaurants. The staff were all very friendly and welcoming. Our room was very spacious and comfortable. The buffet breakfast was wonderful, with so much variety. We will definitely be back to see more of Singapore!

title: Exceeded Expectations
desc: Beautiful hotel, excellent service and great location. We arrived particularly early in the morning after stepping off a flight from Europe. Although checking in early, our hope was merely to leave our luggage at the hotel and return later in the day to access the room, however we were fortunate enough to have a room available to us immediately. The room on the 19th floor, was fantastic and more than lived up to expectations. There were some great touches that Conrad offer. The breakfast was standard hotel fare, and my one criticism would be that none of the food was particularly hot. Hotel is well positioned and we were able to easily walk in all directions to wherever we needed to go. We also went to Sentosa, and taxis were readily available. Would 100% recommend this

title: Perfect
desc: I was fortunate to stay on the executive floor with breakfast included which was great. In the evenings the executive floor had coffee, tea, and a lovely spread of food.. the location is perfect and most importantly the hotel itself was quite nice.

title: Singapore Vacation
desc: The staff, location and hotel are excellent. The room is spacious and in good condition. The location places you within walking distance of many tourist attractions. I have already recommended this hotel to friends as a place to stay for business or vacation.

title: Loved it, loved it, loved it
desc: We booked this hotel for 6 nights on recommendation from a friend and we were not disappointed. the hotel is within a barrier controlled area where there are also bars and restaurants (and very nice cars too) And then when you walk into the reception area the grandeur of the hotel is really felt. Check in was really good, with the staff pleasant. We booked an Executive room so we knew we got certain benefits, these were explained to us at check in (A photo is attached showing the benefits) We went to our room as it was after 8pm we knew we weren't able to enjoy the evening executive lounge privileges. So we ordered room service. We ordered 2 of the burgers, they were amazing, again we were not disappointed. The room was very big, the bed extremely comfortable. The view from the

title: Again a First Class stay
desc: My 2nd time staying at this hotel and again just perfect... Rooms are immaculate and the buffet breakfast is one of the best. The staff also bring it on with a genuine warm welcome. Pool area is quite and restful place to spend a couple of hours too.

title: Older Conrad - Needs updating
desc: I’ve stayed in a couple of the Hilton Conrad’s now and this is the oldest by far. I wouldn’t say it has the wow factor like the others Conrad’s when you walk in except the room price. The hotel is clean, tidy and the rooms are spacious, the bathrooms look a bit grubby due to being old and you don’t seem to get as many complimentary toiletries compared to other Conrad’s in the Far East. The breakfast and the executive lounge are ok again nothing exceptional like other Conrad’s I’ve stayed in. The pool area was clean and tidy but again it was nothing special. Lunch by the pool was very expensive for 3 sandwiches a soft drink and a beer was £69.90 😳 and I appreciate I’m in the Conrad but again this was over other Conrad’s I’ve stopped in. Being a Hilton Diamond member really

title: Perfect weekend escape from Thailand’s tropical island
desc: With daily direct flights available from Koh Samui to Singapore, the weekend escape to the city of Merlion become easier and faster. I chose to stay at the Conrad Centennial Singapore once again, as I have learnt that the hotel rooms have been recently renovated, and I would like to check it out. The result... The bedroom and bathroom have been upgraded - more modern with fresher look and feel - and I like it. Lobby and other area are still the same. Hotel in-room facilities and bath amenities are great, 5-star luxury hotel standard. Conrad Concierge App works well when ordering shaving kits and the wake-up call. Breakfast is served at the new lounge by the pool, with good selections of cold and hot dishes. Also, enjoy mingling with other guests during the sunset cocktail

title: Could be more Family friendly
desc: I stayed with my wife and 2 kids (aged 3 and 6). I understand that this is not necessarily the hotel's demographic, however I was still disappointed by a couple small incidents which made our stay slightly less pleasant than it should be. 1. The Executive Lounge (L4) - As Diamond members, we were hoping to be able to use the executive lounge in full, especially during the evening service. However the reception staff who checked us in told us that kids were not allowed into this lounge or the lounge on the upper floor. I understand that you may wish to restrict them from the upper floor (which was at full capacity soon after evening open), however I don't understand why they would be outright banned from the lower floor. Upon heading up to the upper lounge, I was then told

title: Fantastic refurbishments and great Executive Lounge
desc: Stop no. 2 for my mattress run was @ Conrad Centennial Singapore, which I've stayed twice pre-furbishment. I remembered this as a property which has an excellent Executive Club Lounge and good service to boot, but at the same time, rooms were a little dated. There was also so much talk about the atas reurbishments and of course for having 2 Executive Lounges due to possible influx of Diamonds. Was super excited to check it out! Location - Connected to Millennia Walk and linked to both Suntec City and Marina Square which gives one plenty of shopping and food options. Transport wise, the property has sheltered access to Circle Line's Promenade Station and has a bus stop right outside. Rather convenient for tourists. Prior to arrival - the day before, I saw that my booking for a

title: Great room, underwhelming service
desc: Great room, great location, great executive lounge; service was a little underwhelming, not what I've expected from Conrad. Service was slow and not as personalised, did not go out of the way/over the top to meet my needs.

title: Great rooms
desc: I have a seamless checked in experience and I stayed in room 2207 which I’m really happy with the view. The room came with a complimentary teddy bear and a rubber ducky, however I was disappointed the blue cloth bear is no longer given but was replaced with a bigger brown bear. The aircon is working well and quiet. The sleeping experience was good, bed and pillow is comfortable and the buffet spread at breakfast has a variety. The bathroom has two sinks and the toiletries is complete I only needed to bring my own clothes and skincare. They even prepare bath salt for soaking, would be great to have more salt in the one pack. The Suntec city mall is just next door for shopping and dining. I look forward to staying here in my next stay in 2 weeks time and hopefully I get the blue

title: Another Great Stay at this Singapore Hotel
desc: Travelled with a group of 20+ husbands and wives for hockey tournament played on the Padang (Singapore Cricket Club). The hotel has a great central location and the accommodation and facilities are excellent (as you would expect). But the sealer is the the staff - friendly and helpful and dealt with the large group with patience and smiles. Stayed here 2 years ago and returned - no disappointment.

title: Hockey 6's Singapore
desc: The Conrad Hilton is a perfect hotel for the road trip to Singapore for sport. The hotel is well located, walking distance to most places, close to Sunteck City Shopping centre, and a great place to stay.

title: Incredible Stay
desc: Loved this beautiful hotel which was close to everything. Directly across street from major mall which also is the hop on hop off bus terminal. Excellent lounges (one adults only) and exercise room. Excellent service.

title: A welcome return visit
desc: This was my second stay at the Conrad Centennial, but since my last visit 3 years ago, the hotel has undergone an extensive refurbishment. Rooms were just as luxurious but with more modern decor and finishes. Service at the hotel was just as spectacular from the moment we checked-in to the moment we were loaded back into a taxi for our return trip to the airport with a friendly reminder to check we had our passports and belongings. On our first night we noticed that one of the sinks in the bathroom had a plumbing problem so water was pouring onto the bathroom floor. We waited until morning to report the problem to Reception and within 45 minutes there was a plumber at the door. Problem fixed and we thought no more about it. So it was a lovely gesture and pleasant surprise to

title: Perfect staycation with family
desc: Stayed here for a treat to my siblings who visited singapore for a vacation. As a Diamond member, our rooms were complimentary upgraded to Executive rooms. The stay was wonderful. The lounge on the high floor and the pool area are great! Food selections are plenty. Thanks Conrad! You really know how to care especially Hilton members. You never fail to impress! See you soon again

title: Exellent stay once again
desc: This was my 4th stay at this property and it is consistently good. Yuki at the front desk was great and gave us a nice corner room with an excellent view. All the service from bellman to the restaurant was excellent. I would definitely stay here again and think about becoming a diamond member with Hilton.

title: Lovely Stay in Singapore
desc: Really enjoyed our 4 night stay here, the breakfast was brilliant , the complimentary afternoon tea was exquisite and our room was very comfortable. The staff were extremely helpful and knowledgeable about their hotel and the city. We really could not have asked for more.

title: Central Singapore
desc: Great hotel , great base as the central location provides easy access to the city either by foot , Metro , cheap taxis or even the on/off bus tour , Nice pool area and wekll lookes aftera s adiamond hh member . Club level excellent with great views over city but can get busy at times .

title: Consistently Superb
desc: I have stayed at this hotel many times over many years. (I have been a regular business traveler for more than 40 years.) Each time I stay at this hotel, the stay is so excellent that I think it will be impossible for the staff members to surpass my current experience on my next visit. But every subsequent stay, they do surpass themselves. I keep asking myself, "How is it possible for these people to continually improve upon perfection? What is their magic elixir?" After a lot of thought, I think it boils down to two things: 1)Superb people; and, 2)Superb management. Previously, I have commented in detail about the excellent rooms, pool, gym, restaurants and Executive Lounge at this hotel. This is a beautiful hotel in every respect. And its location is ideal as well. These are

title: New and comfortable room, excellent service
desc: It was a wonderful stay. Check-in was smooth and I was told that if I come back later (checked in at 12pm) I could get a room on the higher floors with a better view (which I gladly followed). I was shown to the gym changing room and given the chance to put on make up/shower/freshen up before heading out to the office (something I think would come in handy for business travellers). Customer service throughout was impeccable. The room itself and the bathroom was spacious and bright. The room had high ceiling and it was not a “long” room in terms of its shape which greatly boosted its comfort. Samsung TV - remote sensitive and easy to navigate. Free welcome fruits and chocolate. Breakfast was also incredible - a wide range of options. The only thing you might want do is to

title: Excellent Hospitality
desc: Received fabulous, warm, and friendly hospitality from Conrad staff. Well trained and performed over and above expectation. We stayed at executive premium deluxe room. The room was clean, modern, and well presented. I am guilty of not remembering the name of this outstanding staff, who has offered to help us at a nearby mall during his lunch break, when we were lost. Such a commendable act.

title: Great Location clean and friendly
desc: Had a fantastic stay at this Hotel. We were close to everything. Gardens, Mall everything is so close. The Buffet at the hotel for breakfast was so so good. Great assortment of foods. The bedding at this hotel was very comfortable especially after long flights

title: Always a good stay
desc: My wife and I stayed at the Conrad Singapore over the weekend. There is currently a cherry blossom display at Gardens by the Bay, which is a nice 20 min walk, more ideal in the evening. It is also adjacent to Millennia Walk and Suntec City, so there's plenty of things to do in the immediate area. Would recommend getting a bay view room nearer to the right of the hotel when facing towards the bay, as the Pan Pacific Hotel blocked our view of the bay area. I also feel that there can be a better system for returning of shoes after sending them for shoe shine - Conrad Singapore is the only hotel where I've experienced hiccups in the return of my shoes on multiple occasions. Otherwise a good stay.

title: Luxurious Stay
desc: The Conrad exceeded our expectations and was extremely luxurious. Staff was very accommodating and checked us into our suite right away. The room, pool and gym were extremely clean. I was very impressed with their gym. They have an attendant onsite cleaning up after use at all times.

title: Love Singapore
desc: Stayed here for 2 nights on our way home from Bali and have to say the hotel was lovely the exec lounge was very nice too we had breakfast and afternoon tea there and both were very nice. Hotel is in a great location to explore the city lots of sight seeing busses across the road but also lots of great things within walking distance. Great hotel in what is now one of my favourite cities!

title: Love our stay here!
desc: Had such a wonderful time at this hotel. Location was awesome, we got to everywhere we wanted to go within a 15min taxi ride. There’s a MRT station very close by that takes you straight to the Newton Food Centre. Staff was super nice and courteous. We came in on the 18-hour direct flight from LAX and they let us check in right away at 10AM. Love the little toys they left in the room - great collectibles! Diamond benefits were great, lounge has beautiful view.

title: Convenient Location, Luxury Furnishings but Issue with Wi-Fi and Housekeeping
desc: I stayed at the Conrad for one night following a cruise. The hotel is fairly close to the Marina Bay cruise terminal but due to the various surcharges on Singapore taxis (surcharge for pick up from cruise terminal, surcharge for prime time travel eventhough it was around 9:15 am), it was still about S$25 for the short ride from the cruise terminal to the Conrad. Only complimentary upgrade available for HHonors Gold status was a higher floor King bedded room but I would have to wait for the room to be vacated and cleaned. Instead, the hotel was able to offer a twin bedded room for immediate check-in at around 9:30 am, on the lower floor but exactly the same size as higher floor rooms so I chose the convenience of immediate check in over a King bed and perhaps better views,

title: Great Stay
desc: Had a wonderful stay at Conrad Centennial Singapore. Room was clean and neat. Executive lounge was awesome. Good spread of snacks with beverages. Excellent service from staff. Gile, Jenny, Ivy, Mark and those who stationed at level 31 and level 4. Thanks.

title: Floor 31 happy hours
desc: Nice suite 7th floor, pillow menu in room, huge shower head, excellent happy hour and views private lounges on 31st floor , 😎 perfectly prepared poached eggs and great service. Also includes the traditional teddy and rubber ducky

title: Lovely property, great rooms, shame about the executive lounge size
desc: It is a beautiful Conrad, beautiful lobby, nice reception staff we got our room on arrival in the morning. Very elegant place, the executive lounge is nice if you can get a table as it is pocket sized...Also Hors d’oeuvres and small plate items should be just that and unfortunately there are too many “filler” items (pasta salad and such...yuk) and virtually no Singaporean item. We were turned away twice by an officious employee, the second time we protested with a smile as it was our big day but were parked in a conference room which was quite sad. Breakfast was usually OK, nothing to write home about apart from the very neat and tiny breakfast chef, a lady who whipped delicious omelettes with amazing efficienciency and the impeccable table service. We were celebrating a special

title: Excellent service by Fernando from Conrad Oscar Singapore
desc: Dined at Oscars Conrad in April 2019 for my birthday celebration and once again,Fernando from Oscar Conrad delivered excellent service to me and he remembered my preferred seating area ,gave me a complimentary slice of birthday cake etc

title: Great Location - Wonderful Staff, however a couple of gotchas!
desc: Arrived tired and weary after 20 hours of travel from West Coast Canada. Impressive and welcoming lobby as well as reception staff. The first room that we were shown to was well laid out, however, there was a stale unused smell, especially from the bathroom. We were given another king bed room without argument, which was fine. We later discovered that the bed was so hard it was like sleeping on concrete. Housekeeping did try to remedy the situation, even giving us an $80 bottle of Conrad Room Spray, which was appreciated. We upgraded ourselves to the club level which included a number of complimentary items - wifi, food, drink, breakfast etc. The quality of the food in the main restaurant on the ground floor was better than we would see in many restaurants in my home city. The

title: Great trip
desc: The Conrad Singapore remains one of our favorite hotels in the world. The service was phenomenal. this was our 10-11th stay here. We are diamond members. They remembered our room preference, overlooking the Bay on the 31th floor. They made a bed up on the couch for my sister. Our room attendant was very attentive, took care of every request. My sister was not feeling well one morning and Linda brought her hot water with lemon and honey!!!! Our morning breakfast as Oscars was delicious. My husband loves their congee. My sister loved the pancakes with chattily creme.. I loved everything. As diamond members, we had access to the executive lounge, the food in the afternoon and evening exceeded our expectations. They had Hendrix gin, which is one of my favorites as well

title: Buffet dinner
desc: Went Conrad for buffet dinner celebrate my good friend birthday. International buffet but non halal. Place a bit small, food varieties also not much. However, taste not bad. The pasty is good. This normally is the weak point for most hotel buffet restaurant.

title: Business trip to the Singapore
desc: Hotel is absolutely amazing. Entire staff was so friendly, courteous, and helpful. Such a beautiful facility and the staff really takes care of you. One of the best facilities I have ever stayed at and everything to see or do is just a very short cab drive away. I highly recommend this facility to anyone traveling to Singapore.

title: worry free stay
desc: Stayed for 6 nights. My room has a view of the Singapore flyer, and a glimpse of the Gardens by the Bay. Great location! Just a very short walk away from MRT and bus stations, Suntec and Millenia Walk. I just wish they change their daily breakfast menu once in a while :)

title: Attention: No kids allowed in 31st floor exec lounge
desc: This hotel seems to have issues with the internal communication: My wife, my son and I had suite check for diamond members. The lady performing the check in also pointed out the benefits and the nice views of the exec lounge in the 31st floor. When we then went to the exec lounge we were not admitted, because they only allow kids older than 12. Why did the lady performing the check in not tell us in the first place instead of pointing out the bemefits if the exec lounge in the presence of my 9 year old son? We then were complimented to a Family lounge on the 4th floor and immediately left, because it was im the style of a cafeteria of a 3star resort. Our suite was ok, but by far not high the standard of other hotels of the Hilton group.

title: Rooms arrangement
desc: My family of a total of 9 booked 3 rooms in the coming Easter holidays. I sent an email to them asking for arranging the 3 rooms on the same floor if possible and to add rollaway beds in some rooms. Disappointingly, they only told me the extra cost of adding rollaway beds but didn't address my other requests. The impression is they care money more than the satisfaction of guests.

title: Unbeatable
desc: We are just finishing a glass of champagne in the club lounge on the 31st floor we’re we have just spent the last 9 days in and out ,enjoying superb service and amazing food and choices of drinks available,a very big thanks to Deepak our main man ,and Penny geet and garlie they have been fantastic and a credit to the hotel ,chefs at breakfast and evening are great and food been exceptional,then the hotel,room 24th floor amazing,reception top class ,hotel just has everything you want in a perfect location

title: Luxury Escapes package great value!
desc: We bought a 3 night Luxury Escapes package to stay at the CCS, it was excellent value. We had a lovely room on the 30th floor, great views. The club lounge was well used by us, and the house sauvignon blanc (french) they served was really good and I'm pretty fussy about wine. Our package included a 5 course set menu dinner for 2 at The Golden Peony, what fantastic food and service! It was truly wonderful to eat chinese food prepared so beautifully and with such a light hand, no MSG in sight! Every course was a delight. The hotel staff were truly wonderful and super efficient, nothing was too much trouble. The gym was well equipped and not too busy in the early mornings. Good location, and just a quick cab (and cheap!) ride to Orchard Road.

title: A definite favorite
desc: We loved our stay at the Conrad Centennial. We arrived on an early morning flight. We were given a room immediately and were asked if we would like a late check out the next day. As diamond members we had immediate access to the executive lounge, including breakfast and an afternoon tea. Breakfast at Oscars the next morning was wonderful. The hotel is well-located to enjoy the Marina Bay Area and the service is unsurpassed. We would definitely stay here again.

title: Wonderful Hotel!
desc: Great service ! From the moments you step into the hotel . All the staff member greet you and offer there help . Room is spacious. Love the welcome gift “ Conrad teddy Bear “ location there three shopping malls surround the hotel. One of the malls got great Foods court . No problem checking and and checking out . Love the digital Key application. No need to pull out the room card . Only thing is the internet service Kind of slow . I did sign up for the premier service . Only get 5-8 MBPS of download speed . Love the nespreso coffee machine in the room . Breakfast is great ! Huge selection of food from western to Asian . Truly a relaxing hotel after a long day of work .

title: Very nice lounge
desc: First time staying at Conrad Singapore, room is upgraded to premium king but I don’t know what’s the difference compared with deluxe room as all the rooms should be renovated already. Room size is fair, I requested a room facing MBS but it’s difficult to see it as there is another hotel just in front. But overall design and maintenance is good due to new renovated. The bear is not the new design one, when I asked they also said that they don’t have it, not sure how to get the new one. Executive lounge service is good, both cocktail and food is excellent. Probably one of the best lounge I’ve ever went. Swimming pool is also very nice. The location is very convenience, and there is a big shopping mall just in front of it. It is definitely a good properties, the feeling is

title: Great Service, Convenient but Somewhat Noisy Location
desc: I booked a premium king room with breakfast. I enjoyed my stay. Pros: ***Customer service was excellent. Staff was responsive to my requests and promptly dealt with an issue with my room. ***Room was spacious and nicely appointed. ***Location was within 2 minutes walk to MRT. Gardens by the Bay/Bugis is one stop away. Chinatown is four stops away. There are three malls nearby with food courts, a supermarket and a 7-Eleven next door where you can buy a tourist SIM card for cheap. ***Breakfast was ok. Given so many food places within a few minutes away, it's cheaper to eat offsite. Cons: ***Hotel is located across from bars that have licenses to play live music until 11pm, so I found out. The music was loud. I could hear it clearly from my room on the 29th floor. Given that I

title: Very pleasant and relaxing stay
desc: We had a short stopover over in Singapore on the way back to the UK from Australia. This hotel proved an excellent choice thanks to the good location, excellent service from the staff, huge choice at the breakfast buffet and the size and quietness of the rooms. The hotel was a short 20 minute ride from Changi airport. Every member of staff we encountered was friendly and professional. I really can’t fault this property and wouldn’t hesitate to stay there again.

title: Superb place to stay in Singapore
desc: This was our second stay and the service was as impeccable as last time. The rooms have been refurbished with great attention to detail. We had a 3 day luxury escape and loved every minute. It is just across the road from Suntec City and close to Marina Bay Mall. The restaurants at the hotel are excellent and also in the area around.

title: Brilliant as always
desc: Well worth the money, staff was excellent, we had our 15 month old with us and they made it really special for her as well. Breakfast was good quality with everything you expect, newly renovated rooms where cleaned and service staff was so helpful and friendly. Was my 3rd stay in Conrad in so many years and I will continue to stay there in the future

title: Always a great experience
desc: My wife and I always chose this hotel in Singapore as the experience is great and it is ideally located next to SunTec City, the metro, an easy walk from Marina Bay. The hotel staff is very helpful from the moment you show up at the door to check in. The rooms were recently upgraded and are now very modern with electric sheer blinds and electric room darkening shades. Great mattresses provided for the best sleep of my whole trip. One of the best breakfasts around.

title: Superb service
desc: As ever, the service from the staff was excellent and the refurbishment to the room s have improved the facilities in the rooms to match the service. Staff welcomed me back, and genuinely remembered me from my previous visits in 2017 & 2016. I’ll continue to always put Conrad Centennial Singapore at the top of my list when looking for accommodation in the Lion City.

title: Absolutely perfect
desc: I wish I could give this hotel 6 stars because it deserves it. The rooms were large and the beds very comfortable. The electric shades and curtains were a nice modern touch. The bathroom was wonderful--I loved the rain head in the shower.Staff attention was flawless from the moment we got out of the taxi. We were even able to check in early (at 11) and the bags arrived at the room before I even brushed my hair. The lobby bar is quiet and relaxing and incidentally serves a huge cheeseburger. Very tasty and more than worth the price. We chose an executive room, which turned out to be an excellent decision. It was supposed to serve a continental breakfast in the morning and drinks and hors d'oeuvres at night. The breakfast was a mini buffet, including a lady who cooked eggs to

title: A must stay hotel
desc: Usually we choose a different place each time we come to Singapore but this time chose to return to the Conrad. We upgraded to the executive rooms to get access to the lounge on level 31 Their rooms are well sized. Bathroom is nicely set out. Breakfast is tasty and the service is great. The jewel is the sundown drinks and snacks on level 31. Amazing food,service and Laurent Perrier, or LP as the staff call it. This was a brilliant holiday. Our every need was attended to. We will be back.

title: Very good hotel - - location, view, service.
desc: This was our third trip to Singapore, previously we stayed in Marina Sands and Carlton. Marina was fun because of the pool on the roof, and nice view, but it felt very crowded. Carlton is in the city, close to Raffles Market place, but lacks the view of marina. Conrad has it both - it feels quite spacious and quiet but close to the action of the marina and 200meters from both a big Suntech mall and Downtown line MRT station. We were on a high floor with nice view of the water and downtown. Executive lounges on 31st and 4th floors were crowded on the weekend, but eased up during the week. In the lounges you are getting seated at a table, not like in some other places when one can just roam around and find the place oneself. Food was adequate, not very plentiful, but a decent

title: Fabulous staff who couldn’t do enough to assist you, definitely will be making a return visit
desc: Booked 2 nights with executive club access which provided really good value for money, however it was the stand out service from every member of the team which made our stay. We checked in at 0730 following an overnight flight and provided immediate access to our room, which was a very pleasant and unexpected gesture from the hotel. Every member of staff we met from the lounge to the concierge and the doormen were fabulous, helpful, polite and respectful. We felt like family members with the service of the team in the lounge. Room spacious, comfortable with everything you might need for a stay in Singapore. Great location close to the MRT, sun city and downtown Singapore. Without hesitation we would book this hotel again, and thank you for all you attentiveness team CC

title: Return after 5 months for 3D2N
desc: We returned for the long weekend and still as pleased as the first time. Even better that they now provided drinks for pool users to keep us hydrated during the hot weather. Staff from concierge to reception to housekeeping were all friendly, greeting us and striking conversations. We were also given a room upgrade and the kid’s so happy with the bear (one of the reasons for our return as we had the blue bear). We were also provided with a bowl of fruits and complimentary chocolates. Definitely one of our FAVOURITE hotels for staycations. Although our room furnishings arrangement was a little weird with the bed facing the windows and not the TV, it offers amazing views of Gardens by the Bay domes and Supertrees, Bumboats and City Hall area.

title: Good experience!! Good helpful people here and quality accommodation
desc: Will start from the check in process until the actual stay. I arrived about 6am and as expected the room wasn't available because the check in begins from 3pm. I was offered a luggage storage facility and was kindly shown the shower facilities, etc. Being a Gold member, I had expected to be upgraded automatically to an Executive room but no upgrade was even suggested or offered. When I did ask, I got told that they don't have to offer any upgrade because I didn't book directly on Hilton website and instead booked via Expedia. But a small upgrade was given to a Grand Deluxe room. And a fresh fruit basket was sent to me on my first day. After a little tour of Singapore until 1ish I returned and the room was ready and my luggage was transported to the room already. Room looked

title: Great hotel with fantastic views from room
desc: This was our first stay in this hotel and we loved the entire stay. Reception staff (especially Catherine) was very welcoming and friendly, and helpful. Rooms were clean all the time and view from our room was fantastic. Morning breakfast good. They had a good arrangement of welcoming guests and providing them a sitting place. Lobby staff near the exit door was very friendly and helpful in explaining the right places to go and how to go etc. This saved a lot of our time. Will certainly go there again.

title: Enjoyable Break
desc: My husband and I had three days at the Conrad Centennial Singapore on our way home from a cruise. Arriving late at night check in was easy and quick. The room was a good size, clean and well maintained throughout. Service was friendly and efficient with breakfast included. We enjoyed the access to the Executive lounge for drinks and breakfast. Our included meal in their Golden Poeny Restaurant was so enjoyable we went back the next night and received a warm welcome. Hotel location is not too far from the wonderful Gardns by the Bay, a very short walk to the nearest train station and opposite Suntec City Shopping Centre.

title: It's alright but not what I expected
desc: It the first time I stay in Conrad brand and I have just checked in today. I have read very good reviews before deciding to book this hotel. Maybe due to my high expectations, I am actually disappointed with the experience I am getting and it is far below my expectations. I have read a review by teo2451991 on 13 May 2019 on Honors Gold recognition and he was upgraded to executive room. Being a Honors Gold member, I would expect the same treatment especially when it is low season, I am staying for 1 night checking in at 5pm and my stay is just 10 days apart from his stay. I have even contacted the hotel on upgrade availability and checked with reception and she confirmed I have been upgraded. When I entered my room, the room just looked exactly like the Deluxe room I have

title: Couldn’t falter anything
desc: Thoroughly enjoyed our 3 night stay here in a king sized deluxe room with city views and overlooking Marina Bay. Staff made us feel very special and we had access to the executive lounge where we enjoyed our breakfasts and many more complimentary extras. Great location and walking distance to Gardens by the Bay and Marina Bay and shops. Highly recommend staying here.

title: A Tranquil Oasis in the middle of the city
desc: Spent 3 nights at the Conrad while in Singapore with my husband who was there on business travel. Everything at this hotel was perfect from the room, to the staff, the Executive Lounge and the lovely scent of the air in the lobby. We enjoyed breakfast at Oscar's Restaurant one morning and were very impressed with the quality and selection of items. The only negative to this property would be the Spa, while the treatment was nice and the staff professional, the Spa is not a place to hang out and relax for a time before or after a treatment. Other than that, we were very happy with our stay and we would definitely stay at this property again. Well done Hilton!

title: Luxurious and centrally located
desc: Sounds like room were recently updated and they are beautiful and large. Bathroom was also beautiful and large. We had access to the executive lounge due to Hilton Diamond status. The breakfast, afternoon tea, and evening appetizers were delicious. We appreciated that the hotel changed the food selections daily. Location was very convenient for exploring Singapore. It was only about a 20-minute walk from Gardens by the Bay and Merlion area. It is also close to the subway. Bus from airport dropped us off right next to the hotel. If only Singapore isn't so hot and humid all the time!

title: Fantastic Hotel in the Heart of the City
desc: This is a Superb Hotel Located in the heart of the city, The service from the Tremendous Staff during our stay was fantastic. The restaurant boasts a Fantastic selection of mouth watering dishes and caters for all palates. Within Walking Distance of the Famous Raffles Long bar (Must See) and the Marina Bay Hotel and Gardens. A great place to stay whilst exploring this Beautiful City.

title: Getting a little tired now but still good quality
desc: Stayed here over the years as a Hilton Honors member so generally had great service and access to the lounge here. While its still a good place in a good location things have deteriorated a little over the years. Small stuff only like quality of food and beverage in executive lounge and the buffet breakfast does not have the same level of quality it once had. Great to stay if you get a weekend Hilton discounted rate.

title: Excellent Hotel In Singapore
desc: Just got back from staying at this hotel for 2 days while visiting Singapore. The location was very good. Close, walking distance to Marina Bay. The rooms were spacious and clean. The breakfast was very good. The staff is attentive to travelers' needs. Highly recommend this hotel when visiting Singapore.

title: Great Hotel in perfect position
desc: We stayed at the Conrad for 5 nights. A lovely hotel with everything you could want. Restaurants, bars, pool, gym and couldn’t be in a better position to explore Singapore. The Executive Club is well worth paying the extra for as there are so many inclusions. Just one piece of advice, this isn’t really a family hotel. Great for couples though.

title: Wow, Just Terrific
desc: I’m gonna have to give this hotel a five star rating because it’s fantastic, attentive, beautiful n a great location in the heart of Singapore. Yes it’s a long way from home but that’s the point of going on vacation. We had the traditional Chicken n rice the first night here and it was superb! Yes Gin is old fashion but it’s not really. The botanical nature of it makes almost healthy. Ok stretching it a bit. They had so many choices you’ll love it. Try Singapore, stay at the Conrad. No regrets.

title: Fantastic stay
desc: We took advantage of a Luxury Escapes package for our anniversary.Check in was so efficient and friendy. We where allowed an early check in and room upgrade. We where on the 27th floor and the room was fantastic. Large room, with bath and large TV, great view over Marina Bay. It was the small things that made our stay so memorable. The rain shower in bathroom, lovely bathroom toiletries that smelt devine.Plenty of towels, toilet seat that doesnt bang. i loved how the hairdryer was plugged in in the bathroom, so you could use it in there. I hate having to use it at the bedroom mirror. The standout was the staff. We where regulars at the Executive lounge and the staff where so efficient. They knew what drink you ordered and suggested new ones that i really liked. You never had to

title: Beyond expectations - customer service
desc: In the early morning hours of May 23, we checked in. I normally don't review hotels, but in this case, I wanted to point out customer service that went beyond expectations. We traveled on planes for over 23 hours, and arrived after midnight, which was the morning of 5/23. Check in was uneventful, but when we began to unpack, and put together the scooter which was folded up for travel, we noticed a bolt on the chair was missing. I went to the front desk, and asked the front desk person, if they knew where a hardware store was so I can go to in the morning. Without hesitation, she offered to call the maintenance/engineering guy to our room to look at it. Promptly, two young guys came, and helped me fix the issue with a bolt they found. I did not get their names, but they

title: Beautiful Presidential Suite
desc: This is my few times staying at this beautiful Conrad Hotel Singapore. This time round is different. I actually stayed in the Presidential Suite for 4 days and 3 nights. The room itself is so spacious and beautifully decorated. Just take a look at the pic below. Highly recommended if you can afford this room if not even the normal suite is beautiful too. This hotel is so luxury and great locations and close to Marina Bay Sands and Marina bay garden. Walking distance. The Executive lounge is beautiful and friendly staff. I would like to say big thank you to the staff mentioned for making my stay a memorable ones. The Executive lounge on level 31. Ivy Ng , Mark Estrella you both really make my stay so memorable and been very nice to me since i arrived. Roslyana so lovely to see

title: Excellent hotel with outstanding service
desc: We purchased a 5 night Luxury Escapes deal. This included access to the executive lounges and a 5 course dinner at their Golden Peony restaurant. We were given a king room on the 30th floor with great views - clean and spacious. Only a short walk up stairs to the executive lounge on the 31st floor (there is another lounge on the 4th floor but we found the 31st floor quieter with nicer views). The lounge had a plentiful selection of canapes and the champagne, red and white wine were of very good quality. The wait staff in the lounges gave top notch service - always ensuring your glass was filled. Dinner at the Golden Peony was delicious and they were very accommodating with our dietary requests. They even had a birthday cake for me which was a nice touch. We had a late departing

title: Great stay
desc: We enjoyed a lovely stay at the Conrad Centennial. The location is great. We like walking so it was a great base to walk to various places like Chinatown and the Super Tree Grove. Breakfast in the executive lounge was great. I was surprised to have an egg station. Executive lounge afternoon canapes and bubbly was very nice. All the staff throughout the hotel were delightful. Always prepared for a little chat and a laugh. As our departure flight was midnight we were able to get a very late check out then we spent a few hours by the pool. It was very relaxing. Great experience overall and would recommend the hotel.

title: Great stay, excellent staff.
desc: Thanks to the excellent staff at Conrad Centennial Singapore for a wonderful stay with my family. Great hotel. Excellent central location. Fantastic restaurants and lounge. Particular thanks to Jeet in the poolside lounge who ensured my G&T was never empty. I would certainly choose this hotel again. Highly recommended.

title: Great experience
desc: This is my 1st time stay at Conrad Singapore. The room is nice and comfortable. Had a wonderful check in during my stay by Linden, from reception. He is friendly and always with a smile. It’s really made my day. Kudos to Linden and his team (from reception). Will recommend to my family and friends.

title: Convenient,.Safety & Luxury staying
desc: It has an outdoor pool. I enjoyed swimming almost everyday. Multilingual staff are friendly and is provided for guest convenience. My room 803 was air conditioned and equipped a mini bar and a refrigerater. All provide slippers and a private bathroom with bathrobes.  Those staying at Conrad Centennial Singapore can enjoy breakfast each morning at Oscar’s Sidewalk Terrace. A wide variety of dining options are also found in the surrounding area.  within walking distance of the Singapore Flyer, Marina Bay and Bugis Street. Just 3minutes from the MRT station, Promenade. MRT is convenient and safety, so I used it may times to everywhere. Just 40 minutes from the airport by US＄2! Best hotel in Singapore!!

title: Great hotel
desc: We throughly enjoyed our stay, the staff are so friendly and the meals outstanding , we recommend you stay hear on your trip to Singapore. The bars and great live music and just a great place to unwind .We look forward to our next stay at the Conrad.

title: Good location - Excellent service
desc: Excellent location, within walking distance from lots of attractions and shopping. Hotel is a truly 5 Stars/Diamonds from service to amenities. Breakfast selections are excellent, choices include local dishes, Chinese,and western. Staff was very helpful.

title: um...It's just alright...
desc: The location is great, just 3mins walk from Promenade MRT station, very near of the city centre and most of the tourist spots like Marina Bay Sands, Garden by the bay, National Gallery Singapore within the walking distance. I stored my baggage at concierge in the morning before I check-in. After I get my room, FO mentioned will send my baggages “Right Away” which get me waiting in my room for almost an hour. And I need to give concierge a call for chasing my baggage which not quite ideal. That’s wasting a lot of my time for sightseeing. Room is comfortable but the design is too “standard”. not stylish and also feel aged. View from room is not very nice since it’s has a lot of buildings around and very near. Also, there have no upgrade for Hitlon Honors Gold member that's quite

title: Dining experience
desc: Had a meeting with clients so choose the Conrad. Clients advised that they were 40 minutes late, so decided to have a bite to eat - it was lunchtime anyway... ordered a Club Sandwich with no bacon - made it clear ... no bacon (I don't eat processed meats). Sandwich took 40 minutes to arrive, so now I had to excuse my eating in front of the clients, but it was short lived.. club sandwich served with bacon.... Profuse apologies from the server which was just embarrassing. I don't want any apology, just food served in a reasonable timeframe and served to order - too much to ask? well, at the cafe in the Conrad it apparently is. True Conrad experience - well done guys!

title: Excellent Stay
desc: We had a great stay at the Conrad! The hotel has a great location, excellent facilities (i.e. 24H gym, pool), and the best service. The staff were super attentive and helpful with our needs. We were really impressed with housekeeping and their attention to detail with their cleanup of our room. Everything was very clean and they organized all our wires/cords, clothes, and toiletries in an organized manner.

title: Excellent hotel at superb location
desc: This is rather an old building but deserved best due to its location and excellent products. Booked two rooms for family and they truly enjoyed the stays. Restaurant’s breakfast was wonderful with variety of choices, the same goes to their exec lounge. Well done conrad singapore!

title: one of the best hotels i have stayed in!!
desc: a short cab ride from the marina bay cruise terminal we arrived early and were given a room shortly after check in (about 2hours) the staff were amazing form the reception to executive lounge to the dining area!and the concierge and housekeeping! lovely ambience in the foyer ! excellent location close to helix bridge marina bay sands and gardens by the bay and many shopping malls we walked to all these attractions we also jogged on the walkway to these the room we were given was huge and well appointed and furnished we enjoyed the beautiful decor in the entire hotel very soothing and classy and tasteful! room had a lovely view of the marina everything was perfect ! i liked the little teddy and the rubber duck the executive lounge was also very good although at times

title: Luxury delivered with a smile.
desc: We stopped off at the Conrad for a weekend on the way back from Phuket to Sydney. We had booked an executive floor room which included access to the executive lounge. We were warmly greeted upon exiting the taxi and escorted to the front desk. Check-in was extremely efficient. We had a corner room on the 27th floor giving us extensive views of Marina Bay. The room was tastefully furnished and the bathroom well provisioned with all necessary amenities. The room was well serviced over the weekend. The fitness centre on level 4 overlooks the pool. It is very well provisioned with nil wait time for any of the cardio equipment. The executive lounge on level 31 provides great views of Marina Bay and the CBD. Breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktails are available in the lounge at

title: LOVED our stay in Singapore!
desc: We stayed on the 30th floor of the Conrad in Singapore and couldn't have enjoyed it more. The executive privileges came with breakfast on the top floor, afternoon tea, and evening (heavy) hors d'ouvres. The room had an incredible view of the city and the service was always fantastic. Breakfast had a wide selection of Asian and Western foods and also included fresh honey dripping from the hive, several flavors of ice cream including stretchy ice cream (my kids' personal favorite for breakfast!). Breakfast was also served starting early and going fairly late. We only made it to afternoon tea once and the selection was really great. Same with the evening snacks on the Executive level. The room was spacious and the shower was wonderful (rain shower head and regular shower

title: A classy hotel in the heart of Singapore
desc: My room was amazing with a spectacular view. The staff was friendly and courteous. There are many great restaurants within a short walk of the hotel. We didn't eat a the hotel restaurant but it looked fantastic.

title: Excellent Service
desc: My wife had a conference at Marina Bay Sands. We selected the Conrad based on quality and cost (in our case the number of Hilton points per night relative to paying either the currency rate at the Conrad or nearby hotels. We had a corner room on a high floor with a spectacular view. This added to our experience as we opened the blinds each morning.

title: Excellent choice for business trip to Singapore
desc: High class hotel, excellent choice for a business trip to Singapore. Located in Suntech City/Temasek. Plus: courteos service; quick check in & out; quiet, modern rooms with great view to Marina Bay; very comfortable beds; breakfast buffet with lots of options plenty of shops & restaurants within 5 min close by; tourist area Marina Bay (Esplanade, Merlion) in 15 min walking distance Minus: pool is a bit small

title: stop over on way home
desc: Great hotel couldn't do enough for us. We arrived too early but room not available till 2pm. After overnight flight in from London no energy to go out. Staff very helpful in trying to get a room for us, offering drinks and food while we waited. Hotel in great spot with underground across the road behind a mall which had lots of eating places. Buffet breakfast was fabulous. We had an easy walk to the giant ferris wheel. Great view over Marina Sands gardens and Singapore harbour. Also short walk to Suntec City - fabulous shopping.

title: Flawless, except for one thing
desc: Check-in was seamless, with smiling staff and a warm welcome. The room was excellent, except for one thing... Squeaky-clean room, with the Conrad teddy-bear already tucked into bed and the rubber ducky nesting next to the tub. The lounge on 31st floor is a welcome retreat after travelling or after long days, and again the staff were super-attentive and greeted me by name after having seen me only once. It may sound inconsequential, but these little things all add up to making a guest feel very welcome. Due to an ongoing dietary program, I asked in advance if they could prepare some unusual juices (think kale, cucumber, ginger, lemon), and they did. They were made to order, simply perfect. With great staff, impeccable rooms and enviable service, what's the one thing? The

title: Location, location, location
desc: The hotel itself is fine - it's a nice property with professional albeit not overly friendly staff. The rooms are well appointed and very comfortable. The executive lounge has a nice beer selection but is a little small given the size of the hotel. But the real reason to stay at the Conrad is it's location. It's next door to the mall and event center. It's minutes away from Marina Bay Sands and Gardens by the Bay. A much better way to experience Singapore than being stuck in Little India.

title: A standard five star business hotel
desc: Spent one night at Conrad. Everything that you would expect from an international brand five star hotel targeting business travelers. Room was adequate, breakfast was hearty. But I would not consider it a remarkable or particularly memorable stay....

title: Amazing rooms with a wonderful view
desc: Managed to get a corner room with a lovely bay window seat. Great bed and a lovely warm and woody interior. The room was large based on Singapore standards and the toilet was nice and spacious. Really enjoyed my stay!

title: Executive Rooms well worth the cost
desc: We had a lovely stay at the Conrad Centennial recently through a luxury escapes package. We were all adults and, after a couple of nights at a Sentosa hotel during school holidays, Conrad Centennial was an oasis of calm. The extra we paid for rooms with access to the Executive Lounge were well worth the cost. Instead of waiting in a long line for the Oscars breakfast buffet, on the second day we decided to try breakfast in the lounge. We were given a table straight away, a chef was preparing eggs to order, and the staff were wonderful. The rooms were large and the beds comfortable. I would happily stay here again.

title: What a great hotel
desc: Great Location, we stayed 3 nights, the room was spacious and very clean, the service was great couldn't fault the service. You had a great choice for breakfast, with very attentive staff. The staff on all accounts were very friendly.

title: ALL GOOD
desc: We had a three day "Luxury Escapes" stay which included breakfast which was very good and drinks in the business lounge. Our room was good with a separate shower which we like. Service was very good and the position also. MTR and a large shopping centre only a couple of minutes walks away.

title: Great hotel, awesome staff, perfect location!
desc: This hotel is by Suntec City which includes malls and restaurants in easy walking distance (1-5 minutes). I have been here twice, and both rooms had cool views. To top it off, it is right next to the Fountain of Wealth and a 6 minute walk to the main hub for the Big Bus tours. A bit pricey, but totally worth it due to the amazing location. You will always feel pampered by the staff. Jolene in housekeeping was my favorite! She took a few extra minutes to arrange my smaller stuff on a tray, and even put my sunglasses on the cute little stuffed bear that was in my room. Hilton Diamond members have access to the Executive Lounge on the 31st (top) floor, which has an amazing selection of hors de'ouevres and full bar, complimentary 5:30PM - 8:00PM every night. Tip: you are expected to

title: In a city with great choices, a great but unremarkable choice
desc: Great location - walking distance to many things (if you're prepared to get very hot). Property is not new and is a little dark and heavy in the lobby area but very clean and welcoming. Excellent buffet breakfast and a bunch of different bars to visit. Room was modern and fresh and organized to make the most of the views out over the city. Technology all worked. Gym large and best equipped I have seen in years. Pool good. All in all a solid, comfortable, efficient choice but not, as you've probably guessed, particularly unique or outstanding.

title: Sensational Singapore
desc: Stayed at the Conrad for 5 nights last week. Absolutely Fabulous stay and we hope to return. Facilities,staff, pool, location all so so good. We paid a little more for Club access and it is so worth the extra. Some staff from the 31st floor lounge who did more than I expect is required of their position and who are a credit to the hotel ; Jeannie, young girl who always had a smile on her face, enthusiastic and charming. Peng Yee Penny) I think a casual staff member but she was so professional in her duties that I thought she must have owned the Conrad. Fussed over guests to ensure they were comfortable, always attentive, just a superb people person. Putri, again a person who seems to enjoy their job.

title: One of Singapore finest hotels
desc: Set's the highest standard of excellence!! Dedicated professionals at all levels. As you step in to the beautiful lobby, and recieve the warm greetings by their wonderful staff, you see why there's a long loyal following of customers. They make every stay the true meaning of "welcome home."

title: Great Place to Stay!
desc: Definitely one of the finest hotel in Singapore, the staff is super friendly, located very strategic, and basically is within of walking distance of everything great about Singapore, and the pool was just amazing. Athough they should gave us better recognition as an Honors member (even the new ones), but overall great experience.

title: Great Wedding Banquet and Hotel Location
desc: The Wedding Coordinator Fiona provided us with a holistic and great experience, ensuring the entire wedding planning went smoothly. During the wedding banquet, the banquet managers Arripin ensured timeliness and orderliness for the food service. We love the hospitality which the hotel has provided us.

title: Exceptional Hotel with beyond expectation service
desc: This hotel is in a great location. The staff is extremely pleasant and professional. The cleanliness of the hotel and guest room was exceptionally clean. Staying at the Conrad made our Singapore experience an unforgettable experience. All staff members from the check in desk to the concierge to the staff in the executive lounge were beyond pleasant and helpful. When we return to Singapore we will be staying at the Conrad.

title: JUST ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️WOW!
desc: From the moment we arrived to our departure we were overwhelmed by the professional, friendly service. If this is what Conrad aspires to, they’ve done it. They could teach other luxury hotels a thing or two. Wonderful accomodation on the Executive floor. Quiet and friendly ambience in the lounge. Fantastic service (especially from Jeannie who is an absolute service ambassador) and delightful food, the range of which changed daily. Another big ➕plus for the hotel is it’s location. In the middle of everywhere! So easy to catch the subway or the hop-on, hop-off bus. The biggest shopping mall ever (?) is just across the road - if retail therapy is your thing. A totally delightful stay that really reflects what Singapore quality is all about.

title: Impressed by Conrad singapore property and staff
desc: I visited singapore with family from 1st june to 8th june 2019. Stayed 3 nights in Conrad singapore. It was a perfect stay in Conrad. Staff is courteous, location of hotel is perfect. All services are good. Best part is the staff of conceirge desk, i am highly impressed with them. Special thanks to Timothy (conceirge desk team member) who helps everytime whenever we meet. I want to thanks Timothy and recommend him highly to the Conrad management team. Thanks Anurag Sharma

title: Great location and facilities
desc: Conrad is located to a lot of shopping mall. Very convenient location. Service and cleanliness of the hotel is absolutely great and view of my room was stunning. Thank you for your great and efficient service during my stay. It was perfect everywhere i go within the hotel.

title: Wonderful Overnight Experience for family #StayInspired
desc: My wife & I had a very relaxing & wonderful overnight stay at Conrad Singapore with our baby girl. It was my first overseas holiday since our child was born. We arrived 6:30pm & Kanna's (porter) eagled eye spotted our mobile while exiting the taxi, saving us the grief at the beginning of our holiday Thanks to David Constantine, and my Diamond status, we were upgraded to a nice bay-view King Room (2822) with a baby cot waiting for us, together with welcome chocolate & fruit basket. There are ample USB & power sockets with international adapter for our needs. Good quality bathroom amenities with yukata and bathrobes, enhanced the hotel's perfect central location. The Millenia Food court just next door offer fantastic local food. We checked out the Executive Lounge on the 31st

title: Favorite property in Singapore
desc: This is my 8th trip to this hotel which is an indication of what I think of this property. While it may not be the shiniest hotel in the neighborhood, I love the feel of the hotel, room, the amenities, the executive lounge.

title: 100 marks for 100 years of hospitality
desc: Having been on various staycations, our stay at Conrad was indeed special and memorable. Check in was swift and smooth, and we have nothing but words of praise for the excellent service provided by all staff (from the concierge to the housekeeping team). Our room overlooked the Suntec Fountain of Wealth and the Sports Hub, and it was indeed a view to behold both day and night. Amenities in the room were well furnished and the hotel is also situated in a convenient location where you could access various malls. Congratulations to the organisation for their milestone and wishing them many more years of exceptional service in the hospitality industry! #stayinspired :)

title: Great location and fantastic staff
desc: This was the start location for our Far East holiday and it didnt disappoint. Prior to arriving I was invited to upgrade 1 level with a further guaranteed upgrade to executive floor (I am a Hilton gold member). I took advantage of this offer and am glad I did as I was able to enjoy a relaxed breakfast in the exec lounge and lots of complimentary champagne each evening. The hotel is near to the MRT. A high room is great - we were on 28th floor and had great views over the bay. Our room was large and very well equipped. Great TV, regular fresh water, large bed and well equipped bathroom with a good range of quality toiletries. We mainly dealt with the exec floor staff who were all brilliant. The reception staff answered every question we had, and also ensured we had a takeaway

title: Luxury Plus!
desc: We were lucky to have a luxury escapes package with amazing inclusions in the Executive Lounge. Staff so genuinely friendly & helpful. Great location, best best/pillow/sleep ever - so quiet. Great Brekky. Shopping centre the size of a city across the rd, other great food options outside hotel...I could go on.

title: Fantastic Family Stay
desc: Stayed here for two nights in June 2019. I reserved two regular connecting rooms for my family (1 King connecting to a double). As a Hilton gold I was upgraded to Superior rooms before stay. I previously asked for early check in and we arrived before 9am on a weekday. Our bags were whisked away quickly from the Grab and there was no line for check in. They were able to get us in to one of our rooms right away with the other being ready at 3pm. Considering the early hour, I was delighted. The upgraded room came with breakfast at either Oscars or 4th floor lounge next to pool. We also were given 20% off other F&B except room service and $20 credit towards laundry per night. Wifi was free as well. We had rooms 2112 and 2110 and they were great. The views spanned from the

title: Wow - Fantastic Hotel and Amazing staff!
desc: This Hotel was amazing from the time we first arrived until we left we received fantastic service from all staff. We checked in early not expecting to get a room but one was ready which was awesome. We had an executive room which was huge. The executive lounge on top floor was great but you needed to be early if you want a window seat in the evening, the lounge on level 4 was also great, less formal but still provided excellent service. There were chilled towels and water outside the hotel for joggers or for the weary and this was a blessing for us being first time visitors to Singapore. The pool was great and chilled water was provided poolside I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this hotel.

title: An Excellent Hotel in Every Way
desc: We decided to stay at the Conrad as we wanted to stay in the Marina Bay area (as opposed to Orchard road where we have always stayed previously) and friends recommended here. Its a great location, with an MRT train station very close. We bought an executive package giving us a slightly larger room on one of the top floors. The room was comfortable and well appointed offering great toiletries and amenities (robes, slippers, coffee machine) We also had access to the executive lounge where had breakfast daily, and sometimes drinks throughout the day, afternoon tea, and evening canapés. We also had access to a similar lounge, by the lovely pool. One of the stand out features was the friendly and helpful staff. Our only disappointment was the dinner we had at the Chinese

title: A Pleasant Stay in Singapore
desc: It is a pleasure to experience the comfort of the Hotel Conrad in Singapore. The hotel has a very nice location nearby the bay area. You can easily access to many places from the hotel. The rooms are very comfortable and clean. The daily room service is especially successful to make your room clean and tidy. The main restaurant of the hotel is also where you have your breakfast. The variety of the breakfast buffet is sufficient. You can find something from the Asian Cuisine as well as some food of international choice. The hotel has a outdoor swimming pool and some spa facilities. The staff is very helpful and nice. I also like the location and services of executive lounges.

title: Excellent Hotel near Marina Bay
desc: Booked this hotel through Luxury Escapes. This hotel has been recently refurbished. We had a deluxe room but had club room access with our package. The room was of a high standard. Very clean and comfortable and lovely bathroom. You have a partial view of Marina Bay but still a nice view from your room. Club room on the 31st floor was small for the number of guests. There is another lounge on the 4th floor which is more family friendly but for a club lounge people prefer the view and quiet on the 31st floor. This lounge needs to be bigger to accomodate but staff worked extremely hard to serve and help people with seating. Food standard was good and all day beer and wine. Service was excellent from all staff. Overall an excellent hotel in a good location of the.Marina Bay Area.

title: Working hard in a crowded market.
desc: Returned to the Conrad after a couple of years absence, been at the Fairmont, and pleased to say it has retained the quality and welcome I remember. Despite saying I was booked in an executive room I was checked in downstairs and advised as Gold I had been upgraded to an Executive Room? When I mentioned I had booked one the information paper was swiftly changed for another, just wonder if there is a difference in the facilities offered? Never mind room was good with, a sort of, view of the Marina. Spacious and well presented as one would expect. My only comment would be that the bench seating running all the way along the window wall was extremely uncomfortable, the lights under looked great at night, but I would much prefer an easy chair or settee to fall into to relax. The

title: Amazing Service and Great Location
desc: Conrad Centennial was exactly what we were looking for for our stay in Singapore. It was close to everything; with the Promenade MRT station across the street. A tip - when exiting MRT station, always look for exit B to get to the hotel since you can easily end up on the other side of the Suntec mall and a long walk back to the hotel. It took us few days to figure our way around the area. On our first day we purchased EZ Link cards and SIM cards at the 7-Eleven, one minute walk from the hotel. Being so close to the Suntec City mall gave us lot of shopping and dining options. We had an executive room on the 29th floor. The room had sufficient storage space and once we rearranged few things it gave us enough space to enjoy our 11-day stay. We did not like having the long sofa next

title: Simply perfect!
desc: Celebrated a bachelorette party here and it was just great! We all had fun, staffs were all friendly. Location was great too, just 5 minutes away from Suntec City. Would definitely recommend Conrad to my close ones!

title: Excellent stay with fantastic marina views but billing issues at check out
desc: After 2 nights at the Hilton on orchard road I moved to the Conrad for 4 nights ( Tue-Sat) last week and as a Diamond member had booked an Executive king. Check in was quick and was given a marina view room ( 3012) . The room was luxurious and well appointed with great a/c , electrically controlled sheers and drapes which when opened offered great views of the marina, the pan pacific hotel and a sideways view of thge domes of Gardens by the bay and the singapore flyer. The bathroom was well appointed and had turndown service each night. (,I could also get a few items pressed as a Diamond benefit)The gym and pool were excellent. The 31st floor lounge was excellent with hot and cold items for breakfast, including a chef making eggs to order , wonderful afternoon tea and great

title: Perfect stay in Singapore
desc: We spend 3 nights in Singapore at Conrad Centennial and were very impressed about the property. The location is perfect for daily tours, even walking distance to gardens by the bay or Merlin park. As a Diamond member for Hilton Honors, we were upgraded to a renovated executive room on the 29th floor with gorgeous views of the bay. We also used the Executive Lounge on the 31st floor, were there supposedly was a dresscode - or so we were told when checking in. However, much to our disappointment, the dresscode is not at all enforce. Board Shorts and Flipflops are allowed in the executive lounge. That‘s the only downside of the property we encountered. That the breakfast room is crowded in the morning, there’s probably nothing much management can do. At least, everything was

title: Relaxing Stay
desc: This was my first time at a Conrad hotel and what can you say? Everything about the place lived up to its 5 star status. The rooms were large and in good condition. My major requirement of a hotel is the bed because at the end of the day that is usually the major reason you stay in a hotel. The bed was just about the best bed I have slept in at any hotel in my considerable travelling life, large and comfortable. The Check in clerk was great full of information and a delight to deal with. Great effort Linden. We also had great service from the concierge staff, always very helpful and no request seemed to much trouble. A great stay at the Conrad. Would I stay again? Hell Yes.

title: Great location, wonderful staff.
desc: Great location close to an MRT station, several malls. The staff at Oscars was incredible, including Tweet, the day manager, who did an outstanding job. The facilities are very clean, modern, and aesthetically pleasing. Would stay there again in a heartbeat.

title: Almost perfect!
desc: The hotel property is in an ideal location. The rooms were clean, modern, comfortable, spacious with nice views. The lounge was wonderful as well. Olivia, Duty Manager personally handled some minor issues right away. The breakfast buffet was tasty with a variety of foods. However, 15-20 minutes of waiting in line for breakfast was inconvenient. Overall hotel is excellent! Will stay here again!

title: A Perfect Stay
desc: It is rare to stay in a hotel where you cannot find any negative issue to complain about or the slightest flaw in service, room amenities, or food and beverages. We had a room on an executive floor so as to get a larger king room with a good view. It also had a super large marble bathroom too with beautiful toiletries. The use of the lounge was the real draw for us, at which one could have an excellent breakfast in peace and quiet as it is adults only. Then there was the scrumptious afternoon tea service on offer, followed by evening drinks and canapes, which were so generous and extensive in choice that many people including ourselves made it our dinner! The staff deserve special mention for their wonderful attitude to guests. They were so helpful, pleasant,

title: Welcome retreat
desc: Our family recently spent 2 nights here on the way back from Vietnam and thoroughly enjoyed our time. The staff were very kind and helpful and the rooms with their pillow menus were extremely comfortable. This was our second stay at the Conrad and we were not disappointed. We will be back.

title: Good location, ecellent hotel and good value
desc: I like Conrad's, they are dependably good. Excellent room with great view. Good service from the staff and superb breakfast buffet. ONly donw side was the size of the breakfast room which did get very busy. The location os good within walking distance of many tourist sites and near the underground

title: Beautiful luxury hotel; wonderful view
desc: We really enjoyed our stay. Breathtaking view from our room. The rooms looked new. The club level was great for breakfast and evening cocktails. The buffet breakfast was really good. The service at breakfast was lacking though. It was always really crowded, but after staying at the Sukhumvit in Bangkok, they need to step their service way up.

title: Excellent hotel, service and location
desc: An excellent stay for two nights. All the staff were very friendly. Service and food choices at breakfast were excellent. Rooms were like new and very comfortable. Gym and pool also very good. Would definitely return.

title: Great Hotel
desc: I have stayed x 2 this year on business. Very good service and hotel. I left my bracelet and they found it. On my next visit it was handed to me! Honesty. The executive lounge is very good and the staff very attentive .

title: Beautiful hotel, excellent service
desc: A four-night stay here proved to be quite relaxing and rejuvenating. The hotel has an incomparable view of the CBD and the staff and service they provide is excellent. Any problem is quickly addressed and nothing seems to be too much trouble. From the lobby to the 31st floor executive lounge, Conrad Centennial Singapore manages everything close to perfection.

title: Everything is simply top notch
desc: Stayed at this amazing property as part of a quick getaway staycation for 2 nights. To say that it was a great experiences is an understatement. Everyone and everything about the place was just perfect, from the moment you checked in at the front desk until checking out to leave the hotel, there is just no service lapses to be found. Was especially impressed by the concierge desk for offering to take my luggage and even reminding me to collect the complimentary parking ticket when I told him that I drove. Such attention to details, simply amazing. The housekeeping team also deserve a big shout out for their efficiency and excellent service. Requests were quickly attend to and the room was spotless with all basic necessities topped up. Love those super fluffy room slippers

title: A great hotel and fabulous deal!
desc: Stayed at this hotel as part of a luxury escape package! The room was amazing with a great view. We got welcome chocolates and fruit in the room. The package included lounge access with level 4 for adults and children next to pool and level 31 for adults only. We had free alcoholic and non alcoholic drinks and food with scones for afternoon tea. A meal was also included so we had buffet as didn’t have smart shoes only flip flops! Breakfast was tasty. The smell in the hotel was lovely and you can buy a bottle of this to take home! Very good location not far to gardens by the bay in a taxi! A very lovely stay had by all the family just wish we had more time there!

title: First Time Business Trip to Singapore
desc: Amazingly friendly and helpful staff. Walking distance to everything. Nice and very clean room. Only opportunity - closet space. Would definitely stay there again for pleasure (or business). Concierge was awesome in helping with walking routes and directions to shopping/food etc.

title: Super location and great rooms
desc: Conrad is perfectly situated for meetings in or near Suntec. Nice buffet breakfast (a bit too busy around 8). Rooms are super decorated and if you stay high up the view is nice (I was on 17th floor). Pool area is a bit boring and without good service. Fitness is well equipped. Can recommend for business stays.

title: Never lets me down
desc: Have cumulatively spent months in Singapore for a combo of work and pleasure, and since staying at the Conrad Centennial it has never given me a reason to stay elsewhere. Given Singapore's relatively compact size and resultant short inter-city travelling distances, you could be forgiven for thinking that getting the location of your hotel right isn't a huge deal. Given SG's famous humidity, a 5 or 10 minute walk outdoors can destroy you if you're not used to it. Conrad though is 30 seconds from an MRT station entrance, and also literally seconds away from walking into Suntech Centre which is one of the best plazas in SG with a huge range of shops and restaurants. There's also plenty of other bars and restaurants sitting right outside the Conrad. There's nothing over the top

title: From the time I arrived till I checked out ~ everything is awesome
desc: Quality of the room is excellent, Not much TV channel to choose from. Should have option for music only. Food and drinks in room bar is too expensive. Breakfast Buffet is above average only. But my stay is excellent

title: Nice hotel, excellent staff, very caring people
desc: Nice hotel, excellent staff, very caring people. The property is very close to the MRT and to the Suntec shopping center. The rooms are big and the bed is very comfy. My diamond status was completely recognized. Would choose again my future trips in Singapore.

title: Excellent Room!
desc: My husband i booked a night's stay at Conrad in celebration of our good friend's wedding at the Pavilion. This was actually our second time attending a wedding held in Conrad. The food provided by Conrad was really good! Definitely one of the best wedding banquet i ever had. For the second banquet, we had high expectations. Our friend had their banquet held on the 4th level Pavilion. It was stunning! We loved the space and its floor to ceiling windows. We were lucky to have the fireworks view at night for the National Day Rehearsal. The food was as expected. It was perfect. We had a deluxe room on the 13th floor near the lift lobby.
