Fortunately there wasn't any noise throughout our stay despite being right outside the lift lobby. Our room was huge! The floor to ceiling in the

title: Not a 5 star hotel
desc: As HIlton Honors gold members, we have never stayed on a Conrad property before but decided to give it a try in Singapore. We thought the location (next to the Suntec mall and convention center) was ideal so we booked our reservations at this hotel for 3 nights. We were really disappointed the minute we arrived st the hotel. Our rooms were not ready (we arrived at 6pm), our connecting room request was not considered while assigning the rooms. The hotel front desk supervisor really tried to find the connecting room accommodations we requested but asked us to wait at the lobby until the rooms were cleaned. We approached the front desk to ask for internet connection and they told us to wait until the room was assigned to us. Kind of strange for the front desk staff to feel

title: Rude receptionist
desc: Very rude receptionist. If there is an option of no star, I will rate that. The service Level is worse than a budget hotel, and I really doubt why this hotel can be qualified as our contract hotel for the company.

title: Wonderful hotel!
desc: Wonderful hotel! everything was top notch: room, breakfast, service, sports, location. the hotel is expensive, but at the prices of Singapore for triple occupancy with a wonderful breakfast is a great option!

title: Plenty of helpful staff, location, luxury
desc: Had an awesome 3 night stay here. There were a lot of staff everywhere and all seemed to be busy, helpful and polite to customers and guests. We had 3 previous nights at The Westin Singapore therefore find ourselves comparing the executive lounges that we had access to at both locations. The Westin club we found to be more luxurious in its decor, setting and food range however we found that the service at Conrads is a lot more higher end, professional with a lot more staff. Staff at Westin club seemed friendlier yet at a high standard. I hope that makes sense but it really depends on your preference and what type of traveling your doing and your personality. I don't feel one is better then the other. Easy walk to bay gardens light shows, marina sands, bugis st, and 3 very

title: Back after many years
desc: Previously travelled to Singapore regularly and was a regular visitor to the Conrad. The place has been fully refurbished since I was last there, including the Executive Lounge. Service excellent as aways. Room - corner King Club - very comfortable and inviting. Both breakfast and cocktails in the lounge were very good. One special mention to a member of staff - the elegant lady leading the team in the lounge on the 31st floor on Thursday 11th July. What a gem! So efficient, elegant and wise. One good move post renovations - there are now two lounges at the hotel, with the one on the 31st floor reserved for those over 12 years old. Hope to return asap.

title: Big, sleek, and beautiful
desc: Beautiful room with a spectacular view in a great location. We walked to everywhere we wanted to go from the hotel. We spent two nights here and had a great experience. We also enjoyed the pool area and fitness facilities. What a great spot!

title: Luxury escape
desc: I have just returned home from the most luxurious and relaxing stay with my husband and 6 year old at the Conrad. We travelled on the luxury escape package with access to the executive lounge and a free restaurant dinner during our stay which offered fantastic value. The room was very plush with a nice big bath for our son. Huge variety at breakfast each morning and in the pool lounge where we dined most nights. The staff in both were wonderful also and went out of their way to meet the needs of our son in particular. Nothing was too much trouble during our stay. The level of customer service we experienced here will be hard to match for us in future. From check in to check out, we couldn't fault a single thing. Every staff member was very pleasant and clearly well trained.

title: Very new rooms in an excellent location
desc: Go for the executive rooms for the best experience! The hotel is surrounded by 6 malls all by walking distance. Lots of restaurants around too. The executive lounge on the 31st floor require you to wear long pants and covered shoes. The high tea from 2.30pm to 4.30pm is great too! The room still look very new from their refurbishment during year 2018. It is very clean and comfortable. The staff is very attentive and helpful too. Will return to stay when in Singapore.

title: Another exceptional stay at the Conrad
desc: Truly outstanding hotel located near the Marina Bay area. Close proximity to the Promenade MRT station and across from Suntec Convention Center and Mall. The staff at this hotel are very professional, courteous and efficient. Even the general manager is out in the lobby area ensuring guests are enjoying their stay.

title: Hilton Diamond Review: Nothing short of luxurious!
desc: First off, my thanks to the Duty Manager, Fate Hamid for seeing to my stay, from precheck in request to the actual checkin. Thank you the complimentary mini cake for my boy's birthday too! Her service does meet the expectations of a Diamond member like myself. The Suite is superbly furnished, with a gorgeous bath area (see official hotel photo). Afternoon tea consists of a small selection of scones, sandwiches, fruits and sparkling wine too. Evening cocktail is another round of light refreshment, in this case is drumlets, soup, fruits etc. The selection definitely pale in comparison to neighbours at JB DoubleTree. I thought this could be an area for improvement. The location is nothing short of perfect, being extremely close to Suntec City, Marina Square and right next to

title: Excuses, excuses
desc: I was a big fan of the Conrad Hotels until my experience in Singapore. The hotel is nice and comfortable, but the service needs much improvement. I spent a great amount of upsetting time listening to their excuses why they couldn’t do what I requested. Getting a cup of coffee or a fruit shake became a blood-pressure raising experience. I will consider other Hilton properties before going back to a Conrad.

title: Benchmark for all hotels
desc: Just like the title of my review, Conrad Centennial Singapore defines the benchmark for all hotels when it comes to customer service. Hate to compare, but my recent stay at another property in Kuala Lumpur could learn a thing or two from Conrad Centennial Singapore in customer service. Here is what happened : At about 2:00 am, a rattling noise started to emerge from the vent in my room. Needless to say, I was woken up by that. It took 2 phone calls and about 15 minutes for technicians to come fix it. And I had to be in a taxi by 8:00 am, which means breakfast around 7:00 am, which means wake up latest by 6:30 am. By no means did I have a good night's sleep and I was expected to be a presenter in an all-day seminar (9:00 am to 5:00 pm) that day. Luckily, I was not the

title: Go here for amazing gin menu and Singapore Sling
desc: We waited in line to enter the Long Bar, and decided to go somewhere else. We ended up in the beautiful lobby lounge at the Conrad Hotel. So happy we made the decision. We arrived at 5 PM when the gin happy hour started. Dozens of gin combinations from around the world were available for $15 each. We also got a Singapore Sling for the center of the table. also got great snacks to share. Staff was very friendly. Highly recommend!

title: Excellent on All Fronts
desc: I have just returned from a 5 night stay at the Conrad with my husband, son and his girlfriend. From the moment we arrived at the front door of the hotel everything was perfect. We had requested adjoining rooms and high floor which we received. The most impressive thing about this hotel is the fantastic staff. I could not say enough about how friendly,courteous, efficient and happy they all are. The rooms are big with everything you need plus a lot of little extras and nothing is too much trouble. If you are gong to Singapore I highly recommend this wonderful hotel with its brilliant location (MRT close and 5 min to Marina Bay Sands and the Gardens by the Bay which is only $10 taxi ride) 20 min for the airport and the massive Suntec City and Millennia Walk Shops just

title: Excellent location , Nice rooms
desc: This hotel has the excellent location, just adjacent to the Suntec City mall, and walking distance to the Singapore Flyer. The rooms are spacious and nice. Thank you very much to Miss Christina Silvano , Front Desk Assistant Manager for the great hospitality and care that we received. She made us feel at home in a country that we visited for the first time. Great customer service, Thank you.

title: Superb First Class Hotel
desc: We recently spent five nights at the Conrad Centennial, Singapore through Luxury Escapes with Executive upgrade package and we can’t speak highly enough about this experience. The hotel is first class all the way, helpful and friendly staff and in a great location near MRT. The Executive package exceeded all our expectations to make this a truly memorable holiday. Our Executive King room on the 28th floor was very comfortable, free Wi-Fi, bath and the best remote control block out curtains we have ever experienced in a hotel, plus amazing views of Marina Bay & Gardens by the Bay. We had wonderful buffet breakfasts with a huge range of choices from either Oscars or two other executive lounges. In the Executive lounge on the 31st floor every afternoon we enjoyed afternoon

title: Go To Hotel for Business Trips
desc: I always stay at the Conrad during my business travels in Singapore. The rooms are spacious and clean with great amenities. This property is all about the details from boxes of chocolate upon check in to fresh bowls of fruit after turndown service to the bath salts and rubber duck provided for a soak. It’s wonderful staying at the Conrad especially after working long hours at the office.

title: Simply the best hotel for a stay in Singapore
desc: From the chauffered airport pickup to the afternoon tea in the executive lounge - the Conrad Centennial Singapore was perfect. As a Diamond member, I stay at a number of Hilton properties across the world and this is one of my favorites. My only criticism and this is understandable due to space constraints, the outdoor pool is smaller than I would like; however, very large for the property.

title: 110% recommendation from a seasoned traveler
desc: I very rarely leave reviews for hotels or experiences, but was compelled to after my stay at the Conrad Centennial Singapore in August. I booked an Executive King room via the Amex Fine Hotel and Resorts program, which offered early check in, 4pm guaranteed checkout, breakfast each day, free premium wifi and $100 USD resort credit. In addition, the first night was booked with Hilton Honors points for a Deluxe room resulting in two separate reservations. When I arrived, the front desk staff was courteous and combined the two reservations into one allowing me to stay in an Executive King room for the duration of my stay eliminating the need to move my stuff into a different room. Also, they happily exchanged my large Singapore Dollar bills into smaller denominations. With the

title: First Class Accommodations
desc: The Conrad Centennial is an amazing hotel and the staff are all very thoughtful and friendly. From the time of check-in to the time I left, I felt that the staff anticipated my needs and tried to make my stay as comfortable as possible. The bell staff/concierge were always on point and greeted me everytime I was near. They were always ready to give me directions or advice. The room attendants were barely noticed, but kept the rooms immaculate. They provided water at turndown every night too. The breakfast buffet is amazing and should not be missed! I found less expensive hotels, but stayed at the Conrad to be safe. I was not disappointed.

title: Highly Recommend
desc: Chose to stay here to celebrate our 25th Wedding Anniversary and couldn't have wished for a better experience. Right from check in we were wished Happy Anniversary, our room was upgraded to a corner room and it was amazing..5 mins after arriving there was a knock on the door and in came a complimentary Happy Anniversary dessert. Our deal included access to the executive lounge which was sensational, great views, great service, magnificent food. We felt very spoilt 😍. The hotel is stunning, the floral arrangements were amazing and the Asian inspired decor just beautiful. We were so close to everything and when we wanted to book a tour the gorgeous concierge Grace was more than helpful. I would highly recommend this hotel and all it has to offer. Will definitely be back. Thank

title: Nice hotel but something is missing...
desc: Nice hotel at the perfect location. The room was great with the great view. Service was almost non existent,like stuff was there only physically. The lady at the reception who checked us in was very nice and I wish I could remember her name. Buffet breakfast could be slightly better, food was the same every day and mostly bland. Juice and water are never topped up.We stayed there 3 nights and managed to have a drink only when we had breakfast at 7am, other two days we were there at 9 am and there wasn’t any juice/water available altough breakfast is finishing at 10am. Very strange for Conrad hotel.

title: One of the most amazing Conrads on the Planet
desc: This hotel blew me away from the welcome drink at check-in to the Executive Lounge next to the pool. Every Hilton employee should come for soft skills training with the staff of the Conrad Singapore. This place does not disappoint at all.

title: Luxury on a business trip
desc: In Singapore for a short trio for work and managed to get a Luxury Escapes deal to the Conrad. Excellent room, amazing big bathroom and we had access to the club lounge which was excellent for both breakfast and end of day nibbles.... absolutely spotless fantastic hotel down in suntec area near marina... right by shopping mall and also MTR spot if u want to get anywhere like orchard road etc. Totally recommend

title: Superb!!
desc: Excellent hotel in great location. Very friendly and attentive service, nothing was too much bother from the moment we arrived until the moment we departed. We stayed in a suite on the 29th floor, a little extravagant perhaps.... but worth it!!

title: Awesome experience
desc: Stayed 3 nights with family in interconnecting rooms booked through Luxury Escapes. Great rooms and fantastic service. Food at Oscars is top notch. Hotel is close to the Suntec mall where we could do extra shopping and use the Hop on/off bus to sight see.

title: Awesome Service
desc: Stayed here for a night and loved it. Amazing service, well appointed rooms, great location, nice pool and gym. Would definitely stay here again when in Singapore. WiFi was really strong and the breakfast was amazing.

title: Excellent service
desc: Breakfast was great. Hospitable staff. Friendly and available to help. Executive lounge is very comfortable and the evening canapés are very nice. No real issues, apart from being refused an upgrade; I was in the executive king suite and there were no other suites available

title: The location is better for business travel than for a vacation, but the luxuriousness and amazing brunch were amazing
desc: We arrived to the Conrad after 2 weeks on a medical mission boat around the Atolls of Papua New Guinea, so anything with hot shower would have seemed luxurious to us. Each day was even better than the last. Everything was perfect. The views from our room were amazing. The brunch offered something from several nations.....all delicious. We caught the 1:30 am flight out of Singapore and were permitted to return late in the evening to use a room take a shower and change for the flight. The staff were all very friendly and knowledgeable.

title: Superb All Round in All Ways
desc: I can’t say much different than most of the hundreds of reviewers. This place is definitely worth trying. The place is beautiful all round. The staff are all very attentive and go out of their way to make your stay comfortable and memorable. There are so many small touches that just adds up to a top establishment. I used the pool which was very nice, all well kept and lovely seats and loungers etc. We were in Club Rooms which was a good generous size with large bathroom with all the modern facilities you would expect from a Conrad. We visited evening Cocktails a couple of evenings and there was a good range of food and refreshments. We ate breakfast both on the large foyer main restaurant and the club lounge. Both were good with nice choices and egg station etc. the Hotel is

title: Exceptional hospitality!
desc: Our weeklong stay this past August was the second leg of month-long trip throughout the region, and our stay here was absolutely glorious! We thoroughly enjoyed this property, its amenities, location and food....however, it was the service that impressed us the most. Details follow: Overall property: The lobby and open spaces are stunning, with clean lines, fresh flowers and beautifully tasteful decorative touches. The lifts were swift and readily available, as well as clean. Smiling, elegant staffers offering to help with anything at all. Terrific first impression, and it continued throughout our stay. Check-in: As Diamond Members, we enjoyed the privilege of checking in at the Executive Lounge. Here we had the pleasure of meeting Jane, who impressed us with her lovely,

title: Good location
desc: The location is quiet good. And the view from the room is also amazing. I like this place because you can go shopping in a really easy way. Of course you can get chocolate and a conrad bear with you, which is quiet cute.

title: Hospitality at its best
desc: Located near the CBD, this property has/ provides everything that defined hospitality. The staff was excellent ever smiling and helpful. The breakfast buffet was extensive What I loved about the property was the hospitality

title: Always a 5-Star Stay
desc: Normally I wait until I depart my stay to write a review – but this one is simple; “Stay Here”. A Fantastic Place w/Wonderful Hospitality. This is from the vantage point of a Diamond who stays at multiple Hilton properties world-wide and had numerous visits to Singapore over the years. This trip was with my beautiful bride to celebrate 36 Years together and we came to Singapore for the hospitality and food. Why the 5-Star Rating: Conrad works to deliver a high-degree of hospitality and ticks all the boxes deserving of the rating: Service/Hospitality, Amenities, Location and a strong delivery of customer service. If you can arrange for a room on the 31st Floor (Club Location – and get an even number room the view will be spectacular at night) would highly recommend it.

title: Lovely hotel; great location
desc: The Conrad Centennial is located by the Promenade SMRT and is only a 15-20 minute walk from Singapore Marina and Marina Bay Sands. The lobby is magnificent. A huge, high ceiling room, luxuriously decorated with a live pianist playing periodically throughout the day. Despite being very busy for Singapore National Day, check in was efficient and quick and our room was ready despite it only being 10:30 am when we arrived. The room was a decent size. Modern although fairly basic in the bedroom, which also had a coffee machine, sofa, table, dresser, safe, ironing board, and dressing gowns. The bathroom was very impressive - large shower with rain or shower head options, bath and double sink. The gym is very well appointed with a decent size outdoor swimming pool and deck area

title: Excellent service
desc: We spent 3 nights at The Conrad centennial with a luxury escape package. From the minute we walked through the doors, the service was 5 star. Every staff member we dealt with was fantastic. We had an upgrade with our package, to the executive lounge. This was great value with breakfast, afternoon tea, all day drinks and evening drinks and hors d’oeuvres available if desired.Once again service in the lounge was impeccable. Great location, great view from room. We also had dinner at The Golden Peony restaurant in the hotel. Also excellent but worthy of a separate review. Will definitely make this my place to stay when in Singapore.

title: Great as always!
desc: Here on the National Day weekend so check in took a little longer due to the large crowd. We got an executive room on the 31st floor which was very spacious, clean and had a great view. The staff were all very helpful and polite as well! Breakfast at the executive lounge had a decent spread and you can enjoy your food with a view. There are other perks that come with the executive lounge access which makes the upgrade worth it. All in all a great experience with Conrad; will definitely return for special occasions.

title: Top notch
desc: Spoilt all the way. Room was fabulous and clean. Fresh fruit platter topped up everyday. Nespresso machine. Good selection of toiletries. Room size was larger than normal and I love the general layout. You can really stretch out on the sofa. They offer a turn down service which I always love. Service was excellent. We went during a peak weekend but were still left with a great impression of personalized service. Food was great. Be it breakfast, drinks at the pool or lounge, even dinner at Oscars were all memorable in a good way. Lunch was fun. We had access to all the nearby malls. Too much choice. Merci Beaucoup!

title: Superb! Look no further
desc: Location - close to Suntec City, with a lot of choices for both food and shopping. Access to MRT makes getting around Singapore easy. Room & Service - check in & check out process was swift and front desk staff are friendly. The room is nothing short of fantastic. Cleanliness of the room was top notch. Housekeeping team was fantastic - from bottled water was promptly refilled during turndown, and new slippers to replace the one that was wet and generally keeping the room very clean definitely made our stay comfortable. The bed was super comfy, allowing for a good night’s sleep. All in all, faultless and will be my first choice when returning to Singapore.

title: Good Location
desc: Stayed 2 nights. Came to hotel at 6am and was surprised that we were allocated a room 2008, that early. Room was on a high floor & near the lift as per my preference, it was clean and well designed. It took a while to work out & locate the bar fridge. A name tag would solve this issue. Except for one obvious flaw, the TV was on one side of the bed. My wife, sleeping on the other side had difficulty seeing the TV across me. TiV should always be at the leg end of the bed. The light switches were well designed and easy to use. The curtain is electrically controlled which was a great feature. Bathroom towels and consumables were good. The mouth wash is an excellent idea. It would be good to include a shaving razor and an after-shave. The shower control for top and hand was not

title: Excellent stay with superb service
desc: My stay was simply beyond excellent. Bed was comfortable and the room was really clean. What helped to make the experience even better was the superb room service. Definitely one of the best hotels in Singapore.

title: Good
desc: We stay 4 night . The location very good in the center. We got suite very nice . The room are clean. The service very good . The lounge in the 31 floor the service was the best. The dinner that they have was Not at the level I expected. It the same in the breakfast.

title: Fantastic staff, great location and great service
desc: I recently returned from a trip to Singapore. We stayed 5 nights at the Conrad. The staff were amazing - always pleasant and went out of their way to help us. We arrived very early in the morning at 6am and they were happy for us to use the lounge on level 4 by the pool. The lounge staff on level 4 and 31 were just the best. Special shout out to Layla who helped us out so much! Highly recommend this hotel. It’s also in a great location!

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Location is excellent. Very comfortable stay and the staffs are friendly. Serves a variety selection of breakfast. The scent of the lobby and room are also pretty good. Would definitely stay again for my future trip. Recommend for anyone who has had a chance to visit Singapore.

title: Great stay but hotel seemed over crowded
desc: Perhaps because this was a holiday weekend in Singapore the hotel was extra busy. The lounges were packed and couldn’t get a seat, lobby restaurant was jammed, pool area was crowded and so was the gym. Not used to having to line up and wait for everything at Conrad properties. Also could not get a late checkout which is unusual. Service was great, fantastic room and great location.

title: Amazing Hotel, Customer Service was impeccable
desc: We stayed here as a family of 4 adults for five nights and could not fault the hotel. The staff are amazing and made us feel so welcome, from being very friendly and attentive to doing everything with a smile. No request seems to big or small for them. The hotel itself feels very glamorous and has everything you need, it is clean and despite the size I felt like it easily catered to every guest. We had the package that included access to the lounge on the top floor as well as afternoon tea and nightly canapes. Would highly recommend as the food was delicious, and the service was fantastic (my glass was rarely empty). The rooms are a great size, plenty of room, great sound proofing and come with all amenities you could need. The pool is lovely, though due to the shade it does get

title: Great service and location
desc: We had a 4 night stay in August. When we arrived our Diamond staus was recogniced and we were escorted up to the exec lounge for check-in and Champagne. No upgrades of room as it was full. But we got a nice room on the top floor. The lounge was nice, and great staff. They keep the drings coming and was efficient. The pool area was a bit short on sunbeds, but we were able to get some after a short while. The staff there helped, and keept walking around with cold water to the guests. So we will be back!

title: Worlds best hotel
desc: This is the best hotel When we checked in we got a massive cake and the service there was exceptional And the food there Was amazing. The pool was very good The lounge was excellent And the view was great and you can see the whole of the central city.

title: Great place to rest up from long flight
desc: Good morning Singapore from our room courtesy of our lovely friends at the Conrad Singapore where we found another home in the Hilton family. The Executive Lounge is well managed and gracious as always. Loved being away from the city center.

title: The location!
desc: This place is convenient to stay. There are many restaurant nearby and the shopping mall is next to the hotel, also the MRT. Staff were nice and the room was clean. But in my opinion bay view is not different from city view. Overall is great. I had a nice stay!

title: Truly 5 star
desc: I stayed at this hotel for a night earlier this month. There was some real highlights to be found here. Firstly, for the smokers out there, it’s one of the only hotels left in Singapore that still has a smoking floor. This is ideal for those out there which are happy to have this opportunity. The lobby has some great art and architectural features as well. Dinner and breakfast at Oscar’s was great. It’s a buffet and it is well worth the money. Plenty of options to choose from, both culturally as well as type. Seafood, meats, noodle station, salads, and a dessert bar! If you have a room with lounge/club access then make sure to visit it. The view from this floor is stunning! Also you can purchase the Conrad scent from the gift shop. It’s price at $38, but a good way to

title: 3 room family excursion with teens and 20 somethings.
desc: After 20 something hours travel from NZ we arrived at private check in desk in the Executive Lounge. At 5pm you’d think it wasn’t peak check in time! Unfortunately we had to wait until almost two hours to get a room allocated. On top of that and although we contacted the hotel ahead of time for specific room configuration (roll away in the twin room), this was not actioned until late in the evening when we were hoping to go to bed. Lots of apologies but quite disappointing as this 3 night stay was supposed to be the highlight of our 2 weeks travel. The rest of our stay (the service, location, views, pools, food and drinks was fabulous. Breakfast was a special daily event! The courtesy chocolates was a nice touch.

title: First class service and great location
desc: My wife and I stayed at Conrad Centennial for a week. Fantastic service from the start to end. Both Exec clubs are great, hotel location excellent and staff are attentive. Pool is great as is the gym. Can 100% recommend.

title: Very Good , location in the business area - a little expensive
desc: The hotel is very good , big lobby , great staff , very welcoming , the rooms are very clean and the view from the rooms is amazing , weather it’s to the fountains of suntec or more open wide view singapore , Gym is good with basic but good enough to workout , pool is big and nice , breakfast with big variety , no issues with transportations or taxi All in all very good place though it’s an expensive hotel , in this place you have lots of choices, value for money - I thing it’s a little expensive

title: Best Swimming Pool and executive lounge among many hotels in Singapore
desc: A very centralized hotel with great connectivity. The swimming pool never fails to invite me for a dip because of it's brightness, cleanliness and well done maintenance. The crew from the gym never fails to watch over all pool guest with towels and ice cold water. Among many hotels in Singapore, I love this hotel's pool best!

title: great choice of hotel
desc: weekend stop over from UK to Australia for the purposes of rest and relaxation - Conrad came up trumps Perfect location Luxurious accommodation All the hotel facilities you could want Definitely upgrade to club floor if you can - made all the different Staff outstanding at anticipating our every need Highly recommend this hotel

title: NICE ROOM but SERVICE NEEDS IMPROVEMENT
desc: Had a one night staycation. Chose it to utilise our free stay for our friend’s birthday celebration. Convenient location. Room is spacious and adequately equipped. Staff were all courteous and polite. Everything was going well until the night duty manager came and ruined everything for us. Extremely rude approach and disgusting behaviour. She rang our doorbell continuously without giving any time to react to the call. When we opened the door, she introduced herself as “Nik the duty manager” and her security who was behind her. She claims we were making too much noise and demanded that we vacate the room. Of so many hotels that we’ve stayed in, it is a common practice to always give a fair warning before chasing your guest away should they not comply. We apologised for the

title: Service, Hospitality and Heart Lacking - Disappointing
desc: On 5 Sep 2019, I made a reservation for a Deluxe Room for 2 adults at Conrad Centennial Singapore. On the same day, I reached out to the hotel to enquire about (i) the additional charges involved in allowing an additional guest beyond the two registered guests (the "3rd Guest") to access the Executive Lounge, and (ii) whether the hotel would kindly accommodate another person to enjoy lounge access on my behalf as I anticipated that due to afternoon engagements I would likely be late for or miss the evening cocktail presentation (the "Substitute Registered Guest"). To provide context, I had recommended this hotel to my overseas guest over other hotels as a destination for her to spend her birthday weekend in Singapore. The booking is under my account and I intended to be

title: Grand Prix base
desc: We stayed 4 nights through the F1 Grand Prix weekend. It was a great base, from where we could walk to the track and bay. We stayed in an Executive room, and with access to two lounges, enjoyed complimentary breakfasts, afternoon teas and evening drinks..... a great cost saver. The service we received throughout the hotel was impeccable. Super Hilton.

title: falling short of expectation
desc: falling short of the loyalty membership expectation. The check in and check out overall were disappointment. I however must commend the great concierge service and efforts. Should really provide better follow up service for loyalty members

title: Amazing
desc: From the moment you walk through the doors , this hotel was amazing. The staff are super friendly & can not do enough for you . We had a king room on level 30 & was part of the executive lounge which was great This as my husbands first time to Singapore & he absolutely loved the hotel & the location . We would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone wanting a little luxury & superb service .

title: fantastic.......
desc: no worries in this hotel very helpful professional staff the room was spacious clean and comfortable good location close to metro stn. Hilton at its best.wish we had stayed longer. an amazing hotel already planning our next stay.

title: Lovely Hotel
desc: Stayed 5 nights. Everything fantastic. Staff really helpful and polite. Lovely chocolates for our anniversary. Pool most enjoyable. Enjoyed the cocktails on the 35th floor. Oscars restaurant not as good as the advertising. Expected more fresh seafood.

title: Allergy friendly exec lounge
desc: Stayed here due to good reviews re: allergies. Exec lounge staff were wonderful at catering for my daughter with a peanut allergy and vegetarian. After checking in we went to the exec lounge for a drink. Within 10 minutes we were approached to find out which of our group of 4 had the allergy. The staff member then took my daughter to the food and went through each item with her, identifying which were ok for her to eat. Our luxury escapes package also included a meal at the Golden Peony restaurant. Again, restaurant staff were on top of the allergies and food requirements. I had emailed prior to our stay, and was very happy with the care taken by the staff, and that my emails had been taken seriously. Accommodation was great too, and the location but for us being able to

title: A nice stay
desc: I stayed here for a couple days. The hotel is in a very good location for walking. The staff was friendly. The executive club is very nice for business travel. The room was fine and very clean although the price was high. It was a nice stay. The pool was nice.

title: Excellent All Round!
desc: I stayed at this gorgeous hotel two weeks ago with my two young children in one of their club suites. The suite was large, luxurious from furnishings, linen to toiletries. The service at the hotel was impeccable and food was excellent. The concierge was so helpful. The location of this hotel is just around the corner and a two minute walk to the MRT station. My kids and I were thoroughly spoilt during our stay with gorgeous flowers, chocolates and fresh fruit in our suite on arrival. I would love to visit again!

title: A great stay! Perfect Location.
desc: We recently spent 5 nights at the Conrad Centennial Singapore. Overall the stay was very good and the location in Singapore was excellent. All of the staff from checkin, to curbside assistance, restaurant, and spa were very friendly and helpful. The room, an Executive King was very clean and cozy. The onsite restaurant, Oscar's, was great for breakfast and dinner. We enjoyed our treatment at the spa as well as relaxing by the pool area. The only downside I can mention to this hotel is that the Executive Lounge area is extremely small. We were turned away at the start of evening cocktails one evening as it was full only 8 minutes past opening time. However the staff were very apologetic and made arrangements for us to visit the lounge on the 4th floor, which we actually enjoyed

title: Executive lounge service level at the 31st floor decreased significantly
desc: As a frequent guest at this hotel it is really sad to see where the quality standards are going with the 31st floor executive lounge. It is always crowded and you are redirected either to a 4th floor lounge or placed to a larger table to share with the others without a dedicated table. Last time we did not get a chance to order any drinks due to the unattending staff and due to the fact that there were so many people. Finally, we decided to go to the 4th floor lounge that was almost empty and the service really warm and friendly. They also used to offer Laurent Perrier Champagne here in the top-floor lounge during our previous stays - and now they shamingly call the replacement (Chandon) as a Champangne but it is nothing but an mediocre sparkling wine. This is something that is

title: Broken tooth from food
desc: Purchased room service a seafood noodle dish. Bit into something that cracked my tooth and chipped off the back part (assuming shell even though there wasnt suppose to be shells on seafood) called immediately and first manager offered to send me to a dentist. Came back in the middle of the day (cancelling our plans) and a new manage of shift said they wouldn’t be doing that. Offered for them to see my tooth and take pictures and he just offered a free taxi ride to the airport and free dinner in the restaurant on site. Now stuck with paying $1,500 plus for a dental visit to fix my broken tooth.

title: Singapore at Conrad
desc: Excellent the Ultimate expérience fro m the time you enter the lobby to when you have to leave it. Every one make you spécial. The food ans specially the breakfast is fuul of goods. The silence and quality of the room make also a difference.

title: Differing guests rates questionable but still value for money
desc: Book through a certain agency and it is possible to have a 4 day/3 night stay at the Conrad for A$999. The package includes renovated Deluxe King room, breakfasts, VIP access to Executive Lounge, a free dinner in the Golden Peony Restaurant and other perks the agency claims add up to a value of $3.187. My wife and I missed the time slot for the above package and so for our 4 day/3 night stay we paid the full rate of $1200. For this there was no breakfasts and none of the other executive perks. I am not familiar with the finances of running a hotel but can it be said full rate guests are subsidizing the package guests? It was my wife and my first stay at a Conrad hotel and despite my above comments I felt we received value for money during our stay. The Conrad is a very

title: Weekend away
desc: We wanted to get away for a weekend and had several nights at the Conrad. We stayed in the renovated rooms and had access to the executive lounge, which is well worth it. The room was large and new. The hotel was friendly and well located to the Marina Bay, other malls and a lot of restaurants. The pool area was relaxing, as were the in hotel restaurants.

title: Singapore F1
desc: Fantastic 4 night stay at this beautiful hotel for the Singapore F1 GP. Perfect location for the event as within 10 minute walking distance to the track. We upgraded to an executive room which was amazing. Huge room with many extras included. The friendly, welcoming staff in the executive lounge made my stay even more enjoyable. Breakfast was lovely but too much choice so I usually ate too much! Loved every minute and hope to go back sometime.

title: Very good hotel
desc: Elegant and grand lobby, efficient check-in and friendly front desk staff. The room was large, modern and had a lovely view. Bathroom well-equipped. Room and pillows comfy. WiFi worked well. Excellent breakfast buffet and I loved the orange juice. We had a conference at the hotel. Set up, service, equipment, staff, food and simply everything was flawless. Suntec shopping mall and MRT station just around the corner. Very convenient location.

title: Disappointed with check-in.
desc: I had booked a Deluxe Package promotion with an additional fee for high season and a room with Singapore city views. To my disappointment was given a room on the lower floor with back street & Suntec City tower views. I spoke to receptionist Peggy, who was adamant the rooms with views was not allocated. After I had received and filled out a online questionnaire expressing my disappointment, Duty Manager Mr N. Hamid, replied with an apology. However, how does that compensate that fact I paid and booked a higher class room and dinner for two people? I felt his apology was hollow and disappointing.

title: Ideal for our trip
desc: Quick checkin, located next to MRT, spaciousness rooms, comfy beds, free WiFi, pool, and excellent breakfast this hotel gave us everything we needed as a base for an excellent stay in Singapore. We had a late flight back to the UK, in spite of checking out in the morning the hotel allowed us to use the pool and it’s facilities to freshen up before our return flight. Breakfast does get busy after 8am and alcoholic drinks at the hotel are very very high, suggest you visit the 7-11 or ideally the supermarket in the near by Suntec city centre to stock up on your needs. Finally don’t be fooled by the buy one get one free offers in nearby bars.. the inflated service charges and tax wipes out the published benefits. Would recommend this hotel.

title: Environment is good but no outstanding service
desc: I stayed in Conrad for 5 days 4 nights on business purpose. The overall environment and equipment are great, the room is with nice view. One thing which I was suffered from is that the left side cabinet cannot be completely closed everytime after I opened it hence it also impact the right side sliding door, they stuck. I stayed at 14th floor, hope they can check the facilities also, not just cleaning. There is no any special moment from their service and I always need to wait in line for around 10 mins for a table during breakfast time, don't like to wait especially in busy morning but still could be understand that it is hard to avoid the waiting. Gym is 24 hours which is very good.

title: A wonderful hotel
desc: We loved everything about this hotel. We arrived VERY early (7am) and the front desk could not have been more accommodating; arranged a room for us immediately. Our room was on the 19th floor, with nice views. Room was very spacious, clean and well equipped. Bathroom was very nice, with quality toiletries. We had booked executive club access, which is really worth the extra amount. We had many an afternoon tea and evening canapes & cocktails in the 31st floor lounge :-) Every single member of staff was wonderfully friendly and efficient; this really sets the Conrad apart. Breakfast was good (not as good as the Pan Pacific across the road) We will definitely only stay at the Conrad whenever we find ourselves in Singapore from now on!

title: A little disappointing
desc: We had three nights here which included the executive lounge. The room was fine as was the pool area. However, the executive lounge was somewhat disappointing. The meals/snacks offered were not at the same standard of other hotels and the service quite slow at times. What did seem strange was that when staff took your order they would get onto their head speakers as if they were reporting on your activity. The other thing, very different from other executive lounges in hotels around the world was you were not allowed to take a drink to your room at the end of the night. The buffet breakfast in the main restaurant and the executive lounge was very good. Overall though, not worth the price.

title: Nice hotel near the convention center
desc: Very nice hotel with good, spacious rooms, comfortable bed, well provisioned, near the Convention Center. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Two minute walk to the Metro station. Close to some restaurants and lots of shopping.

title: Service
desc: I order some ice cubes ,wait,waited after one hour never came,the buffet breakfast nearly same each day,should change or give a little Change every day tómale it more interesting.the reception should have more inform with local knowledge, they give different answers,make it confusing

title: An Overall Wonderful Hotel
desc: An excellent hotel that does everything right. A perfect hotel for the business traveler or tourist, you cannot go wrong with a stay at the Conrad Centennial. My wife and I stayed here after a long business trip for a short vacation and it was exactly what we needed. We enjoyed everything about the hotel and will definitely return when we are back in Singapore. Note: As a Diamond member we had access to the executive lounge which is a major selling feature. Great views of the city at sunset, a good variety of quality drinks, and enough food for a light dinner.

title: Nice but not worth the price
desc: The Conrad Centennial was nice, the staff were friendly and the executive lounges were definitely the highlight of our stay. There was a great range of western and local foods available at breakfast, afternoon tea and the hors d'oeuvres and cocktail sessions in the lounge. We ordered room service on our first night there because we arrived late and not much was open, we paid $80SGD for two burgers that were barely warm and chips that were cold, it was quite a disappointment. The Conrad is a nice hotel but I’ve stayed at nicer places for less.

title: Fabulous Hotel
desc: We stayed at the Conrad for 5 nights early October, we had an executive room which gave you entry into the Executive lounge. This was definitely worth while as you get lots of added extras. Breakfast, all day drinks, afternoon tea and supper between 6-8pm. Our room was lovely and big, clean once a day. I was celebrating my birthday so on our first night a birthday cake was left in our room. We had fresh fruit each day and chocolates a lovely touch. We spent most day out the hotel but when we left or came back we were always greeted at the entrance. Staff were very polite and always helpful. This hotel is in a great location, we walked most places or caught the MRT which is near by. The pool area is lovely, plenty of sun beds and lots of staff to help if you. You are always

title: Not so top of town.
desc: Having stayed at this property a few years ago it truly exceeded our expectation at the time and so we wanted to come back. Not sure if it was because we were luxury escape customers but I felt we were given a lower level room despite the fact that we had paid for a Club Executive king room. The Club Lounge was over crowded and definitely did not feel exclusive. Food was average. Can’t say there was anything special you would die for unlike the last time. Last time every breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktail hour spreads were a visual feast this time nothing looked incredibly enticing. Last time they even had their own hand made chocolates. All pretty much run of the mill this time. The wine however was fine. Would I go back and stay there again? It definitely has not left me

title: Beautiful hotel
desc: First time in Singapore beautiful hotel From day 1 we could not get over the wonderful charm and the friendliness. Special mention to Roselyn at Oscars and your colleagues for helping us with our two young children at meal times you’re truly an asset to the hotel. Breakfast buffet was delicious as were all meals ordered. Pool staff helped with toys for our children and Happily chatted away as important guests even though they were children. Concierge service also brilliant in organising Legoland private transport to and back and given helpful advise to places to visit. Our centennial suite and king room were spotless cleaned every day and the slippers and turndown service appreciated.Bed and pillows very comfortable. Very close to transport and Suntech across the road. Special

title: Family holiday
desc: Hotel is clean, staff hotel very helpfull, great location, breakfast have many varian of food but almost the same food for everyday but so far conrad is very nice hotel to stay. Definately will stay again in this hotel

title: Excellent stay!
desc: The staff were all very friendly and helpful. The room was clean and spacious, the pillows are extremely comfortable. Perfect location, everything was just a short walk away. The food was delicious. An earlier check-in would have been appreciated as we had been travelling for more than 15 hours. Our room was ready at 3:30pm, we arrived at 9:30am.

title: Family get away
desc: We took a 4 night stay at Conrad, got an upgrade as Gold member. The hotel is quite close to the airport, only 15~20 min taxi ride on both ways, which is quite convenient. The check in was smooth, though we were delayed for 30 minutes till 3:30pm as they are still preparing, but that shouldn't be a problem, as "Putri" gave my two kids some color books & crayons with their names on it, and upon entering our room, we got a birthday cake surprise for my wife. Kudos to Putri! The room is as spacious as said on the net, with one touch curtains and sheers, sea view and facing the Merlion, and bathroom with separate shower and tub, plus 2 sinks. Our daily make up of the room and evening turn down was done perfectly, and the bed and sofas are comfortable. We got the usual Conrad bear

title: Thank the heavens that we chose Conrad for our Wedding
desc: We had our wedding lunch reception at Conrad on 26th October 2019. I just wanted to thank you and all your team for the most beautiful perfect wedding day I could have ever imagined.  I can not praise you all enough from the very beginning to the wedding day itself. Our guests remarked that the food was excellent and without complaint and they all enjoyed themselves. Food was also served promptly and warm, and our banquet ended at around 3.30 pm, which was as we had wanted. The bridal suite was large and comfy. It was bright and airy, and had a spacious bathroom and living room. Special shout-out to Crescent who was amazing from the start, was so easy to deal with and accommodating to our requests, even helping to arrange an early check-in for my wife’s family and the bridal

title: Very pleased
desc: The rooms were big, bathroom too and the service was excellent. The staff at the pool/lounge/fitness area were great all week. Massage on first day was just good, not the best. Very convenient location to access entire city. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Nice stay
desc: The hotel has very welcoming staff and nice rooms. Good location. Excellent services. Quality of breakfast and food in the lounge can be better. Overall a very pleasant stay and hotel staff is exceptional.

title: Very cozy and wonderful staff
desc: I stay here twice a year. Every time the staff tries their best to delight the customer, it is certainly an amazing experience. The manager Minh is very nice and very supportive to keep us smiling. The state at the pool, buffet/breakfast were excellent.

title: Conrad
desc: The hotel and room are alright but staff have limited knowledge and are not very child friendly. The hotel could do with an update as its quite dated. If your a HH member be ready to be treated as a non member.

title: My room was dusty and tired
desc: Overall the hotel is nice with polite staff but I wasn’t too happy with my room. Generally quite dusty especially in hidden areas like behind the coffee machine or corner of the room. Good that there were in-room slippers which I wore when I was in the room. The bathroom is dated but overall of a good size and shower’s water pressure was good. The sealant inside the shower had gone black and mouldy. Please replace as it is off putting. Also, let’s stop the small tubes of amenities and bottled water.

title: fantastic
desc: fabulous rooms, that have been renovated and great service and staff. The rooms are very comfortable with a great pillow selection. The staff have an eye for attention to detail. We had a great experience on our second visit to this hotel

title: Excellent Property, Location, Staff
desc: This is a beautiful property ideally situated if you have a conference at the SunTec center, or if you want to visit some of the big attractions like Marina Bay Sands and Gardens by the Bay. It's not oversized (like the JW Marriott) so the elevators aren't too over-crowded and slow. The rooms have been updated and quite honestly was larger than many US hotels I've stayed in. All the appointments in the room are first class, including the electric shades and drapes, buttons next to the bed for lights/curtains, and a nice large TV along the wall. I also liked/appreciated the bench seating along the length of the room - plenty of space to unpack the suitcase, lay out paperwork, lay out clothes, sit down to put my shoes on, etc. The bathroom is also first class - double sink,

title: Excellent
desc: This is our favourite hotel in Singapore. Ideally located the hotel is simply Devine. Great rooms and ammenities with a fabulous bed and linens. Executive lounge offers afternoon tea and evening canapés all served with alcoholic beverages complimentary. Can’t wait to return

title: Good, not great!
desc: The rooms here are modern, compact, clean and comfortable without being luxurious. We had city views (lovely at night). The breakfast was good although could get very busy with long queues at peak times. Same for the club lounge peak periods (afternoon tea and cocktail hour). If you are happy to arrive a little early, the wait is worth it with great food, cold drinks and courteous service. The location was within easy walking distance of the MRT and shops, and a healthy walk to Marina Bay district, Gardens by the Bay which we did a couple of times. To be honest , if I go back to Singapore, I will probably stay somewhere else. Unimpressed with the Seafood Buffet dinner (reviewed separately).

title: Excellent accommodations!
desc: Our stay started out better than we could've asked for. Our overnight flight got us into Singapore at approximately 1AM and at first we hesitated to contact the hotel. Sheepishly, we contacted the front desk and was pleasantly informed that we could indeed be accommodated at approximately 6-7am! Mind you, this was without paying for an extra day. We scored a room on the 30th floor with a partial view of the marina, lovely non the less. From there, the service only got better. We had a minor issue with the bathroom that was promptly addressed and no less than 3 different contacts to ensure we were happy with the results. Every amenity you could think of was propositioned in the room. We ordered room service at an ungodly hour on night 2 and it was service with a smile on both

title: A starting point of a cruise
desc: We only had the one night at this hotel, very welcoming, clean and helpful staff. Room was very comfortable and was very good. Breakfast was excellent, anything you wanted was there and while you went to get something else to eat the table was cleared ready for the next part of you breakfast. Staf were great...

title: Another excellent stay at Conrad Centennial Singapore
desc: It's was an absolute pleasure to return to Conrad Singapore a wonderful hotel that never disappoints on every level. Special thanks again to Shar Mayne for making sure our arrival was well taken care of. Also thanks to all the Exec Lounge staff who do an excellent job. We look forward to returning again soon! Kevin and Richard

title: Convenient Location, Comfortable Rooms, Excellent Service
desc: My wife and I stayed here for 3 nights during our honeymoon in November 2019. We've traveled extensively around the world, but have never been to Singapore. The hotel is conveniently located near shopping centers and public transportation. You will likely have to walk a bit to most areas, but there are plenty of indoor malls and passages that you can cut through in the area. It was also easy to book a Grab or taxi. The rooms are comfortable and our corner king offered a great view of the Marina area. While you can't see the Marina Bay Sands directly due to a building in the way, you are able to get quite a nice view of the gardens and surrounding buildings. The beds are standard to Conrad hotels around the world and excellent for recovery after a long flight. The concierge

title: Excellent Five Star hotel
desc: Have stayed here many times before, and it is still one of the best. Excellent staff and rooms, in fine facility. Good location as well, near several major shopping centers and start of sightseeing buses. Food, and especially the buffet, is superb. Highly recommend this hotel

title: Perfect location for pre night cruise
desc: Stayed 1 night before boarding cruise. Wanted to stay at Marina Bay Sands but didn’t want their hefty price and chaos that comes with staying there. Conrad is the PERFECT alternative. Stayed on the Executive Lounge level and were blown away by complementary food offerings at breakfast, high tea and evening drinks/snacks...very impressive selections, definitely worth the extra to book this category. Location is in perfect walking distance to all main attractions and very close to Esplanade metro station. Pic is from lounge for a pick me up after arriving. Room was perfect, very comfy bed, beautiful bathroom and wonderful view.

title: Thanks
desc: Booked for a night stop. Pleasantly welcomes and recognised as a Diamond member. The room was a twin but a double was found fairly quickly. Late check out was requested and given until 3pm with promise to recheck in the morning to see if any further extension could be provided. Room was fine, overlooking the Bay side and Suntec city. Used exec lounge also as well as the gym. Excellent staff both sections of the business. For breakfast and afternoon tea. Emirates driver had no issue in picking up. WiFi worked very well also. Less than 10 mins walk to the metro station. Across the road is the mall with lots of food choices also. Comfortable stay.

title: Enjoyed my stay at Conrad
desc: Excellent service at the hotel, amenities are complete and housekeeping done superbly. Location of hotel is very good, next to two malls/shopping centers and a train station. Access to variety of restaurant and shops is easy.

title: We Had Very High Expectations and the Conrad Surpassed Them!
desc: We booked four nights at the end of a long journey through Southeast Asia. We regarded this as a hedonistic reward for the occasional hardships of that journey. So, we arrived with high expectations. We can only say that the Conrad Centennial surpassed those expectations! The quality of the rooms, restaurants, business center, etc., was superb in all regards. We booked an executive king and so enjoyed access to all of the buffets and lounges. All of them provided outstanding quality and selection of food. What really sets the Conrad Centennial apart from other luxury hotels, though, is the quality of the service. From the doormen to the front desk, the lounges and restaurants, and the concierge desk, we encountered nothing but the highest levels of competency and

title: Fantastic Hotel
desc: We stayed at the Conrad Hotel for a week and were not disappointed. We had booked an executive room which gave us access to the lounge to have breakfast, afternoon tea and evening drinks together with small plates of food. The room was on the 30th floor, very spacious, clean and looked out towards the stadium. Great view. There were 2 executive lounges one on the 31st floor and one on the 4th. The first night we tried the 31st floor but it was full and although we took a seat in a room further down the corridor it was not very comfortable. The next night we were informed by the staff there was another lounge on level 4 by the pool deck. We found this much better and went there every night after that. There was never any shortage of seats here. The food was excellent and quite a

title: Excellent hotel
desc: It is the second time I've been in this hotel, and is very rewarding. Guest rooms are big and comfortable. Awesome breakfast buffet, some times too busy ... Staff very kind and knowledgeable. Fully recommend it!

title: Beautiful view and great ambience
desc: Conrad Singapore is just as I expected, beautiful, convenient, and with great service. Ever single staff there was helpful and friendly. Amazing view from my guest window, complimentary upgrade made me feel welcomed as a guest. Convenience location is another plus. Love the Conrad little teddy bear as well. I'd highly recommend this hotel to any tourists to Singapore.

title: Hen’s night at the Conrad
desc: We had an Alice in Wonderland themed Hen’s night on Sat, 23 Nov and had been planning it for a while. The Conrad was our final destination for the day and the hotel staff did not disappoint. We had a great time and the bride-to-be was very pleased. Special mention to the FOM for sorting out the rooms and bookings for us, as well as housekeeping for cleaning up after us. Also a big thank you to the restaurant manager at Oscars, Yan, for the special decor (a beautiful lemon box to go with the theme) and to the assistant manager, Fernando, for the complimentary sparkling wine to help us celebrate.

title: Great hotel
desc: Fantastic room, great views and service, breakfast was excellent, seafood buffet was really good. We had the luxury escapes 7 night deal with club access. Club access was ordinary and cocktail selection limited, finger food average too. Bed very hard and not a good sleep, otherwise great hotel

title: Great service and beautiful room
desc: Enjoyed an upgrade to a spacious suite and executive services. Must compliment them on their exceptional service. Fasle the chief concierge escorted me to the nearest drug store and helped me locate my meds for my husband who was not feeling well at the time and walked me back to the hotel even though it was just across the way at the mall. He also helped me get checked in for our flight the next day and printed out our passes. This made our visit to Singapore all the more pleasant. Enjoyed the pool. It was big and great for laps with not too many people. Service by the pool was great, too. The executive lounge had tasty food and beverages and not crowded. Totally good service !

title: Another quality Conrad
desc: Our visit to Singapore was too short at only two nights, but the Conrad’s luxury facilities and ideal location were perfect . The service was impeccable, the room large and extremely comfortable, and the gym one of the best I have encountered in a hotel. I also need to note that the breakfast buffet had an extensive selection of both Asian and Western, and was delicious. I highly recommend the Conrad.

title: Excellent location, modern rooms, friendly staff
desc: Stayed in Conrad for a week. It’s walking distance to Suntec city, millenial walk, Marina garden mall and 10mins to city mall. But what I like the most is it’s just on the edge of the business district, therefore your in the city but easy to get back to the airport. The staff is all friendly, special mention to Joanne from the front desk who helped us ensure we had a comfortable week by helping fix our booking problems. The rooms are modern, huge king bed with comfortable pillows and mattress. There is also a long couch by the window in our room which makes it perfect for reading or just lounging. Good hotel.

title: Extremely helpful staff with lovely rooms & warm atmosphere
desc: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Conrad. They could not have been more helpful. I had had surgery recently and was on a knee scooter but the did everything to accommodate my requests. The room was spacious and the bathroom was especially lovely. Spa like, with double sinks, deep bath and spacious showers. Every toiletry and amenity you could want. I have diamond status and we had executive club privileges. The breakfast on the 31 st floor was lovely with panoramic views. The happy hour was warm and welcoming but swarming with Australians and limited food choices. Oscars was super for breakfast with beautiful fruit choices, omelette bar, breads etc. Fantastic Asian selection which was so fun to try and wonderfully tasty. It was a nice break from the club. The pool is nice,

title: Super Happy @ Conrad Centennial Singapore
desc: Christmas Afternoon Tea at Conrad Centennial Singapore Lobby Lounge. Thanks Carol Loy for the invitation to high tea. I like to 'THANK' Carol and the whole team at Conrad for paying so much attention to Susan Fincham, you all have made her 2 weeks stay so comfortable and happy. Thank you for allowing me to have complementary daily breakfast with Susan. The services you have given to us is beyond my expectation and I am so glad I had recommended Conrad Centennial Singapore to Susan Fincham😊😊😊

title: Great hotel, great service!
desc: Really great hotel, loved this place. Great service, great room. Exec Lounge on 31 was very good with a chef and plenty of people serving. Could get busy at times. Lounge by the pool on 4 also great, good for breakfast after the gym Gym was great, new machines and always spotless clean, welcomed with water and a towel. I also thought food in Oscars was good - also bonus it’s open 24hours. Highly recommend and will indeed be back when next in town. Thanks!

title: Great Service
desc: Dear Conrad, I would like to compliment the following employees: -Crescent -Eddie -Sethu -Dave -Chef Ku -Pauline for the excellent service they have provided. Crescent was extremely attentive and she listened to all our requests with a great deal of patience. Despite having many last minute changes of plans and programme, Crescent was able to accommodate to all. She even took the extra effort to Lias all information between patron of the event and all external vendors that were being engaged. Crescent has a caring approach and is a true professional. Eddie was indeed a great leader. He was so calm and composed throughout the whole event. He was able to give clear instructions to his banquet team so as to ensure that everyone knows the flow of the serving and that there

title: A great hotel find in Singapore
desc: As regular visitors to Singapore. This hotel is perfectly located in the Marina area, handy for Raffles and other sight seeing locations. We have just finished five nights here in an Executive room which had magnificent bay views. The staff on all levels were friendly, helpful and a pleasure to deal with. Nothing was too much trouble for them we will be back again.

title: A hidden gem
desc: "A true sample of excellent hospitality", that sums it all throughout my stays at Conrad Centennial Singapore. The front desk staff, Miss Agnes was patient, polite and knowledgeable. We enjoy the spacious, relaxing and luxurious ambience of Conrad. The breakfast was amazing with a great selection of food. Although the restaurant might be busy at some time, but the staff will always make an effort to acknowledge you. Special mention to the Oscar restaurant manager, Mr. Zheng Kang (who was in his suit), he was always smiling and never seemed to waver at all the guests demands. Mr. Zheng Kang is incredibly attentive to the guests needs, a jolly person and would walk the extra miles to make sure we enjoy our breakfast. He is very professional in his attentive care and service. Not

title: Slightly lower level than other Conrads
desc: After several Conrad Hotels this year (Maledives, Hong Kong, Bangkok et al.) we spent some days in Conrad Singapore expecting even more in Singapore than in the other places. However we must say that we would rate this hotel lower than the others, a.o. for following reasons: Service sometimes not satisfying: 4pm no bedroom made. Coffee machine not cleaned. Carpets in elevators always dirty. Pool bar closes at 7pm, however pool is open until 11pm. Dinner by the pool creates big problems. Not enough deck chairs by the pool over the weekend. Tables not always clean. Service personnel not always attentive. Wanted to prolong check out from 4 to 6pm and got a "not possible, hotel is fully booked" and one hour later from another person a "OK, no problem". Friendly people but sometimes

title: Good, not that great
desc: I had a recent week long stay here. As a diamond, I was upgraded to an Executive room with a Marina view which was great. Good - The staff was always polite and willing to help. - Location was convenient, though I found it difficult to get some food after 9.30 PM around the hotel - Breakfast was food, a few more local options would be good. Coffee is really bad. Ice-cream was divine Bad - I took 2 treatments in the Spa and both were disappointing. Not worth the high prices and there was no steam/sauna. The pool was uninviting - Executive lounge was small, always full and the food was quite sad. - The menu at Oscars after 10PM is quite limited and food was not good at all. I felt some of the other hotels in the vicinity provided a better value/amenities. I had a decent

title: Holiday
desc: We stayed at the Conrad for six nights Our whole experience was fantastic Nothing was too much trouble Our room was fantastic Staff are so eager to please A real credit to the establishment We will certainly be returning Thank you See you again soon

title: Great choice for Singapore
desc: A buddy and I visited Singapore for a few days and decided to stay at the Conrad. We had originally booked the Marina Bay Sands, but it was a few hundred dollars more and it was a low floor with no breakfast. I am a Hilton Diamond member, so I knew we would at least get full breakfast. Upon check-in, I was notified that we were upgraded to the Executive level with access to the Executive Lounge. The room itself was very nice and what I would normally expect from a Conrad hotel. The bathroom was clean and the shower had great water pressure and scald you if you wanted to. We had some fruit, chocolates, and note from the hotel manager waiting for us as well. We tried the Executive Lounge for breakfast the first day and while the service was excellent, we found the variety a

title: Outstanding hotel in all regards!
desc: Stayed there twice in October and once in December, superb service and hospitality! I used to stay at other nearby hotels, but the Conrad is just plain better, largely due to the great staff. I'd like to personally thank Ms Chen Baoli of the Executive Lounge for her cheerful attitude, courtesy, and great assistance while we were there. She exemplifies the meaning of professionalism! Many thanks!

title: Great location and spacious rooms
desc: We had a great stay prior to our cruise. The location is very convenient being situation right across Suntec mall. It is walking distance to many popular sites. The rooms were very spacious. Breakfast at Oscars was lovely.

title: Just superb service
desc: This is my new favourite place in Singapore! The service shown by the whole team was exemplary. We arrived late afternoon and check in was fast and the guy was brilliant. When we got to the room it had the most spectacular view across Marina Bay... a world beater! One of the sofas by the window had been made up for a child (so nicely done even a teddy bear on the pillow) so we called down in n case the room was allocated to another guest... five minutes later the duty manager was at the door apologising... and honestly this was not something to apologise for, we were happy to go to another room and not spoil a family’s lovely welcome! When we came back from supper a bottle of wine was delivered with a hand written note from Sha, the wonderful duty manager. That is truly

title: Christmas with Friends and Family
desc: We stayed at the Conrad for 6 nights with another family in connecting rooms, the children had a great time and even though the hotel were quite busy during the festive season, they tried to accommodation most of our request in a timely manner. Very nice touch to include the Christmas bear and duck toys for the kids. Given we had booked via Amex FHR program, fresh fruits and amenities were replenished regularly and we used the dinning credits for in room service, food was fantastic and amongst the best in room meals we’ve had. In term of breakfast, both the Executive Lounge and Oscar’s offer a wide selection of international cuisine and made to order dishes, services are prompt and they try to look after the young ones. In term of transport, the hotel is closely located to

title: Will definitely stay in the hotel again :)
desc: My family has started planning another stay in the hotel again at the moment we were departing Singapore! Spacious, tidy, nicely decorated rooms with the adorable teddy waiting for us at the arrival! The staff are nice, the breakfast is perfect. The location is perfect with easy access to 3 MRT stations, shopping malls and the iconic Merlion Park. Thanks for the special arrangement on the early check-in and late check-out :) The nice accommodation makes us a memorable Christmas holiday!

title: Amazing Digital Keys System via Hilton App
desc: Overall: It was a good experience. Not the same level of Conrad hospitality, like one I’ve received in Conrad Macau. The check in was efficient and I didn’t have to wait long. The lobby is old but still grand. Love the digital key function being offered at this hotel. Have the best bed for all the hotels I’ve stayed in before. Room: We were upgraded during our stay. Thank you for that. The room was spacious and very clean with Merlion Lion view. However you don’t get the full view of Marina in this hotel due to the blockage of other buildings/hotels. On the plus side, it comes with automatic shades or blinds. Impressive. Bathroom: Double vanity bathroom. With a bath tub. However, there’s no bidet. Perhaps it is time to invest into one like most hotels in Japan would have.

title: Staycation with family
desc: We stay in 25th Dec and Super enjoyed our stay. Check in agent was friendly, knowledgeable and she give room with Super view. Hotel lobby was decorated for the theme. We were given complimentary access to the club lounge on 31th floor. As always club lounge service was outstanding and we enjoyed the food presentation. I would recommend this hotel to all my friend and family. Location close to train station and to office tower and most importantly shopping center.

title: Good decision!
desc: We stayed at the Conrad because this is where my husband is always billeted when he’s in Singapore for work. He told me that he was pleasantly surprised when a couple of the staff at the lounge greeted him warmly. (Not a surprise that they were Filipino). It was my first time there and the experience was pleasant and memorable. The room was good-sized, smelled good and well appointed. I like that they had a Nespresso machine. There were complete amenities and everything was clean and orderly. The lobby is beautiful, even more so with the Christmas decor. We stayed there with two other friends and they too were quite happy with the accommodations. We also liked that there were good restaurants close by. There was a mall too but Orchard Road is really the place to go for

title: Fantastic anniversary stay
desc: Wife and I had an anniversay staycation at this hotel where we held our wedding 3 years ago. The hotel had a heart shape flower arrangement on our bed for our special day, and also complimentary chocolates! Bonus is the famous Conrad bear plush and rubber duckie which we took home. As it was Xmas season, the gift shop was made of edible gingerbread that smells really fragrant and tempting to eat. The lobby decor gives a warm fuzzy Xmas vibe. Comfortable stay and fantastic service! Highly recommended for a great getaway.

title: Worth a stay
desc: Excellent rooms and furnishings, great facilities, helpful staff, dinner and breakfast in the restaurant were very good with equally good executive lounges and a very pleasant environment overall, easy access to marina bay. A great hotel in Singapore.

title: Good one night stay
desc: We stayed here in transit for one night in December and booked an executive king room which was upgraded to a Centennial Suite prior to arrival which was greatly appreciated. Our arrival into Singapore was early morning and I wasn't expecting our room to be available, however, after checking into the lounge, we were informed our room would be ready in an hour or so and after a short wait, as promised, our room was available.Getting the room so early was very welcome, particularly after a long overnight flight. The suite was very spacious and overlooked the Fountain of Wealth directly below us. Location of the hotel is fine with many sights within walking distance with easy access to Singapore's excellent transport system. We used the executive lounge on the top floor (there

title: A lovely hotel in a great location
desc: I really can't fault the hotel in any way. It has a particular charm, the staff are really attentive, it's in a handy location (not far from Marina Bay Sands), has an MRT station next door, is opposite shopping centres, and a perfect launching pad for a few nights exploring Singapore. I would've loved it if they had a jacuzzi, but that's not a criticism. The beds are probably the best hotel beds I've ever slept on and I prefer them to my own bed at home!! The room service food was really good and well presented. The stand-out feature though was the hotel's ability to handle breakfast seamlessly despite us staying over XMAS and tending to go for breakfast at peak time each morning. Each morning, there was a large over-flow room to handle the crowds, and as far as possible,

title: Terrible beds
desc: If you have a liking for rock hard beds, this is the hotel for you. However, if hard beds are hell, then never ever stay here. I have been here since 23 December for a family reunion, and in that time I have had two nights of decent sleep - only because I used my painkillers, which I hate to do. It seems impossible to talk to anyone in management, and the front line staff just keep adding extra soft doona-like pads, which exacerbate the problem, as they all collapse and I end up sleeping in a sagging but hard bed. Last night in desperation we removed a lot of it and added another foam pad that we purchased, and I got some sleep. The next morning, as we have each day, I begged them for a proper mattress topper. What a mistake!!! They put more useless padding which collapsed and

title: Plush no more!
desc: Wish I could put 2.5 instead for we were kind of disappointed when we realised they have refurbished the room from plush to basic. We used to do staycation in Conrad on several occasions but this should be our final one with them. They have stripped down the thickness of the mattress and I didn’t recall having to request for extra pillows but when we did this time, it took them 1 over hours to deliver after 3 reminders. Cinderella has dropped one of her glass slipper when the pillows arrived. Service in the executive lounge didn’t disappoint and hope they will continue to keep up the standard there.

title: Outstanding Business Hotel
desc: Stayed 3 nights this week at the Conrad Singapore. From an excellent check in process , with a proper briefing about all my entitlements and a pleasant surprise in the room (the endearing Conrad Xmas bear) , everything was perfect . The breakfast is a good spread but as a Vegetarian I wish there was more veg or vegan options. The room was nice and spacious and the housekeeping was top notch all days.
