Two days before my check-in date, I got a welcome email Danna the Reservation Agent, informing me of my scheduled check-in time and links to make reservation for dining in at the restaurants, including the daily breakfast, use of gym and swimming pool. I arrived at the hotel at the appointed time and there wasn't a queue at the check-in counter. All check-ins are centralized at the lobby instead of Executive Lounge for the permier type rooms. Check-in was a breeze and very efficient. Booked the Centennial Suite room and was assigned a room on the 29th floor. The room is of good size, and it comes with a living room that is seperated from the

title: A nice day ended with paranoia
desc: Booked a staycation on Feb 11 to 12 2021 Using a complimentary voucher given by Amex krisflyer ascend card . That doesn’t mean the room is free. I am paying the annual card fee to be able to enjoy the benefits which comes with the card. Conrad is a 6 star hotel. There shouldn’t be an issue of cleanliness at all as we are paying for excellent service and cleanliness. I was so looking forward to staying in a 6 star hotel as this be my first stay there . Upon checkin I asked for a late check out at 2pm and I was denied saying it’s the festive season . My close fren who actually recommended to stay in this hotel actually stayed over Christmas Day during the festive season and they were given a 4pm checkout. I was taken aback as maybe I assumed perhaps they paid $480 a night and I

title: Welcoming , Friendly and Comfortable in the City.
desc: My first foray into a local staycation. I was suitably impressed by the Conrad . While the check-in took some 25 ministers , check/in staff were brisk and yet friendly , the hotel room was large and comfortable . I had the forums of being assigned a room With the iconic view of the Suntec City Fountain of Fortune . While views were of the city , they were beautiful views . The breakfast was at Oscar’s a famous restaurant in its own right . Staff were excellent in providing recommendations and were patient that we were the last table one morning . This staycation unfortunately set such a high bar that none of my subsequent staycations could even come close to this , I would definitely recommend a stay here and a huge thanks to all the hotel staff from check-in to the Oscars. All

title: Wedding lunch at Conrad
desc: We held our wedding lunch banquet at Conrad recently. The entire process, from the first time we met our wedding coordinator, Crescent, to the actual banquet managed by banquet manager Ali, to the bridal suite stay in their executive suite, was efficient, smooth and impressive. Crescent has been a great help to us, guiding us through the uncertain COVID-19 period, reassuring us and attending to our queries and requests promptly. Ali was also very helpful and accommodating during the banquet. The food at Oscars and the executive lounge were also great. Thanks Conrad and their staff for the outstanding service!

title: Great stay
desc: Smooth check in and love the new room - although I’m missing the high bed! Bathroom is spacious and comes with bathtub that’s great for infant “swim”!! Always enjoy my stay at Conrad for the service and ambiance at the hotel! But they need to do something to the heavy room doors! It doesn’t soft close and would just slam when we release it, even the connecting room door too.

title: Conrad Service Gets A Thumbs Up
desc: Overall a very pleasant stay. Received an email on checkin timing 3 days before stay. It really helped that a link to pre-book facilities like gym & pool was also provided. Doing advance booking allowed me to plan my activities around the timings in a more concrete manner which was great. Other hotels gave me anxiety as I’m unsure if I could even have a slot until the day I check in. Huge rooms, mattress a bit firm for my liking as I like soft beds. But the pillows are so good that my husband wanted to bring 1 home (but we didn’t). I would return to Conrad again the next time I want to staycay.

title: 3D2N Staycation at Conrad Centennial Singapore
desc: This was my first time staying in Conrad Centennial and I must say I truly had a wonderful experience with their high levels of service and small details. I will make a return when there is another occasion.

title: Excellent services at Oscar
desc: I Dined at the Oscar on numerous occasions and was always served with impeccable professionalism. In particular, Mr Mohd Nurul Amin, Mr Daniel Wong and Si Yan. It’s almost like dining in a 5 star coffee house when the service personnel remember all the special requests of customers. A lot of time, it’s not the just the food that make the impact and an unforgettable experience. It’s a confluence of factors which is exhibited in this unassuming dining outfit. Kudos to the team and the management behind all these happenings.

title: Staycation trip
desc: The check in process was fast and the room was in a lovely condition when we visited, full of room supply’s and tower for our usage and i would say that it is worth a stay at this hotel. Special shout-out to the breakfast team at Oscar

title: A perfect stay
desc: We booked a one night staycation for deluxe king and we are very satisfied with the room , it’s a very big room at high floor with the view of suntec city and and the sea further away The bed is very comfortable and we slept throughout the night The only slight draw back is the wifi which is pretty slow and chargeable if you are not a guest And if you want higher speed wifi then you have to pay extra , which is really weird in 2021, when people still charge for internet like in the 90s Other than that all is very pleasant Conrad’s room is one of the best I have stayed , if I can imagine what else more I want , it’s to have the stone onsen bath tub in my room

title: Awesome & Excellent Customer Service By Front Desk Peggy and Housing-keeping Team Zuraiddy and Eveyeca.
desc: Absolutely wonderful second time staying with Conrad Centennial Singapore. It starts from the moment, we reach the lobby and got serviced by the Front desk agent which I did not catch her name and Peggy provide her support again (Peggy was the front desk agent when I first have my staycation during Jan 2021, another delightful staycation). Everything was handle professionally and customer service is Top Notch again 🌈👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻. I am Extremely grateful towards the Awesome Housekeeping Team. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 🏆🏆🏆 Miss Eveyeca despite being very busy housekeeping from 9am to 11pm due to March School holidays staycation, Eveyeca is still so friendly, smiling and warm to help with housekeeping requests. I witness that she stop her cleaning of a checkout

title: My stay was spoilt by rude Flipino waiter!
desc: We had a good stay at Conrad. Front desk and room service were good. But the our stay were spoilt by a very proud and rude waiter. We wanted to have tea and relax after checking out. He seems to have a negative attitude towards Chinese Singaporean. But he seems fine with Westerns! I just cant tolerate such attitude. I wish I know his name. He is short and plump and very loud in his speech! Hope management will send him for some course to teach him about customers' service and practise non discrimination!

title: Nice touch on the banana cake
desc: I’ve never been a fan of banana cakes but the newly launched banana cake with hazelnut pleasantly surprised me. Good balance of taste and texture and very reasonably priced too. My Wife, who’s a fan of banana cakes, simply loves it. Nice touch on a sweets that has stood the test of time, Conrad Centennial SG!

title: Staycation: Improved since last visit
desc: Stayed at Conrad for a staycation arriving on 14 February. Reservation was booked by American Express and was in order on arrival. There was no queue when I arrived but there was a massive queue after I competed check in. There is no priority / dedicated check in for Hilton Diamond members. Regulations explained for use of lounge and restaurants. Wanted to book Oscars but it was full so settled for Golden Peony. On my arrival at Golden Peony my reservation was not made and after some discussion with the front desk the situation was rectified. Regarding breakfast - reserved at 9am, but long queues which meant I was not seated until 9.25am. Room was upgraded to a suite - thank you. Nice comfortable room, nice bed nice large bathroom with tub. All in order. Good workspace in the

title: Pleasent Stay with great customer service
desc: I enjoyed my stay with Conrad totally. From the time of check in to the day I checked out the service was excellent 👌 Every staff there woee their hearts at their sleeves and carried out their duties perfectly From the concierge,to check in staffs ,to the room service. Everything was perfect Service,food ,housekeeping and great service people. Perhaps an extra dustbin and tissue box at the living area would have been great. Thanks for making our stay memorable and pleasant

title: Excellent service & experience!
desc: Shoutout to the team at Conrad for the awesome service and assistances rendered to us during our wedding! Crescent Lim Joel Eddie Chef Long Chef Ku Not forgetting the Concierge & Guest Relations team!

title: Staycation @ Conrad Hotel
desc: We really enjoyed our staycation at Conrad Centennial Hotel. The room is spacious and staff are really friendly. Special shoutout to Lemuel/Ian from the Lobby Lounge and Elena of Oscar's, as well as the people in reception area.

title: Best Hotel for Family with kids
desc: One word Awesome! I would like to thank Diana and team for their kind assistance and arrangement for my stay at Conrad on 1 April to celebrate my kids' birthday. We had a pleasant and memorable stay. The kids are so happy that they keep requesting us to stay at Conrad again!

title: Awesome staycation!
desc: The COVID-19 Heightened Alert measure was announced just a few days before my staycation. And although I had a hard time liaising with KLOOK due to the high volume of enquiries they are facing. Rachel from Conrad Hotel called me and assisted and advised me on the alternate options available for my staycation. The package included Dinner & Breakfast buffet, but due to the measures, Dine-in is not permitted. Instead, we were given $80 of dining credits and our breakfast be served to our room. Check in process was a breeze and we felt very welcome. Requested for a late checkout at 2pm and was granted, really appreciate it. The room was spacious, cozy and with a nice view of the Kallang River. Was assigned a high floor at Level 25. Utilised the $80 dining credit by ordering

title: Family Staycation Package
desc: Hotel staff was very friendly. We like the program plans by the kids club, it keep the kids occupied only thing is have to book really fast. The program can be better like instead of just colour but make a craft e.g. kite and the baking can be different items. The kids love the tent in the room and the little thought of the night light. The room was spacious with the connecting room and super good view. Wonderful breakfast at Oscar restaurant. Convenient location just at night a bit noisy due to the cars.

title: Wedding Ceremony
desc: Had the best experience at Conrad Centennial Singapore from the planning to execution stage of my wedding. Despite the COVID-19 situation, sales manager Crescent made sure that our event still run as smoothly as possible and ensure that there is little to no monetary and benefits lost on our end. While attempting to check in, hiccups were quickly resolved with the help of both Crescent and the concierge, Glazia, ensuring my guests and I were checked in comfortably. On the day of my wedding, banquet manager Ali was helpful while ensuring safe management measures were met. Thanks to the banquet manager, one of the guest even commented that the wedding was "One of the most well planned banquet I have attended". The wedding run so smoothly that it started and ended right on

title: Great service, beautiful hotel!!
desc: The staff had wonderfully arranged a room with a great view during checking in as we had emailed them that it was our anniversary. The checking in process was extremely smooth and the staff had tried to accommodate to all requirements. We were also unable to make it for the hotel dinner and they were able to change it to the hotel lunch for us. The staff also told us that they were able to provide us with late check out, which made us even more delighted with our choice. Upon entering the room, we were greeted with gifts and a card from Conrad addressing to our anniversary. This was the first hotel we experienced that went above and beyond for their customers’ special day. The room and toilet is spacious and looks luxurious and the view was breathtaking, especially at

title: Awesome stay at conrad
desc: Awesome weekend stay here at Conrad, checking in was a breeze and to our surprise, our view from the room overlook the kallang river and fountain of wealth. Big window glass with nice view. Booking of pool slot was needed due to covid 19. Accidentally book gym slot(don’t know why) and the staff at the pool still allowed us for a swim which was really nice. Hotel amenities were perfect, with nice nespresso coffee to the nice bathroom. Will definitely be back for weekend stay since travelling is not possible at the moment.

title: Superb Staycay!
desc: Thank you Conrad for the wonderful staycay! Check-in was fuss-free with the booking of facilities and restaurants well communicated via email. Room was clean and very spacious with modern amenities. Breakfast and dinner at Oscars was delicious and very value for money. Special thanks to Danna (Reservations Team), Janeth & Kenny from Oscars, and not forgetting the Front Desk staff whom were all very friendly too! (Didn't get their name as there wasn't any name tag on their uniform)

title: Great Stay
desc: Great stay at Conrad under the Amex card promo. Check in was long - took about an hour when we reached at 3pm. However, they provided a late check out at 4pm the following day which made up for it - great service recovery in this aspect. The room was huge and super comfortable and we slept like log till 11am! Location was superb with its close proximity to Suntec City and Millenia Walk. The room had a great view as well. We got the one facing fountain of wealth at level 22. One of the best staycation and I do hope to return soon!

title: Family Escape Package
desc: By far the best hotel I have ever stayed. today is my 4th stay at this hotel within 6 months. Location is amazing. View is amazing. The staffs is amazing. Nothing more to ask. Thank you! I'll be back again some time soon! ❤️

title: Good for family staycation
desc: Very friendly staff. Good customer service. Rooms were spacious and comfortable. Good range of activities for kids. Crowd was well managed. Booked family package which consisted of two connecting rooms. Includes late checkout at 4 pm. Kids had fun baking a chocolate pound cake, which was delicious. There was a scavenger hunt and colouring session for them two. Good value for price at the Oscars restaurant. They were able to serve the orders promptly and food was good. Similarly for breakfast.

title: Best staycation!
desc: Room very spacious with sepearate bathtub and standing shower. The view is amazing and if you do not want to leave the room, room service is till 1am. Best part is the excellent service from false at the concierge counter and his team. Aika at the reception is friendly when I checkin. Will definitely return stay.

title: Excellent staycation experience
desc: Booked a day for a staycation with family. As I have arranged delivery of a bouquet of flowers, I have emailed the hotel's concierge team on this arrangement prior to the arrival. The The checking process is fast and the staff attending to me is very friendly. Participate in some kid's activity which requires us to explore the different part of the hotel. Every staff is met is very welcoming. You can see the smiles on every of the hotel staffs. The room is very spacious with an excellent view. Both my kids are so happy with the amount of spaces they have to run around. The toilet and bathroom facility are awesome too. Luxurious feeling. Wil returns for staycation again.

title: Good staycation hotel
desc: Front desk receptionist was polite and helpful. Upgraded us to a higher floor and corner unit for extra room space. Staff was polite and happy to serve. A happy and polite environment will make staycation experience unforgettable one! Will consider to come back if going for next staycation! Just need to upgrade the bed and pillow, way too soft for us.

title: amazing stay I had
desc: its was a girls hang out for me and my girls. room was really big with really nice sea facing view. We love the 5 course dinner especially at the Chinese restaurant. Service was really good and never slow. it really cheer our day from being unable to travel. My girls even said that we must do this every year

title: Nice family getaway
desc: Check in: Had early check in as Diamond so no queues. Noticed long queues during regular check in times. Strangely, the Hhonors elite queue was only available during off peak hours and on 1 of 3 days observed. Odd that priority check in is not available when it is needed the most. FHR welcome amenity of salted egg fish skin, fruit bowl and two canned drinks was a good variety. Room: well appointed room and bathroom. Good selection of TV channels. Speedy premium internet, good for video streaming. Marina bay views were gorgeous day and night and easily enjoyed from the gym length seating along the double windows. Multiple plugs for USB charging. Food: breakfast at oscars disappointed due to the limitation of one main course per person. Especially when the serving size was

title: Short lovely stay during locked down.
desc: Situated above Millennium mall/Marina Square, shops and food is everywhere. No fuss checking in, clean and well kept rooms. Lots of amenities, plush toys and well stocked mini-bar. View of the sea was excellent. Room was spacious. No chance to check out the restaurants within the hotel as it was in Locked Down stage.

title: Mother’s Day Celebration
desc: Booked this staycation for celebrating Mother’s Day and booked through Klook. It was a really good deal with buffet dinner and buffet breakfast. Best of all, it was applicable for Singapore Rediscover Voucher (SRV). Dinner was overall ok but with cold dishes (e.g. oyster etc) can only be ordered once, it was a pity as their cold dishes were really fresh. Breakfast was better with lots of choices to choose from for their sides. As we booked two rooms, we were able to get connecting rooms after emailing the hotel directly. The rooms were spacious and they even provide some welcome treats and a small teddy bear as a souvenir for us to bring back. Check in was a breeze, we went at around 1+ in the afternoon. The rooms were already for us. Really efficient. The hotel is

title: Wedding Lunch at Conrad Pavilion
desc: Just held my wedding lunch at Conrad Centennial Singapore. Special shoutout to my wedding coordinator, Crescent, for being super helpful and friendly, especially in the midst of Covid pandemic. Conrad was very flexible and helpful with all the changes and rules, even with last minute notice given by government. We were panicking and Crescent was always there for us, supporting us along the way. Not forgetting my banquet manager, Jason, who did an incredible job to ensure everything runs smoothly on the actual wedding day itself. No confusion or miscommunication of the handover from wedding coordinator to banquet manager. We literally did not have to worry or sweat about anything. Thanks to all the banquet staffs for their service and the staff (an elderly lady) who always

title: My 1st choice for staycation in Singapore...
desc: This was my 2nd staycation at Conrad. First time, I only stayed for a night while this time, I decided to stay for 2 nights in order to enjoy my staycation better and a bit longer. Check in was smooth and prompt, not crowded at the lobby which is a good thing. I booked a Premium King room for 2 nights with 1 night dinner buffet and a breakfast to celebrate my birthday, My son was so excited with the balloon and the bear once again in the room and it was really a cozy and comfortable room. View from the room was great. Just have a few things to highlight. I felt the food quality and selections can be further improve with more choices. As for the birthday cake, I felt it would be nicer sending to the room rather than self collection from the terrace cafe. Anyway, overall

title: Wonderful Coincidence
desc: My fiancée and I were there for some sort of an engagement celebration stay, but we did not inform the Front Desk as we did not want to "make use of it". But coincidentally, the staff who checked us in, whose name is Amirah, was friendly, polite and she and her team arranged a room with a Marina view despite not knowing that we were celebrating our engagement, it made our stay all the more pleasant. Thank you Conrad Centennial Team!

title: Fantastic
desc: Came for a one-night staycation and was amazed at what Conrad had to offer ! Have stayed in numerous 5 star hotels both locally and abroad but was still impressed with the amenities and above all, the high standard of service. The capacious bathroom especially highlighted the ergonomic design of all fittings. Double sinks, luxury Shanghai Tang toiletries, bath salts, the works. The room with a magnificent view of the Merlion and its environs was breathtaking both in the morning and night and we didn't have to specially request the high floor 21st. Bedside tables were large, equipped with USB and all controls. If one's to find fault, maybe an additional bin in the room, not just the bathroom. Especially appreciated was the gift set of 2 masks and sanitizers. We enjoyed the pool,

title: Best staycation in Singapore during covid.
desc: Had a staycation with my wife at Conrad Hotel Singapore. The check in staff was friendly and attentive. The suite was clean and neat. The staff at the executive lounge, Ms Gerlie and Ms Jane were really friendly and remembered you by name which make us feel like we are home. If you need a good massage, please try out the Conrad Spa at 4th floor and near to the pool. My wife strongly recommended masseur, Ms Katty. She is very attentive and skillful in providing her service. She is a profession masseur and addresses your needs for massage. My wife gave Ms Katty a 5 star service. A good staycation for a short getaway in Singapore during this covid period. May all stay safe and healthy.

title: Come for the warm service, classy rooms and understated luxury.
desc: Stayed and book through Klook SG"s Marvelicious staycay package which includes dinner for 2 on top of breakfast. Luxury isn't just what you see, it's what you feel. And at Conrad, you feel it in spades. TLDR: Come here to enjoy top class service, great rooms for both relaxing or having small gatherings, all in understated luxury that recharges your senses. There are enough reviews already mentioning this property’s great location, so I shall not belabour the point. We stayed in a Grand Deluxe King (basically, a Deluxe King on a higher floor facing Marina Bay, with a shorter sofa) on the 26th Floor. View is great, but is blocked by Pan Pacific and Parkroyal Collection Marina Bay. A stand out for me is the service. Older hotels like this property having public spaces that

title: Very good staycay
desc: Date: 17th May 2021 Saturday. Room: 2207 Location: Very near to the CBD.area. Just 5 minutes’ walk to the Promenade mrt station. Many shopping malls around with Suntec City malls & Millenia Walk literally opposite & a little bit further Marina Square as the nearest ones with just some 5-15 minutes’ walk. Other places of interest includes the iconic MBS Hotel structure, the Merlion statue, Gardens by the Bay & the nearby parks etc. Hotel rooms: Booked a Deluxe room via klook.com & was upgraded to a Premium room on the 22nd floor. The package included a breakfast & A-la-carte buffet dinner at their Oscars’ restaurant worth $139nett. However, due to the just initiated stringent Covid-19 measure, dine-in had been banned for a month. Thus the management see fit to replace this

title: Wonderful
desc: The location is great to visit the attractions in Marina Bay and Suntec shopping. Convenient to travel around for business and leisure. The crew displayed great coordination and hospitality. Also, the view from the hotel was great, where I am facing the fountain of wealth on my side. There were many famous restaurants for food delivery at my convenience. Love it!

title: Clean, spacious and friendly staff
desc: Room was clean and spacious with a good view. Staff were friendly and helpful and attentive. Food provided during my in room quarantine dining was good as it is not too salty. Was pleasantly surprised by the gesture of the staff with a hand written card and a gift, the day before the end of my quarantine. Thank you for your gift and good service.

title: Best SHN Experience
desc: My mother, toddler, and I served our SHN at Conrad Centennial and it has been a huge blessing! The team was always so polite and patient with us, and efficient in handling all requests. We never had to ask twice, or even wait long. The check in was done very professionally and any questions we had were answered well. Information and instructions given to us were clear and standardised across staff (other places have told my friends different things, depending on the person they ask). The meals were also varied and delicious, enjoyed by all three generations in the room. All our deliveries were sent to our room so quickly. The halfway mark cookies and farewell nanotizer we received were so thoughtful as well. Plus, the room was so spacious and luxurious that my toddler had a lot

title: SHN stay
desc: Room is spacious and comfy, bathtub is big and nice. Staffs were great and prompt. But equipments like the chiller and television are deteriorating. Smart TV but unable to access apps on it. Chiller was unserviceable unable to keep drinks overnight. Toilet stopper was loose and risk of exposing the nail.

title: good SHN
desc: spacious, excellent views, comfortable bed with good showers. Couldn't have wish for a better SHN hotel. Room was very clean, and quiet. Staff made sure the stay was comfortable. All in all, it did not feel like a quarantine but a 2 week staycation. Extremely grateful

title: SHN Stay
desc: Excellent service; Clean and Excellent room with beautiful view of the city center! Wish the rooms had openable windows to let in fresh air! Food offered was in line with our taste while considering our specific requirements!

title: Good experience
desc: I stayed here during my SHN. I have a super good experience over here. Nice place, clean and friendly staff. The view is nice. Staff are helpful. Room is clean and big. The tv and sofa is super big too.

title: Great SHN with Family
desc: We had a great experience during our 14 days quarantine (SHN). Checkin went smooth. Despite being locked in the room, the services given to us were beyond our expectation. The room we had was quite spacious for a family of 4 (we have 2 small kids < 3yo) and it has an amazing view of the city. The staffs were always been helpful and friendly. They acted very fast when our baby had a small accident in the room as he fell from the chair. They also handled every food/item delivery to our room very promptly. Such a pleasant experience.

title: Superb Wedding Dinner experience with Conrad
desc: We had our solemnisation at Conrad back in January 2021 and just this week we were back again for our wedding dinner banquet at their Grand Ballroom. We chose Conrad for many reasons and had a great experience with them. We loved the ballroom (high ceiling, pillar-less and nice chandeliers). The dinner food, prepared by their award winning restaurant Golden Peony, was really good. During our food tasting, the team at Conrad was very meticulous, their chef even joined us at the end of the tasting for feedbacks. Our guests had commented that they enjoyed the food very much and that the servings were very generous. We'd like to compliment our wedding co-ordinator and banquet manager. Throughout our planning, despite the many times we had to make changes to our date, our wedding

title: Great service even though mine was not a normal stay
desc: I am in the midst of SHN at Conrad because of a short 1.5 hr transit in Seattle, even though I spent a month in Canada (which allowed me stay-at-home). While restricted to my room, and without access to rest of the hotel's facilities and F&B, the service was still tip-top. Housekeeping, room service, concierge, courtesy were as usual. The room amenities, linen and towels remained the same as per normal stay. Request for utilities was quickly met. With 3 meals in bento sets prepared by the chef, these were sumptuous. I put on weight, despite working long WFH hours in room. The management and staff tried their utmost to make the stay as enjoyable as possible. Although this is partly a SHN hotel, I fully trust the team to execute their professional best. I have not written

title: Not recommended as wedding venue
desc: For couples getting married, you may want to avoid Conrad as your wedding venue. Hotel has been recontract multiple times as SHN hotel. We respect the decision in support of the covid-19 crisis but this is at the expense of wedding couples. Couples who book Pavilion are unable to proceed with their event. Couples who book Ballroom will need to stay at another hotel suite. The contract agreement are not to the favour of couple as review of agreement will be only 2-3 months before event date. Cancellation policy is not favourable to couples as well. Along with the inconvenience for being a SHN hotel, there is no additional incentive given to affected couples. At the same time, some perks are removed due to reduction of guests that Conrad can accommodate.

title: Great SHN experience
desc: A very comfortable stay at Conrad Centennial, even I forgot I’m doing SHN The food all good, from asian cuisine, western, even africa The bath facility is my the most favorite part of the hotel, but sometimes the water is not too hot. Thanks for the hospitality Best wishes for all the staff

title: Superb Conrad,
desc: Great room, great view. Felt luxurious. Excellent complementary champagne and afternoon tea in the executive lounge. Really loved this perq! Very good champagne also. One of the best Conrads that we’ve experienced and certainly the best Conrad in a city.

title: Not worth the cost
desc: Stayed there for 4D3N during year end holidays with family on a staycation. First impression was OK as they got confused with booking dates & rates. Enter room and things seem fine and got small goodie packs for us. However, huge disappointment during our stay of 4 days & 3 nights. The housekeeping is poor and it appears they just make the bed to show the room "cleaned". On day 2, the cleaning staff missed to see a "used diaper" that's left on the room floor as the only trash bin in the washroom was full and we just pushed it in to the side of the couch, visible but unreachable for my baby. On day 3, we were shocked to see all the food crumbs all over the carpet from last night's dinner. Also, so many other points indicating the room wasn't cleaned at all. That too, when we

title: Great staycation
desc: Stayed one night at Conrad at the end of Dec and had a wonderful time there! Staff were really polite and friendly and service was prompt. Room was also super spacious and there were free cookies and dried fruits available too, along with a sanitising kit packed with masks, alcohol wipes and hand sanitiser which was useful. Toilet was big with built-in speakers connected to the TV and bathtub was great too (there was a packet of bath salt provided, which was good). TV in room had a wide variety of channels and can be connected easily to laptop without cable as well. Buffet breakfast also had a satisfactory variety and was of decent standards. Only downside would be that some parts of the room weren't thoroughly cleaned - bathtub was slightly dusty and found hair inside, also

title: Fantastic end-of-year staycation
desc: We stayed for one night in December/2021 during a staycation and had a wonderful time even before reaching the property! On our way to the hotel, we got lost at the Suntec City Shopping Centre nearby and gave the hotel a buzz to ask for directions. Instead, their Senior Concierge Mr. Zulkifli came in person to escort us through the mall and into the hotel. Upon arrival, we received an upgrade to an Executive Room on the 31st floor as HHonors Diamond and were taken care of by the brilliant Executive Lounge team! In fact, the hotel had been assigned exclusively to quarantine guests for the best part of the last two years, therefore there's palpable excitement amongst staff to welcome back regular guests and tourists! Due to government restrictions, sitting time at the Executive

title: Great staycay
desc: Room is big and clean. Service staff from the front desk, bellboy, resturant to housekeeping are all professional and impeccable. Truly a five stars experience. Would certainly return for another staycation. The only area to improve (not sure if it’s just our room on the 8th floor), it takes really long for the water to get heated up in the bathroom.

title: Thank you Conrad
desc: Had a very stressful last quarter of the year esp with WFH. Before C19, I was already known to be a 'sleepless elite'. It was only when WFH started, I got more tired than ever and I was dying for a good sleep. I then recalled somewhere 10 years ago when I checked in at Conrad HK where I slept for a good whole day. No harm trying, I checked in at Conrad Centennial on eve of Christmas. And all I did was eat, watch TV and I had a great night sleep for over 10hrs for 2 nights in a row! I don't know why. Must be something with the bed. Haha. Other than that, the others are good too (staff, service, etc). Thank you Conrad. You are definitely on my favourite list! ❤️❤️

title: Good Location but hotel service and room could be better
desc: The front desk staff was not exactly friendly when I was checking in. I must add that there was no crowd when we checked in on Monday 27 Dec. I was trying to find my details on my mobile phone and looking lost when I was at the front desk. Instead of greeting and asking how she could be of help, she went on with her work until I told her I was checking in. After completing in the check in procedure; she asked for my credit card for a deposit. I realised that the amount charged was more than the cost of my 3 nights stay and she did not bother to explain the reason till I had to check my own bill and asked for the reason. I find her service and approach simply unacceptable for a 5 star hotel. When we arrived at our room, there was a mouldy scent and a couple of spots of mould on

title: Good location; great staff - poor access to facilities
desc: Not a good location for staycation due to very limited access to facilities. In dining options not meant for those with dietary restrictions. Room has a funky, dried smell typically caused by non occupancy and we bought an air freshener (reeds) to counter the smell. Children got bored.

title: Simply wonderful stay!!!
desc: A perfect stay from check in to check out. Reservation made via American Express and all in order on arrival. Introduce to the duty manager and welcomed. Benefits of the Hilton Honor’s Diamond Card explained and preference times for lounge usage established. Room was excellent with all amenities on the executive floor. The bed was wonderfully comfortable and the bathroom had all that was needed for a pleasant stay including a nice bathtub. Restaurant facilities at the hotel are excellent and I dined at Oscar’s daily for breakfast and took dinner there on the last night of my stay. Wonderful food. Service was excellent and I could not have wanted for anything. An exceptional stay.

title: Lobby Lounge
desc: We enjoyed our hi tea at Conrad lobby lounge. Melody, Lemuel and Krish is wonderful and out of this world! They are helpful attentive and meticulous. San and Gerlie is very sweet with the kids too ❤️ The kids enjoy the session. Highly recommend!

title: Awesome Wedding Experience
desc: We chose Conrad to be our wedding venue in Aug 2020 and held our solemnisation in Oct 2021 and lunch reception in Dec 2021. Throughout this period, our wedding coordinator, Ms Fiona Chong, was very responsive to our queries, always replying to our many concerns, queries and changes promptly. A big thank you note to Fiona! Conrad’s grand ballroom is stunning (pillarless, beautiful chandeliers, big centre and side LED screen). Food was individually portioned with generous serving, nicely decorated, delicious and served hot from kitchen. Our banquet manager, Mr Lourenz, was helpful and attentive, he make sure that the whole event ran smoothly. The service from the entire banquet team was top-notched. A big shout out to Lourenz and his team! The stay after our wedding reception

title: Excellent Stay
desc: Everything was topnotch. We loved our room, it had a very nice view of the fountain of wealth in Suntec City. Location is conveniently near malls, restaurants, MRT and bus stops. The buffet breakfast is something we always look forward to. Will definitely be coming back!

title: Pleasant stay
desc: We booked for one night staycation at Executive room. Staff at executive lounge were friendly and attentive. We had our breakfast the next day at Oscar and lunch at Golden Peony. Both were really nice.

title: Wonderful experience
desc: Here for the Christmas weekend stay. Excellent guest relations. Staff was attentive to requests. Was particularly packed due to long holiday weekend, but the staff remain calm and kept a smile throughout the check in process. Cleanliness standard was very good. Room feels fresh and welcoming. Keep up the good work!

title: Wedding banquet
desc: Hotel staff were very friendly when we checked in to the hotel. Service level is top notch and efficient. Ali and team was there to ensure the whole event is going on smoothly as planned. No regrets holding our banquet at Conrad!

title: Huge Room. Excellent Service.
desc: Huge room with plenty of amenities. Good view of Marina Bay. Excellent service by the staff at the executive lounge. They pampered us and made our wedding anniversary a memorable one. Love the pool. The gym is cleaned and well equipped.

title: Staycation hangover
desc: One of the best hotels we’ve stayed for our staycations. Checking in/out was a breeze. Front office staff (Linda) was friendly & professional. Gave us a complimentary upgrade of our room. Even took the time to text us & enquire how was our room, after checking in for some time. Room was spacious, bright & clean, with a nice view of The Fountain of Wealth (Suntec City). Floor carpet feels fresh & clean. Bed was comfy. Aircon, lightings, curtains & drapes controls are simple to use & adjust (unlike some hotels). Bathroom was clean & well designed. Complete with full good quality toiletries. Extra towels (more than enough) were available at hand. Dining at the Oscars for breakfast was fine. Quite a good spread of varieties. Staff was pleasant & helpful, even under immense pressure

title: Bad way to end
desc: We booked two adjoining rooms for four nights for our family of five. It was the perfect arrangement for us. The lady checking us in was very professional and kind and made sure we got the adjoining rooms. The service was good. They brought kid robes at our request. We were able to book the pool slots that we needed. The server brought ice water for each of us without us having to ask. Breakfast at Oscar's was good. The service for the drinks was a bit slow. Our last night there, we decided to splurge and eat the dinner buffet at Oscar's too. Two of our kids ordered a la carte while one ate the buffet. We ordered two scoops of ice cream. On the menu it said it was $10 for 2 scoops or $6 for one scoop. We ordered two scoops. When checking the bill, they charged us $12. When I

title: Great service!
desc: Celebrating my mother’s birthday here at the Conrad Centennial has become a yearly affair now since the pandemic started. We really enjoy the service and amenities available at this property. Staff were very courteous right from the front desk (Shoutout to Peggy who checked us in!), to the breakfast buffet.

title: Amazing service and stay
desc: Beautiful upscale luxury comfortable room. Very well maintained. We got the 2 bedroom with living area Views from 28 th floor amazing with 270 degree view. Complimentary executive lounge afternoon tea not to be missed. Full 3 tiers of finger sandwiches, small cakes and scones. Unlimited if you would seconds. Breakfast buffet extensive high quality Asian with usual Bacon, sausage egg waffle pancake. Fruit sweet Hami melon watermelon pineapple. Cold oat cereal and yogurt Ice cream too! If u r Diamond member you have enough complimentary high quality food for the day. You could even eat dinner with drinks between 5 And 7 pm although we skipped that so we can go out to hawker markets Concierge extremely helpful. Muhammad ??? Not sure about his name went above and beyond when he

title: Awesome Wedding Banquet
desc: Thanks to Fiona for her wonderful service in helping us to prepare for our big day during this pandemic period with so much uncertainties. Thanks to Sethu and team for ensuring our wedding dinner went smoothly as planned. The hotel staffs were very friendly and attentive. The service level is simply top notch. Period.

title: Great stay!
desc: Booked a staycation in Conrad for a Birthday Staycation and Aika (I hope I got her name right) was very accommodating and friendly during the check in process! Thank you so much Aika! We will be back in March for our wedding and we are looking forward to yet another memorable stay in the Hotel!

title: Best stay ever
desc: Room on the higher floor had great views. Room size was good. The beds were so comfortable. Service was excellent. They even provided epson salt for the bath tub. They gave free cookies and dried fruits. Overall I really enjoyed the stay.

title: Beststaycayever
desc: Loved how the hotel staffs arranged for me and my husband a special arrangement for our wedding anniversary and they even gave us a free room upgrade! The staffs are warm n welcoming! The view from my room was a die for.

title: So good to be back!!
desc: It's been a couple of years since our last stay due to the pandemic and we were so delighted to return to our home in Singapore! The service was exceptional on every level as always. The hotel is also going the extra mile to ensure the safest and cleanest environment for all its guests. We particularly loved spending time in the Executive Lounge and it was so such a treat to see some of the old faces who made us feel so welcome every time we visited. Great attentive pool service also. Thank you Conrad Singapore for making our anniversary stay so special. Extra special thanks to Shar Mayn, Mark, Christina (Executive Lounge), Kai (Recreation Manager), Melody and Tweet (Oscars) - you all did such a great job in making our stay so perfect. We will see you all again soon!! Very best

title: Back again for Birthday Staycation
desc: Stayed last year with my family for a birthday celebration and we are back again. The service is just as good as the previous times. Shoutout to Danna from the reservations team, for helping me in arranging the room arrangements and also for a cake to celebrate the occasion. We have reserved a Centennial Suite room and an Executive Room. The rooms are spacious, well decorated and maintained, together with comfortable beds. The amenities provided are of good quality too. The daily high tea at the Executive Lounge is awesome, together with the impressive service by the friendly staff there. You feel so welcome at the lounge. What's different from the last year, is that the lounge is now open as usual for only for tea and the evening cocktail, they are also open from 8pm to 10pm

title: great birthday staycay!
desc: I brought my sis and her baby (my niece) here for my sis 30th birthday. Our booking came with $100 dining credit so we booked afternoon tea at the lobby lounge at 1pm on our check in day, the hotel kindly let us check in at 12noon so we may put our bags down before tea. There was a little bit of a queue at check in but we checked in within 20mins. the baby crib was already in the room and there was even birthday decor on the bed! they also provided a card that we can redeem a cake. The hotel provided baby amenities (soap, powder, etc) in the toilet. Breakfast was so yummy and really good, a proper buffet line where staff helps you to take the food, go early though because the queue got really long at 10am. Overall we had a wonderful staycaytion and would love to come back

title: A grand and traditional hotel.
desc: On entering the hotel you can only be impressed by the grand, traditional foyer and sweeping staircase. Everything about the Conrad leans to old school, traditional style and comfort; this includes the rooms. Our room had a king size bed and sofa/banquette along the window. The bed was super comfy and the bedding was crisp and inviting; as were the jumbo padded slippers! We had complimentary treats on our arrival which we enjoyed with the nespresso coffee from our machine. Checkin was swift and professional: all staff was friendly and attentive. We happened to give some feedback on the quality of the breakfast buffet and this was addressed immediately: staff was eager to improve. We mentioned oatmeal porridge and granola would be a welcome addition to breakfast, and it was

title: Hotel with great service standard and excellent room.
desc: Stayed one night in the Executive Room for my husband birthday. It comes with afternoon tea, evening drinks and breakfast. The lady at the front desk Yuki is extremely professional, helpful, patient and friendly. The hotel room is well equipped, tastefully designed with a great view. The location of the hotel is excellent. Totally enjoyed our stay. Highly recommended!

title: Wedding
desc: Attended my friend’s wedding on 12 Feb 2022 & as a bridesmaid and coordinator for the day, I would like to especially thank Imran (banquet manager) for being such a great person to work with. Imran has been so comforting towards the couple and reassuring them that they are all well. As a first time coordinator, I’m very anxious that things does not go well but he was always there helping and guiding me throughout the event. He has been so accommodative and with his humorous jokes, it definitely calm me and the couple down. I couldn’t emphasize how fantastic he was. Alongside with his other team members (AV, hotel managers & staff) I’m deeply appreciative of your services and each of you made such a memorable day for me and the couple. Top notch service from the Conrad team! Well

title: Amazing!
desc: I booked this hotel on the 27th of February to enjoy a '2nd Honeymoon' with my husband as we most nice hotels were closed for SHN during our wedding season. The moment we stepped into the lobby, my mind was blown! It had the look and feels of luxury comparable to Ritz Carlton. We were attended to by Peggy at the front desk and she was so friendly and helpful. She made sure we got a good room and also ensured to explain to us every detail that we needed for our stay. The room itself was beautiful, clean and spacious. I was so delighted to find a cute conrad bear and some cookies and last but not least a cute rubber Ducky!! Even though it was not specially done for us (we didnt tell the hotel that we were celebrating our 2nd Honeymoon), it still gave us a great impression and

title: Exceptional hospitality by highly devoted staff members
desc: I had a fantastic time at the hotel. Checking in was swift and professional. The lovely lady who served us was very friendly, attentive and helpful when it came to rectifying issues with my reservation and she went that extra mile to make my birthday stay even better. Our first stop was the Lobby Lounge for afternoon tea. Our host, who we didn't get his name, seated us and introduced the menu. He went through each item in detail and explained them to us. And also thanks for the birthday cake surprise! It was very much appreciated. The room was gorgeous and even had treats for us. There's a cute bear on the bed, lots of spaces for our stuff, and a rubber ducky in the bathtub. I found the customer service in the executive lounge to be superb. The host introduced us to the

title: Fantastic Presentation of Hi tea
desc: The hi tea lounge was set in a relax ambience. The cakes are crafted beautifully and the tarts taste fantastic. Dining in time was 2 hrs which is more than enough. It was perfect place for friends to catch up.

title: Comfortable Refreshed Centennial Suite
desc: The refreshed 63m2 Conrad Centennial Suite was renovated in 2018, exuding a minimalistic and clean vibe throughout the entire suite. Gone were the outdated and clustered furnishings that made the suite feels smaller. The last time I stayed in the Conrad Centennial Suite was in 2014 when the décor feels outdated even for 2014. I liked this refreshed feel of the suite, which brings out the true size of the Conrad Centennial Suite. The living room is the first part of the suite that greets us as we enter through the main entrance to the Conrad Centennial Suite, which is undoubtedly the largest part of the suite. Gone were the ugly yellow walls with dated furniture, replace them are the more contemporary beige coloured walls and minimalistic lounging furniture. I like the refreshed

title: definitely below standard
desc: The first staff we met in the morning was arrogant and unwelcoming. No eye contact at all when she asked about the passports and didn’t bother to reach out her hand to catch them as handing over to her. She kept looking her screen when she talked to us for about 2 minutes. When we asked if there was a non-connecting room on higher floor, we were told only the one she offered was complimentary for our early check-in. Actually we were invited to check in at 10-ish from the hotel reservation 2 weeks before arrival because it was to avoid the busy crowd from 11am-3pm. It was not we came in early and asked for it. And she just kept saying No on our request for a room change. She gave no details on the benefits like dining credit or breakfast time to us, no explanation on anything.

title: Great Stay!
desc: Stayed for one night. Check in was seamless. Peggy from the Front Office was friendly & professional explaining every detail i needed to know during my stay. Was assigned the highest floor as my booking is made for the executive room with club benefits. Room is ok & comfortable. It has a nice long sofa. Thanks for the birthday surprise! Very much appreciated. I would also like to commend the Executive lounge staff particularly Helmi. He was affable & helpful. Thanks for the birthday mocktail. Also to Christina, the amiable lady at the desk who greeted me enthusiastically. I truly had a wonderful stay.

title: Great location and excellent service for room reservation
desc: It was a 14day stay at Conrad for my family due to renovation works at home. We were met with great flexibility in terms of adjustment of dates according to our renovation schedule changes. Thanks to reservation officer Diana for the coordination. During the stay, the housekeeping team also met our expectations with our calls for room amenities especially with complimentary drinking water and buckets of ice for consumption! Parking was also easy with direct access to hotel lobby from carpark. Location of hotel was accessible to many shopping malls and tourist spots.

title: Positive Experience
desc: Service with a smile. Attention to details right from the reservation and all the way to check-out. Staff reached out to me to check if things were alright. Breakfast was reasonable despite the current climate. The Hilton app is definitely a good too. Multiple purposes.

title: Underrated Modern Luxury Hotel at the Heart of Singapore
desc: I spent a night at Conrad and I must say that everything was excellent. I initially booked a Grand Deluxe room but requested for an upgrade to one of their club rooms. I hadn’t had much expectations coming to Conrad seeing that most of the hotels in the same stretch were mostly in need of an update but I have to say that the quality of the service and rooms really surpassed my expectations. The lobby was beautifully decorated with art and was exactly what I would expect from a luxury hotel like Conrad. The room was huge and incredibly modern and classy, and the amenities from Byredo were a huge plus. The hotel’s commitment to be more sustainable was applaudable because unlike most hotels, they didn’t use the good cause to cut corners—but instead provided simple yet good

title: Fabulous staycation
desc: Nice hotel with quality taste, professional yet friendly staff, well organised and good central location. Nice gesture to upgrade my room to higher floor with nice views and deliver a cake to celebrate spouse birthday

title: Great Suite but disappointing Executive Lounge F&B
desc: Pre-arrival – I received the “new” pre-upgrade email 3 days prior – and the app showed my Deluxe King had been upgraded to Executive King (room details). I then decided to write in to politely if there is any chance for a Centennial King Suite – and they were kind enough to say yes! Room – My Centennial King Suite (63SqM), 2401, was quite nice! Its not the biggest Suite I’ve tried but I like very much the smart design and layout which made the space completely functional. Most of the Suite was clean except for the toilet bowl where I spotted some stains and hair – UGH. A quick SMS to the above-mentioned message thread requesting for housekeeping to come by and clean it again was acknowledged quickly and when came back in the evening, it was spotless. An apology note from the

title: Nice to be back
desc: Everything is good from arrival till departure. Staff at Front Desk, Executive Lounge, Restaurant, etc…is incredible. One thing that I would like Conrad Centennial Singapore to consider is breakfast. We found that there is less variety especially guest who stay more than 3 nights. Everything is the same expect Asian counter.

title: Able to accommodate early check in (6am)
desc: I wanted to stay at the Conrad again as it was conveniently located, close to shops and restaurants. Staff were very accommodating - allowed me access to my room early (6am). I did complain about the AC in my room- wasn't cold enough. Water in shower took a long time to heat up - shame had to waste all that water. Ironing board collapsed when I was using it - luckily was able to complete my ironing using bench in front of TV. AC and water was fixed immediately. Not sure about ironing board. Some mould in bathroom. Love the large bottles of shampoo and conditioner

title: Large rooms, well maintained hotel
desc: I’ve stayed at this hotel many times in the past on business trips to Singapore but haven’t been back in 10 years. The service is as good as it always has been. Rooms are large and meticulously maintained. They have high end toiletries and I love the welcome food and drinks the hotel had in the room for us. The hotel also provided a pack with a mask and hand sanitizer which most hotels no longer provide in 2022. The only thing I don’t love is the breakfast. Not much nice choices, people who worked there were very grumpy.

title: Was better before
desc: Been staying at the Conrad for years, and this was first time back after over two due to lack of travel. A number of things fell well short of expectations. Several times tried to reach the operator / concierge but no one picks up. Was served rotten fruits as part of their fruit platter. Things were not put away in the room post cleaning, so had to do it myself. Walls are thin and loud music made sleeping difficult, but when i tried to call the front desk - no one picks up. So all and all - it was fine. Gym was nice - pool great. Food was average but also fine. Staff are generally friendly in person. But i'm going to think twice before coming back

title: Great stay in Singapore
desc: Excellent short stay in Singapore. Great service, accommodation and staff. Quality breakfast in a wonderful restaurant. Excellent location as well. Outstanding executive lounge (and staff) for the Diamond Members. Will be back again for sure.

title: Friendly and relax.
desc: The location and services are all good. Lots of shops and restaurants around there, in suntec bld. staff is really friendly and helpful. Though Price is a bit high. Btw, overall, it is good choice for a quality stay in SG for both family and business.

title: Great to be back
desc: It's great to be back after COVID. Refurbished rooms are nice but agree with so many of the other comments re use of space. Staff are as wonderful as ever. Hotel was quiet and pool needed to be booked.

title: Comfortable and convenient hotel
desc: This premium hotel under the Hilton chain is a very convenient location for both business and leisure travellers, or even local guests to explore the nearby sights on foot during a staycation. Rooms are comfortable and some have an amazing view.

title: Convenient & Comfortable
desc: We chose to stay at the Conrad Centennial for a 4 day break on our way to the UK due to it's convenient location. There are 3 shopping centres around the hotel and an MRT station around the corner. The staff are all very friendly and welcoming and our check-in and check-out were seamless. Our room was of a generous size with a large bathroom with walk in shower and separate bathtub. A disappointing factor was no fresh or long life milk in the room's minibar - only powdered creamer. The mattress was very firm but there was a pillow menu that we were able to order from. We were on a high floor but could still hear loud music every night from a neighouring shopping centre stage. Our rate included breakfast and unfortunately we were unable to have room service and had to go

title: Best hotel experience ever
desc: We stayed at Conrad Centennial Singapore for 2 nights and we had the most amazing hotel experience ever This is just a few things that we loved in the hotel: * Our room was very spacious, comfortable and clean. We really felt the luxury of the hotel and also the views were breathtaking. * All the staff was very professional, nice and kind. They really know how to take care of their guests. We felt really special the way that everyone treated you. * All amenities well cleaned and very pleasant (pool, gym, restaurant and lobby). * Perfect location just a short walk from the Singapore bay and close to the bus stop. * Loved the fact they have towels (gym and pool) and complementary water at the gym and room. Nespresso machine at the room it's a very nice touch. * The breakfast

title: Outstanding service
desc: Very very happy with the Conrad Centennial. We would definitely stay there again. The location is excellent. We stayed for 7 nights. The room was very clean The breakfast was good, there was plenty of choices and the contents had small changes each day, the quality and service was excellent. All the staff we interacted with were polite, friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. It is very convenient to shopping, food and the sights.

title: Weekend Breakfast
desc: Stopped by for another breakfast now that buffet is full service. It keeps getting better with great service on a busy morning. Local dishes have great quality reminding one of days past. Thanks to Daniel Wong and all the service staff. Kudos to the chefs for great preparation.

title: Recommend
desc: The room was clean and healthy. The food was delicious (breakfast, lunch). The view is gorgeous. The location is very nice. Thank you all of yours staffs, they are so professional. I was very impressed.

title: Great Staycations
desc: Stayed in Conrad few times. This is my favorite hotel in Singapore by far. The staff are super friendly and helpful. Always feel at home every time i stay here. This time celebrate my daughter's birthday. She was so happy with the surprise decorations in the room. Shout out to Guest Experience team to the beautiful deco and Front Office Team for the amazing room allocation. We have an amazing view.

title: Lovely stay at Singapore after 2 years of pandemic
desc: We had a great stay at Conrad. Below are the summary: Likes - Staffs are very friendly and helpful - Location wise nears so many attraction. It’s near mall as well so you could shop and grab a bite without taking any taxi - Wifi is adequate - I got the premier room for 2 adults and 1 kid. Quite spacious. Overlooking the bay. The view is nice Can be improved - We stayed 4 days and the breakfast menu rarely changed - There is no bidet shower

title: Staycation
desc: Returning to stay after our wedding to celebrate my birthday, we requested for a complimentary upgrade on our 2nd night but was declined even though the room was available. The staff at the counter then told us that the last time we were granted was because we held our wedding here and it definitely brushed us off the wrong way. So now that we are returning and we are not having our wedding we are not prioritised? That being said, I requested to speak to their duty manager and she offered a preferential rate with breakfast for the upgrade and we took it. Started off our birthday staycation unhappy what a way to go with customer service. We will think twice as to wanting to returning again.

title: Good stay
desc: The hotel is centrally located close to trains n malls. Great service from arrival check in. Very helpful even to guide us through on hilton honours sign up. Food for room service was delicious. However breakfast is average at best. Housekeeping was great n meticulous

title: Satisfied Stay
desc: 2 days business trip. Near to Suntec and MBS. Requested for an early check-in due to my early flight, got an upgrade including the early check-in. Bravo Conrad and lucky me. Room is clean, amenities is good and breakfast is good. Will definitely return.

title: Cosmopolitan singapore
desc: It has a clean welcome, a spacious room, and a nice swimming pool. We stayed with my daughter and husband. I recommend both family travelers and business travelers who come alone. Pretty Conrad teddy bears and nice snacks are very touching.

title: Awesome stay!!
desc: Stayed 5 nights in June 2022. We really enjoyed our stay - the location is fantastic in the Marina Bay area, service is great, great rooms (although relatively small compared to the USA). Upgraded to high floor as Diamond, lounge access and complimentary breakfast at the restaurant. Memorable stay, highly recommend and I'd not hesitate to stay again if in Singapore. Shout out to Fasle at the Concierge desk, who went out of his way to help us!

title: Excellent Service
desc: Our first family trip post COVID was our first time in Singapore. We stayed at the Conrad for 5 nights and had a wonderful time. Service and amenities were excellent. Breakfast buffet was excellent with many options and is mostly self-serve. One tip is that their restaurants can be filled for dinner, so if you interested in dining there, consider making reservations in advance. Instead we ended up having some in-room dining which was very convenient and still delicious. Rooms were spacious and very quiet. They were able to accommodate our family of 4 with two connecting rooms which was very convenient. Location is excellent - close to an subway station. We also visited two different malls which are just one block and two blocks away (in opposite directions). We had

title: Excellent service and location
desc: Spectacular service from everyone working at the Conrad. I stayed here for a week while attending a conference and enjoyed it very much. Rooms are well-kept, the location is close to the metro and the convention center, and the staff goes above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. The only downside is that the hotel bar closes early, around 10:30pm. I am used to hotel bars staying open until at least 1 or 2am. The Executive lounge staff deserves special kudos for being attentive, prompt, and kind. The service in the exec lounge is excellent!

title: Not all that impressed
desc: Just checked in this morning after a very long trip from YYZ. Got to the hotel at around 830am. Luggage carted off. Checked in. Was given no information on room service, breakfast options. Room on 13th floor. Small...showing wear and tear. Mattress on one bed is lopsided. Had requested 2 bears in room but only one. When requested at front desk later, was given 2nd bear and duck. Luggage took forever and had to call to find out where it was. Ice and water requested, delivered promptly. Checked out pool. Kids got in but snooty woman told off younger one for jumping into pool near her as it splashed her. Bearing in mind, hes 10 and she was sitting on lounge chair at least 6 ft away from him. I got him to stay away from that side of pool and not jump in but this is a "family

title: Out-of-this-world experience
desc: The pictures speak for themselves. Aside from the filthy bathroom, the air conditioning was set to automatically turn itself off every hour or so. They probably thought that you'd be asleep and wouldn't miss the air conditioning, and they'd save on electricity. Singapore is perpetually hot and humid, even at night. The room warms quickly when the air conditioning turns off. You gotta jump in and out of bed every hour to turn it back on. My wife and I packed and left the hotel at 3 am.

title: Pleasant staycation
desc: My 50th birthday celebration was a quiet affair but nonetheless luxurious, with the warm hospitality of the well-trained & experienced staff of Conrad singapore from front desk check-in, gym, executive lounge, concierge & Oscars. Have been frequenting this property for > 20 years and good to see such loyalty which translated to professionalism in customer satisfaction. Breakfast spread is good, buffet lunch at Oscars is of quality & decent variety. The cakes at the terrace at simply the best.

title: Great hotel
desc: I tagged along as my husband had business to attend to in Singapore. The location of this hotel is close enough to walk to most tourist attractions such as the the Gardens, the flyer, Chinatown, the merlion, a drink art raffles bar, etc. (even though the weather is hot).The hotel itself is very nice, it is clean, those working here are very friendly and kind . The pool is super large and the perfect temperature. The included breakfast buffet is the best that I ever ever seen, I doubt very much that anyone could walk away not being satisfied. I couldn't complain about a single thing.

title: Excellent stay in Singapore
desc: I had a wonderful stay at the Conrad in Singapore. The rooms were very nice and I appreciate the upgrade. Staff were very good especially Girlie V. at the Executive Lounge. There was an excellent spread for breakfast as well. Good choices.

title: Superb
desc: This hotel keeps up with the general Conrad standard of excellence. Great position near to Raffles and the Marina Bay area means you have access to shops, restaurants and the hop on/ hop off bus terminal.

title: Extra mile service of the staff. Good food
desc: The room okok but the service fantastic. They prepare the room for my baby. Got baby cot, teddy bear and rubber ducky 🥰. Also got some treats for my kids. We really enjoyed our stay here. The food is also nice. Its near in suntec city so we manage to do allot of shopping which is very convenient coz when ur tired u can just go back to ur room to rest.

title: Excellent Location & Friendly Staff
desc: I will definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who enjoys excellent hospitality from he reception team, the concierge and cleaners they really did make my stay one to remember. The hotel is centrally located with easy access to the mall and public transport systems to explore Singapore. I will be back here again the next time I visit Singapore

title: High tea @ Conrad
desc: The staff gave such great service that we need to tell everyone! My friends have not met for years and we have lots to catch-up. We had high tea that was from 330pm to 530pm. The manager offered to let us sit outside the lounge and gave us a pot of tea. We ended up staying till 1030pm ordering supper! The place was so cosy that we forgot about the time. The manager offered to top up cold water and never once disturb us. Such rare and superb service! This place is wonderful!

title:
Excellent from
Start to finish.
desc: What can I say. This hotel went above and beyond for one of of the most demanding travelers out there! I hate long flights but we just might be planning another trip to the Conrad hotel in Singapore in the future. I want to adopt Fenny home with me as she is the sweetest ever. Honorable mention goes to Glaiza at the Concierge desk!! Most of all we love Ooi Shar Mayn whose sweet presence does not go unnoticed. Not only is she lovely but gracious, helpful, and most accommodating. My 19 year old and I had an amazing trip. The young bellhop was also handsome and amazing! Thank you to the Conrad hotel for outstanding care.

title: poor service
desc: checking took me so long and with kids arriving late night when counter not busy, still the girl took years to issue key cards. restaurant ice cream counter lady throw the ice bow since i ask to add 2 scoops of ice cream for my kids at breakfast buffet.

title: Excellent Services, Highly Recommend
desc: Highly recommended hotel in Singapore, with a pleasant and great stay experience with my boyfriend here. The hotel with a great arrangement for our anniversary, with a lot of complementary service like free local telephone service, free consumption vouchers, free snacks. The hotel is very convenient there are some bars and Suntec City is nearby. 強烈推薦的新加坡酒店，與我的男朋友在這裡度過了愉快而美好的住宿體驗。 酒店為我們的周年慶精心安排，提供免費本地電話服務、免費消費券、免費小吃等許多配套服務。 酒店非常方便，有一些酒吧，新達城就在附近。

title: Great room size with awesome view
desc: Room are of a larger size than normal hotel. With great view daily! Be it night or day! As can see the merlion, singapore flyer and part of MBS. Rooms are very clean and also great service by hotel staff.

title: Fabulous !
desc: Absolutely fabulous hotel - Everyone went the extra mile to make the guest feel home. Really appreciated the upgrade to the suite as a Diamond member. The view at the executive lounge is breathtaking and again the staff couldn't have done more. Also, a special shout out to the cleaners - the room was not only spotless, but they also went out of their way to hang up the clothes in the wardrobe. Would highly recommend the hotel and will stay again for my next visit.

title: Think this Conrad needs to be renovated
desc: The hotel is nice but definitely old and needs upkeep. We paid for a Grand Deluxe and got the room furthest from the lift by the emergency staircase. The air conditioning in the room makes a constant loud humming sound and on closer inspection you can see black dust at the grates of the air con. The area around the air con had black spots, not sure if its mould. The bathroom has 2 sinks - great for couples but 1 of the sink is clogged. The rainshower metal head is rusted and there are mould in the shower. The sofa area is great for lounging but it has a smell? Feel very disappointed with the standard of the room.

title: Fantastic stay at the Conrad Singapore
desc: My wife and I were celebrating her 30th birthday and this hotel went above and beyond to make it extra special. From decorating our room and gifting her an amazing birthday cake to allowing us early check to our room after a 16hour flight from the United States. Thank you for all the amazing service and the complimentary upgrade.

title: Great staycay location with excellent service :)
desc: Just had a great staycation experience where the room was comfy and spacious with complimentary snacks like cookies. The view from the 11th floor was pretty too and we really like the big windows. But more importantly, service was superb with a smooth check in process, friendly housekeeping staff, and prompt service crew at the breakfast buffet. Special shoutout to Linden at the Front Office for the extra care and thoughtful service, super appreciate the effort! P:S Also super love the cute touches like the little teddy and rubber duck in the room :)

title: Good hotel
desc: Stayed here for 4 nights on business. The check in was efficient and thank you for the early check in. The room was spacious and well appointed. The housekeeping also did a good job.Room service was also good. A couple of issues with the hotel- the wait time for breakfast is too much- On an average I had to wait 10 min or more to get a table. The check out took long for no reason but overall a good stay.

title: Excellent service
desc: Location is convenient as there are many restaurants, shopping malls nearby. Hotel service is excellent, I would like to thank Ms. Ivy who did the check-in process for us, she has extended an extra mile to upgrade my room and I was surprised to see the birthday decoration in my room, greatly appreciated! The room is spacious and clean, comfy bed and nice view! The buffet breakfasts variety at Oscar restaurant could be better but the staff are very friendly and attentive! Overall, I have a wonderful staycation, thanks Conrad Centennial Singapore!!

title: Conrad Singapore
desc: We stayed one night on the 30th floor in an executive room with access to the lounge. Everyone we met, from the front desk to the staff in the executive lounge on the 31st floor (especially Ryan, Ms Penny) were very professional and friendly. There are lots of shops and restaurants/bars within walking distance, and an MRT station nearby. Hotel has a swimming pool and a gym room as well. Our room by the elevators was relatively spacious, with enough space to accommodate an extra bed which were provided without extra charge. View from the room faces the sea/marina. Bathroom has a bathtub and walk-in shower. Water pressure was good on the high floor, and the room was quiet so we all slept well. Room was very clean and we love the fluffy room slippers, LOL. Breakfast buffet at

title: Great service, great room, ok location
desc: This hotel has great service, the room was very clean with a bog bathroom. You see that they thought about the small things. The spa was also nice, a bit pricy, but not too much. Breakfast was great, and the service there was also good. I think that the only thing I would mention is that the location is walking distance from places, but around 15-20 mins, which can be a struggle sometimes in Singapore weather. Overall I think it is a great place.

title: Wonderful 5 night stay and the best Singapore slings in town
desc: The Conrad was exceptionally wonderful! We stayed 5 nights with lounge access so we enjoyed breakfast in the lounge or at Oscar’s when we wanted more variety. We also made it to afternoon tea a few times, but did not have a chance to try the pre dinner cocktails. We were celebrating our anniversary so were surprised with lovely decorations and yummy snacks. Every staff encounter was on point and helpful. We did have drinks one evening at the bar with friends and the Singapore slings were the best. I’m told they were made with 60ml of Beefeaters gin instead of the usual 30ml. Being in Suntec City was very convenient to shops and food. All in all would love to return!

title: Perfect Singapore stay!
desc: An outstanding experience! Exceptional service and hospitality. Had a very early check in and the staff honored the request! Very child friendly with all amenities and facilities close by! The concierge service was wonderful, guiding us throughout our stay and had excellent recommendations. Hats off to the wonderful staff and truly world class experience.

title: Very nice 5 star hotel. I would definitely recommend and return.
desc: Well located near Marina Bay and public transport links. I had a large, modern and comfortable executive room on the 27th floor, with a great view over the city. Nice bathroom with luxury toiletries. All public areas, including the lobby, bars and restaurant are really nice spaces and feel classy and upscale, with modern decor and furnishings. Great professional and friendly service throughout from all staff, especially in the executive lounge, where we were well looked after. The lounge offered a good selection of drinks during the happy hour, including beers, wine, prosecco and spirits, which were all served to the table. The hot and cold snacks were also varied and tasty. Very good buffet breakfast in the main restaurant. Didn't use the gym or outdoor pool, but both

title: Superb stay in a great location
desc: Great stay. The staff was super accommodating from check in to check out. The breakfast was superb and, like most things in Singapore, efficient. I was personally happy to see that the gym was well stocked with free weights and dumbbells so that I could get a few good workouts in. It’s very located in the middle of the marina district and is just a hop skip and a jump to all sorts of great things to see. I wholeheartedly recommend this hotel for personal or business travel.

title: True comfort right at CBD Singapore
desc: Amazing place to rest and relax after a long day of business meetings or hopping around the city. The hotel is a perfect spot to be in Singapore as it is right next to Suntec city where you can get everything you need and just a short walk to the famous Marina bayfront, Esplanade, or the one and only Merlion. With easy access to the mrt , you can also get around town very easily. Apart from all these, the hotel staff are very hospitable and attentive. The room is very spacious, fully equipped with all the needs, with super helpful stuff who take great care of your room while you are away and get back to a very well refreshing room as if you just check in everyday. So glad to be here! Thank you very much for making our stay the most pleasant one.

title: Holiday with my wife 2022
desc: Its a great hotel with very nice rooms & great breakfasts. Sadly we couldn't use the pool as we both got Covid & just kept in our room. Very expensive for drinks etc. The main foyer etc are beautiful.

title: 5 hour wait to check in
desc: My wife and I received Amex vouchers for a complimentary stay at the hotel. We utilised my wife's 2 months ago and left very impressed and pleased. Unfortunately, that also set our expectations for this stay. I requested for early check in the day before, and received a reply that it could not be guaranteed due to high occupancy, but we could register at the front desk on arrival for their assistance. Indeed, it turned out so. The manager said I will be contacted upon availability, meanwhile please wait. Thinking that it shouldn't be long, we sat in the lobby and waited. An hour passed without any call. I went up to the same manager to enquire. He replied that there were 14 people ahead of us waiting for rooms and we are in the queue. Meanwhile, just wait. A 2nd hour passed. I

title: 5* experience
