desc: A 5* experience. This was a beautiful hotel experience. From the communication with the hotel prior to arrival to check in all the way through to check out the experience was exceptional. Shout out to Peggy and Yousef for amazing customer service. The complimentary cookies in the room were absolutely delicious. Due to an issue with our flight we arrived a day later than expected and the Conrad altered our stay dates with no hesitation. As a Hilton honours member we also received a free upgrade to a room on a higher floor. Many ammenities were provided - complimentary water, toiletries (which smelt divine), slippers and a free teddy bear wearing a conrad Tshirt. Only a couple of things let the hotel down - the shower had some mould and was not as clean as it should have

title: Highly Recommend!
desc: This place was the bomb!!!. Had a great stay. Housekeeping was outstanding. The breakfast buffet was great and the variety changed daily. As a diamond member, the free afternoon tea and the evening social were on point. The hotel is across the street from the Suntec Convention center which is huge and has several eating places as well as shopping. The staff was friendly and greeted us on a daily basis. Highly recommend. The shower and bathtub are separate and the shower had 2 types of shower heads, one was a rain type, and the other was a normal shower head. The bathtub was deep and big and the hotel provides a yellow rubber duck, lol, and pink soaking crystals. We had a great stay.

title: Brief but enjoyable
desc: A brief but enjoyable stay at the Conrad. Location is excellent, next to Suntec and Millenia walk, and an easy stroll to the Marina area and Civic district. My 29th floor Executive Room offered great views over the River to the National Stadium, with tje Executive Lounge offering views of the civic district and Marina Bay. The room itself is spacious, well appointed and I appreciate the long sofa by the window, and plug sockets by the bed. The Conrad signature bear and duck are a nice touch. The pool is a good size, with bar service also and even little cabanas to enjoy. The buffet for breakfast is extensive, with options to satisfy everyone. If there's one fault to pick, it would be the lack of Hilton Diamond recognition here, though the complimentary upgrade was welcome.

title: Great Hotel with Access to Shopping Center
desc: Good and peaceful hotel and you can experience a comfortable stay. Near to Santec City. Easy access to Tube. Lots of Malls, Pubs, and Bars nearby. Decent staff and a much more peaceful stay here. Could be comparatively a little bit more expensive but I liked the options of food available.

title: Good location
desc: We were diamond elite members, not much recognition for an elite member. We felt like it was a Singapore thing and they held back on giving you benefits. Definitely different than many Conrad in other countries. No welcoming treats/fruits offered in the room after check in. Though, we were upgraded to the rooms with bay views. Rooms were clean. Seems like they were very protective about the lounge and claimed that it would be full We had to convince them if we could buy lounge access for our parent's room, but they recommended we should not since it's not worth it. And we understood why. Upon entering the executive lounge for afternoon tea, first there were not many people in there Plus it did not have much of any special food or decent pastries to offer except for the view and

title: Perfect for business travel.
desc: Location was great, easy access to the Suntec mall and a short drive to Marina Bay. Also not too far from the airport. This is a solid pick for a hotel around this around. Great choice if you are going to the convection center or are in town for business.

title: good business hotel
desc: I like Conrad in general. This is one , very solid option. Good service, slightly non personal. You never feel home. Everybody super professional, but nothing extra. Feels, like hotel need updating. Rooms are very good size. Not a big fan of new cosmetics ( shower gel, soaps ..) Breakfast was really, really good. Over all, nice stay. If you use this hotel strictly for business purposes is great If I will come to explore the city, I probably will choose different property.

title: Thank you for another great stay!
desc: It's always such a great pleasure to return to this wonderful hotel. Everything was perfect again during our stay! Thanks to Shar Mayn, Mark and the great Executive Lounge team for making our 3-night stay so enjoyable. We look forward to returning early 2023!!

title: A safe option in Singapore
desc: I was pleasantly surprised by my stay at the Conrad Singapore. Especially the rooms and bathrooms, which feel like have been refurbished recently are very nice. One downside was the lack of restaurant options and the quite early closing bar but overall a good option for Singapore. Would stay again.

title: A happy place
desc: Awesome staff and great food. Love the view from our room and the lounge (even on a wet day). Bed was so comfortable and the a/c worked well. Good pool area . Shower and bath both roomy. Convenient to the Suntec area for easy dining and drinks

title: Do not hesitate to chose and stay at Conrad Singapore
desc: Everything was perfect! Excellent location, the check-in at the reception was smooth and fast, all staff at the restaurant and the lounge were very attentive and polite, big variety of food, plus all anti-Covid19 measures and cleanliness at 10 of 10 points! Highly recommend!

title: Nice room with deco to commemorate anniversary
desc: It's my second stay at this centrally located hotel. Great experience as usual with all staff giving you smiles and professional assistance when needed. The room is clean and spacious; the bathroom is huge; the in-room entertainment channels are aplentiful.

title: Very Comfortable
desc: Like an old sofa that hugs you as you sit down this place really is super comfortable.. Clean and bright in a perfect location near to everything. A special mention must go to Lynndal in the executive lounge (who was amazing) , Danish by the pool and the bartender at the Lobby bar (whose name I forgot sorry)

title: Still one of the best hotels in Singapore
desc: First visit back to Singapore since the Pandemic and stayed where I normally stay - the Conrad Centennial. Rooms while probably approaching the need for renovation are still very well maintained and nice. The staff are amazing. The housekeepers greet you by your name, and they do little extras like shine your shoes without you requesting it. Bar and F&B team equally amazing…I wanted a simple Caesar salad as I caught up on work in the bar and while it wasn’t on the menu they brought me a gorgeous salad. The Conrad in Singapore is a shining example of what a luxury commercial district business hotel should be.

title: 2 Nights Stay for Family of six with wheelchair user
desc: I recently booked 2 Premium Deluxe Rooms for my family Staycation to take a break in Dec 2022. It was a family trip to give my family and my Dad a good relaxation break since he has just been discharged from the hospital not long ago. I booked their Premium Deluxe room with one indicated on their website as specially for wheelchair users (Accessible room). Breakfast was included too. I regretted giving my business to Conrad. The old good hotel with excellent service is gone. What is left is a hotel with robotic staff just performing what they are paid for and nothing more. By the way, I am a Hilton Honours member. Upon arrival in a cab, needless to say, I have my luggage for my family and the wheelchair. I was hoping that a doorman will be there to assist me. Sorry, it

title: Superb
desc: An exceptional property! Conrad is always my go-to where possible but sometimes can be quite expensive. When we stayed here, everything was perfect. From the rooms, to the lounge and the breakfast. It‘s well worth the extra $$ over the old Hilton location and now also Hilton Orchard. The rooms are well appointed, and the service was excellent, including outstanding attention to detail, great housekeeping and recognition of Hilton status. Remember to ask for the signature Conrad stuffed toy! Would alway return!

title: Very pleasant stay!
desc: Room is clean and well-kept! We celebrated my Mum’s birthday and the hotel had put in great effort to place some birthday cards on the bed for us. They were amazing! Property is conveniently located next to Promenade MRT station (easy to get to MBS, Gardens by the Bay); close to shopping malls (eg. Suntec City). It was a pleasant stay!

title: Amazing Hotel
desc: Great hotel with exceptional service. Conveniently located to Promenade MRT station and walking distance to Suntec for shopping and plenty of food options. Beds are great, very nice executive lounge, would stay here again.

title: Excellent value for money stay in the heart of Singapore CBD
desc: Good location and nice amenities. Buffet was excellent and staff were courteous. Good value for money. For where the hotel is located, there was minimal noise or disruption. This is credit to both the city of Singapore and to the way the Hotel is designed and managed.

title: Pleasant as always
desc: We stayed at this hotel five times already, and fortunately it still keeps the level of service that we appreciate it for. Comfortable bed, decent size of the room, good sleep, polite and efficient staff, no matter what area of work. Does not sound overly complicated, but good room with good service these days not so easy to find. We hope to return soon.

title: >Excellent stay at the Conrad in Singapore
desc: Stayed for 2 nights as part of my birthday celebration in this very well located hotel. All the staff were very helpful and accommodating. The room was large, nicely decorated and with a great view. The range at the breakfast buffet was outstanding and the executive lounge had a good range of snacks and drinks. Overall an excellent stay and would definitely return if visiting Singapore again. Well worth a visit.

title: Another amazing stay
desc: Another great stay at the Conrad... Beautiful room on 31st floor Bfast & Dinner at Oscars faultless Executive Lounge as good as our preCovid experiences Many staff to commend but 2 ladies stand out as execeptional & deserve special mention and credit... I hope the hotel recognize the value Penny & Alex add.. their customer service is the best we have experienced in any hotel club lounge and their customer contact/interaction is memorable and truly outstanding THANK YOU

title: Wonderful hotel in Singapore
desc: We stayed on the Executive Suite Level (31) and had amazing service! Beautiful fresh cooked breakfasts in the dining area, afternoon tea in abundance and then cocktails and a smorgasbord of offerings from 6pm. The gym was awesome. Staff were exceptional!

title: Extraordinary Service
desc: We arrived in Singapore after flying over 20 hours from Chicago ORD with layovers in LAX and HND; we were exhausted and tired. Upon arriving at the hotel, the staff was attentive and mindful, they immediately ushered us to our room and then to the lounge for hors d'oeuvres and cocktails. You could tell by their smiles that they were happy to assist us. Day by day the members of the staff on the 31st floor made sure we were comfortable and happy with our stay, they gave us suggestions for our intinerary, Shar Mayn from the front desk insisted we don't miss some of the highlights of the city and Penny from the lounge made sure our appetizers and drinks were to our satisfaction. We have been spoiled by the Hilton brands but the Conrad in Singapore wen't above and beyond. I highly

title: Wonderful 5 Star hotel!
desc: Our 2 nights stay at the Conrad Centennial Singapore met all of our expectations. This is our 4th visit to this hotel, and we are never disappointed. The hotel is adjacent to Suntec City Mall, many restaurants and MRT. Getting around is not a problem. The luxurious rooms are well kept with all the amenities expected in a 5 star hotel. Customer service is exceptional. Check in was painless. Min at the front desk was very welcoming and informative during the check in process. Whenever we saw her during our stay- she always acknowledged us and asked if we needed anything. The executive lounge has the typical breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktail/appetizer servings. Food is rather varied and plentiful. Kudos to all of the executive lounge staff especially Kai, Dylan,

title: Centennial Service!
desc: Good to be back after three years of absence! Perfect location, outstanding service, spacious rooms, excellent executive lounge, best Chinese restaurant, impressive buffet for all meals, and an extensive list of Gins and ingredient combinations! What else? You have it all!

title: Luxury hotel in a very convenient location
desc: I stayed here for one night as beginning of my holidays. The hotel is only one subway station to go to the waterfront mall, and only three stations to go to the national stadium where I go to the Air Supply concert. I have all my goals easily met whether it's go shopping or go eat some delicious food, or to enjoy a night out. This is my first international trip after the pandemic lockdown. Can't believe my eyes I finally got my life back when I saw all restaurants in the airport are open and life is as usual. Three years feel like a wink. I am happy with my diamond treatment. Everything is well organized. The staff in the executive lounge are friendly and courteous. I am also happily impressed in the breakfast restaurant Oscar. When I asked for black coffee, I also got one glass

title: Well-managed, spacious, friendly
desc: We are Diamond members who stayed during a Friday and Saturday night in room 2522. Usually we try to avoid weekends because of wedding crowds, but they handled the weddings without any problem. The room was quiet and more than large enough for us. We felt the view was magnificent--maybe not the most magnificent in the hotel because the Pan Pacific partially blocked the view, but it was magnificent enough for us. The view of the cricket grounds and of the bay was especially pretty in the morning, and we like the shops and restaurants in the Marina area. We tried the 2:30 executive lounge afternoon tea and the 6 pm cocktail hour. When we arrived at the lounge at 5:55 pm for the cocktail hour, most of the members were already seated, patiently awaiting The Opening of the

title: such a dream
desc: Conrad is perfect for business and leisure, the staff is so helpful and pleasant, comfortable and luxurious room, very quiet and relaxing swimming-pool Breakfast, lunch dinner are delicious indoor or outdoor, MRT is just 2 minutes walk, closed to shopping malls and exhibitions center like Suntec cuty, Marina bay sand a very convenient and memorable place to stay

title: A very good hotel with excellent customer service
desc: This is the first Hilton we have stayed at outside Australia and the USA for many years. It was spotlessly clean and efficient and the bed was very comfortable which is a big plus. I am delighted to report that this hotel appears to take sustainability issues seriously. For example, it was very good to see that the hotel has dispensed with small single use shampoo, conditioners, body wash and body lotion containers replaced with large refillable containers. Also the toilet paper and tissues are bamboo unbleached products in minimal packaging while plastic water bottles are a thing of the past replaced by recyclable water cartons. Bravo Conrad Centennial Singapore for these initiatives! However, what really distinguishes this hotel is the exceptional customer service which

title: Sunday wedding dinner
desc: We held a wedding dinner here at Conrad. The service is excellent. The staff are proactive in assisting us for our big day especially Christopher, our wedding coordinator. In term of food, the serving is generous and taste delicious, there is a lot unique varieties such as coconut lobster soup which our guest complimented. Our guest also enjoyed the reception mocktail too which is unique compare to other hotels. Definitely will come back and stay at this hotel again!

title: Home away from Home.
desc: This hotel is perfectly situated. Walking distance to many of the tourist attractions. Checkin is smooth and the rooms are incredible. Temperature perfect. Comfy beds and the best breakfast you can ever get. I stayed Dec. 5-8 and then again Dec. 17-20. The staff is friendly and very helpful. I am very picky and believe me I LOVE this place. I would be happy to come back anytime. I stayed on the 23rd and hade an amazing view.

title: Balanced and consistent at a high level
desc: We had a wonderful experience staying at the Conrad Singapore for our vacation. Everything we experienced in the hotel was at a high level, and there were no weak spots to be found anywhere I looked. The rooms looked new and fresh, very clean. The bathroom was excellent, beautiful marble, great Byredo products. Bathrobes and towels nice and soft. Beds were comfy, view was great. Housekeeping did a very nice job, despite the mess we usually created in the room with our stuff lying around everywhere. The level of service was excellent. Everyone was very polite and eager to please. Afternoon tea was great, the drinks and cocktails at the bar mixed and served to a high standard. Breakfast buffet had great options, dinner buffet was equally interesting with good quality food. Its

title: Howard’s Visit
desc: Stayed for three days before boarding our cruise ship. Paid for an upgrade to the executive level which gave you access to the executive lounge, well worth doing for the free drinks and food on offer.

title: Recent Stay
desc: My recent stay was a very pleasant experience given every staff member I interacted with went above and beyond to ensure I was well taken care of. Conrad sets an elite standard for customer satisfaction.

title: Satisfied and Comfortable Staycation
desc: Great Service, Good Foods and Comprehensive Facilities sum the satisfied and comfortable staycation. There is always something that one can do in and out of the hotel eg laze at the pool, workout in the gym, enjoy the meals in the lounge or restaurant. It's accessible to public transport, F & B outlets, shopping malls, museums. More so the attentive and great services by hotel staff as mentioned below. Front Desk : Minh and The Team; Nik, Ivy and Jia Yi Executive Lounge : Shamien and Team; Mark, Christina, Hafiz, Aris, Hakim, Jean and Alam. Gym : Khai, Dila, Akbar and Danish Housekeepihg : Minah Oscar Restaurant : Jennifer It would be ideal if the varieties of foods would be more whether at the Club Lounge or Oscar Restaurant. Indeed, it's refreshed, relaxed and rejuvenated

title: A consistent experience from start to finish
desc: Conrad Centennial is very good value for money. They have good location, right at the centre of Singapore CDB. You can cross the street to enter Suntec City, a massive shopping mall, which have a lot of interesting shopping and dining options. Guests who stay in the executive and above category are entitled to access the Executive Lounge, which comes with breakfast, afternoon tea, evening cocktails and canapes. And they offer a good variety to choose from which including fruits, cakes, scones, and a few savoury items. All staff are very friendly and helpful, from the front desk staff to the Executive Lounge staff. Our room was comfortable and with a wonderful view from the extra-long day bed cum sofa that runs along the windows. Little gifts like Lunar New Year decorated

title: An absolutely superb hotel, once again a brilliant stay with excellent service
desc: I last stayed here in 2019, then (due to COVID) missed out in 2021/2022 so was really looking forward to going back. The treatment of Diamond members is superb, with a lovely Executive lounge (great views, attentive staff, good food and drink selections throughout the day) and the buffet breakfast at Oscar's never fails to disappoint! Public transport connections are excellent, with many sights also in easy walking distance. All the staff are incredibly professional and welcoming - including the Exec Lounge staff recognising you by name. I have stayed multiple times over the past decade and will happily do so in the future, it is just an excellent (and well-run) hotel, with super staff.

title: Reunion get together
desc: We had a great time over the extensively well spread buffet dinner . Food was fresh and very nice in all sections. Service was way above what you would expect at buffets especially from Janet , Fernando and Mandy . Will surely be back for more and am sure will not be disappointed.

title: The best Hotel in Singapore.
desc: This is a hotel which takes care of you with a fantastic Concierge Service. I travel around the world and I would rate The Singapore Conrad Concierge Team as one of the best in the world. The hotel rooms are clean, and big, keeping in mind all requirements. Chinese Restaurant is amazing. The breakfast spread great. I have been coming every year for the last 15 years.

title: Grand Asian Landmark with all the Fine Hallmarks of a Great Hotel.
desc: True Hospitality in a Beautiful Hotel. I love everything about this hotel. The place is grand in scale, with a soaring Lobby, wide hallways and large rooms. The staff is finely trained and never miss an opportunity to acknowledge their guests, open doors, use names and engage in polite conversation. All the grand hotel touches are evident. Generosity in all offerings, most especially in the breakfast, tea service and cocktail hours in the Executive Lounge. In my opinion, excellent value in the additional cost. Location is very convenient, being away from the hustle of Orchard Road but close to, far enough away from Marina Bay. On MRT and bus routes, and with several malls and countless restaurant options at all price points within walking distance. One of my favourite hotels

title: A very pleasant stay
desc: 1 night stay and it was very pleasant. Check in and house keeping staff were all very helpful and friendly. Requests were met very promptly. Also the location was superb. Opp Suntec shopping mall and beside millinea walk.

title: Maintains the highest of standards
desc: My wife and I travelled extensively last year mainly to the west and the USA. The standards in many of the hotels we found to be below par following Covid and staffing shortages. We were therefore a little wary at the start of our far east trip to see if hotels in the region were suffering the same issues. We have to say that it's definitely not the case with the Conrad. This is the 4th time we've stayed here and the levels of service are as good as they ever were. Friendly, helpful staff, a great executive lounge and a high level of customer service. For us, the hotel seems to have a very calming effect, we felt relaxed within minutes of arriving. Can't wait to return.

title: Fantastic Hotel
desc: This was our 5th stay at the Conrad. It is in a great location only a few minutes to the Promenade MRT station; from here we accessed all tourist stops. We accessed the executive lounge for breakfast, and the occasional afternoon tea. Staff are lovely and very helpful.

title: Personalised luxury in a great location.
desc: We enjoyed Singapore’s NYE celebrations and fireworks while staying at the Conrad Centennial recently. What a luxurious experience it was! From the front desk staff to the Executive Lounge staff, every individual went out of their way to make us feel welcome and personalise our visit. Our room was comfortable and luxurious, and as requested, we were given a room on level 30 with a wonderful view of the fireworks. Little gifts like NYE decorated macaroons and Conrad rubber ducks and teddy bears appeared magically almost every day after the wonderful housekeeping team had been in. It wasn’t an inexpensive stay as one would expect on NYE in Singapore, but it was worth every cent!

title: Top Notch in Every Way
desc: Excellent service by knowledgeable staff. Large rooms. Fast elevators. Outstanding breakfast buffet, even includes gelato! Room included a 2 L bottle of distilled water for my CPAP machine, although price at $17 was a surprise.

title: One of the best Hotels in Singapore
desc: I stayed in the hotel a few times and on this trip, I saw an improvement on services at concierge and executive lounge. The property is located in a very good location with many restuarants and shopping malls nearby. Keep it up !!

title: Good Location, Good Stay
desc: Not our first time in Singapore and I've been wrangling a bit with the rating, just because we found the hotel very good with attentive service, nice big room (on the 25th floor) with good views and located near other restaurants and the large shopping complex of Suntec Convention Centre. It's walking distance to Marina Bay Sands and the Gardens By The Bay, as well as Raffles Hotel and The Singapore Eye. It all just feels like a concrete jungle of tower blocks and intimidatingly wide roads. As a pedestrian it's not that much fun to traverse. We took a lot of taxis. The hotel itself is one of those tower blocks and it's trying very hard to be high end. Our room had a big marble bathroom with shower and bath, along with a large comfy bed and space to sit and look out the floor to

title: The Staff Are The Best!
desc: Lovely hotel, excellent location, wonderful restaurants. One minute walk from the nearest MRT station. Across the street and down the block from several shopping centers with good food. The staff were helpful, caring and incredibly knowledgeable. We will stay there again whenever we come to Singapore.

title: Very Nice Property and Location!
desc: Stayed at the Conrad for 2 nights. All the staff were very professional and courteous. I was in an executive king room and it was excellent. Very spacious with a nice bathroom also. Everything you need in the room. Had the executive lounge privilege. The sheet they give you at check in says you have to make a reservation for both high tea and happy hour. I did that the first day I was there but it does not seem to matter as the lounge is a free-for-all and busy. Recommend to show up early for both high tea and happy hour and ignore the sheet info. The location is excellent with Suntec and the Promenade MRT stop across the street. You can get most anywhere with the MRT and walking. Room recommendation - since Hilton allows you to choose your room on the app for check-in - if

title: Wow! -- Yes!. Conrad Hilton would be proud. : )
desc: Exceptional staff and service standard across the board. Conrad Centennial Singapore knocks it out of the park. It creates that moment where everything, in everyway, is at that really rare true international 5 star level... Go to the bar for a drink - amazing waitstaff deliver drinks made with real knowledge of classical and modern trends.. Reception, Concierge - all really make sure all the boxes are ticked in terms of taxis, check-out etc... In a really friendly and welcoming way.. I loved how helpful yet friendly they were.. Order room service, and you get a delightful old world hotel style service of wine tasting if desired, and table service dining waiter presentation. Even the classic burger and fries is really cooked to perfection and elevated... HH Diamond is

title: Excellent Service
desc: I stayed at the Conrad Centennial Singapore for 2 nights in February 2023. I arrived around 8 AM, and I was thrilled that a room was already available, and I had been upgraded to the executive floor as a Diamond member. The service was amazing, possible the best I have ever experienced at a hotel. Every time I walked towards a door, it was held open. I was escorted to my room. My luggage was escorted from the lifts and lifted into the taxi. The taxi was booked. The executive lounge was massive and had great views and an exhaustive variety of food/beverage options at different times. Although the breakfast in the executive lounge was amazing, the buffet breakfast downstairs is even better. I would recommend it for more buffet options. The room - very luxurious, spacious, great

title: Amazing service from FOH and BOH staffs
desc: Stayed 4 days 3 nights at night hotel, had a smooth check in was recognize by my membership. Room service staff Wilson was very courteous and well mannered introduced himself and anticipated my needs by giving extra set of cutleries as my room was occupied with 3 person. Breakfast variety was huge and delicious, loved the curry noodle from and the local selections. Breakfast supervisor Jennifer was attentive and friendly , she always has the bubbly face when serving the guest. Last but not least Wei Juan from housekeeping is very nice and attention to detail, whenever I leave my room I have a way of putting my things , she noticed it on the second day and repeats it for my next few day with fresh amenities, towels. Puts them neatly and not all wrinkle bed sheet.

title: Comfy experiences at Conrad Singapore
desc: We stay for five nights at Conrad Centennial Singapore from 9 March. The views from the hotel room's large class panels are impressive. The hotel tower has 360 degree view of Singapore. The hotel is at a classy area with the 'Suntec City' Mall, Marina Square shopping mall and others. The services, especially at the executive lounge, are superb. The room service of cleaning the room, however, is very late and causing disruption to our resting time in late afternoon.

title: Another Perfect Stay at Conrad Centennial - thank you!!
desc: Feels like home every time we return to this exceptional hotel. The service level is exemplary in every way from the minute we arrive to the the sad moment we have to leave. The warmth from all the staff always feels genuine and we feel truly valued as repeat HH Diamond guests. Thanks to all the wonderful teams for taking care of us. We can't wait to return soon! Kevin and Richard

title: Nice Hotel
desc: Stayed here on business over 2 months on 2 different occasions from Dec 2022 to April 2023. The breakfast buffet is excellent, room staff is attentive, hotel is very clean and the executive lounge is a nice touch. Also had a minor billing issue professionally straightened out by front office manage rIvy Ng. I do business here in Singapore for 2-3 months every year and the Conrad Centenial is my go-to property.

title: Singaporean Elegance
desc: A one night stay at the end of a business trip to Singapore in March 2023. Personal indulgence after 12 nights at the Paradox hotel at Clark’s Quay. Total Singaporean luxury, elegance and extraordinary customer service - so glad that I returned! perfection, from the minute you walk into the magnificent hotel lobby, the attention to detail is incredible. Massive appreciation to all the staff in the Executive Lounge - I have never been treated so well, every staff member called me by my name - it’s the very small details that made this very short stay so special. Very small point, the pool is slightly underwhelming (small) - but hotel is in the centre of the city. However, staff and facilities are first class - loved the comfortable sunbeds, soft towels, iced drinking water &

title: Great hotel, great location
desc: We had a terrific stay at Conrad centennial Singapore. we were debating between the Marina Bay Area and Orchard area and I an so glad we chose the Marina Bay Area and this hotel. It was very centrally located to key attractions and the service and hotel were excellent. Friendly and attentive staff, great service, and wonderful breakfast. I highly recommend it.

title: Room with a Great View
desc: As Diamond, we were upgraded to an executive room on the top (31st) floor. Fantastic view of the city both from our room and the lounge ... Room perfectly appointed, with lots of seating and storage (aften not the case!), large bathroom with bath and shower, and with double hand-basins. Superb breakfast (good mix of European and Asian food), and seemingly unlimited goodies in the lounge, afternoon and evening. (OK, that's the Asian way, but this was particularly good). Staff super eager to help: and gave us a late checkout to 6 PM as we had an evening flight (in the US, pay half the daily rate for that!). Hotel is well located, walking distance to Marina Bay, Boat Quay, even Chinatown, and a handy metro a few meters away for longer trips. And a short run to a great variety

title: Absolutely fantastic! Bravo!
desc: Very impressed with our stay here. From arrival to departure we were treated so well. Checkin was super fast, we stayed on the top floor and enjoyed the executive lounge facilities. Everyone here is super friendly and professional. The lounge staff were simply charming, great breakfast and evening drinks. Every interaction with the staff here was so lovely. The gym was perfect and had everything we needed. The rooms were perfect for what we needed, super comfortable and the beds heavenly. A great location, great service, professional staff, great decor and facilities. Really faultless! Thank you for making us so welcome and valued. We look forward to returning, John & Simon (3126) 11-13March

title: Good for business and pleasure
desc: Very nice hotel near Suntec Center. Great buffet breakfast, good meeting space, friendly staff. Spacious rooms with Nespresso machines and irons. Bathroom lighting not the best, but nice. Nice pool area. Easy walk to bay, Gardens by the Bay, Marina Sands, Raffles, etc.

title: Consistent Care at the Conrad Centennial!
desc: I am blessed to be able to choose to travel to Singapore for work on a frequent basis from the US. And my go-to home there is the Conrad Centennial. For a large hotel, there is a warm intimacy that exudes from the team members while the rooms and suites, (I have tried them all!), offer a pleasant, relaxing and very subdued environment to work, relax or just ponder the latest book, movie or view out the window. The decor is under-stated with a quiet elegance and tasteful ambience. The executive club lounge on 31 is a welcoming space made more incredible by the dedicated team of hospitality professionals led by Jane, the Guest Experience Assistant Manager. She and the team engage with a friendly curiosity that makes you want to come back time and time again, not just for all of

title: Amazing
desc: Amazing and luxurious place with wonderful views towards the city business center. Location is perfect near all the attractions and landmarks of the city. Stuff is extremely helpful and very nice. Breakfast was rich with variety tastes suitable for international guests as well as Asian for sure

title: Helpful staff, nice room, yummy breakfast
desc: Our family come here for Easter holiday vacation. We booked 2 rooms and staff has arranged connecting rooms for us. The rooms are nice and neat, we had good rest here. Our kids love the signature Conrad bathing ducky and teddy bear. The welcome cookies are also tasty. The hotel offers wide variety of food in buffet breakfast. The chef at egg station made us great eggs everyday. We’re surprised by the Easter dessert in room and the cookies distributed to kids during breakfast time. All staff here are helpful and friendly, we’re thankful for all of their kind assistances. 5 days trip in S’pore is too short, it’s pity that we’re leaving tomorrow. We’ll miss this lovely hotel and S’pore.

title: Nice hotel. Convenient location. Excellent service.
desc: April 2023 This is an excellent hotel. I would rate 4.5 stars if I could. The service was excellent. Everyone at the hotel was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast buffet is marvelous. I loved that there was lots of local food to try out at breakfast. This location is very convenient. The mall is a 3 minute walk with lots of shops and restaurants. The MRT is also very close - about 5 min walk. There are also bus stops located very close to the hotel. I would take off 0.5 stars because our room seemed a little dated. The wall had some cracks in it and the shade seemed a little stained. The room itself was a good size and comfortable for the two of us. If you need the business centre, the computer seemed quite old and was very slow to start up.

title: Surprised and delighted service
desc: When you I step in the hotel, you can feel the Conrad service. During the stay, I really enjoy the service from concierge, front desk, lounge, housekeeping and customer service. It is really enriching my stay and show me how Singapore good service. The staff are remember my name and also greetings with warm welcome. That’s make me feel lien home. I am big fan of Conrad but stay many Conrad hotel before. I can tell Conrad is one of my favorite hotel. I will definitely choose here while stay in Singapore. The location is great close the MRT station with downtown and circle lane Near Mall like Suntech city and there are bar around the neighborhood. The room design are very nice with wooden furniture. Also have Dyson hairdryer which good use. Like the environmental friendly boxes

title: Glad and Hope to back again.
desc: The hotel staff made it again to make my staycation a comfortable and satisfied experiences and I hope to be back again. Also one is spoiled for choices to do anything in and out of the hotel; laze around the swimming pool, workout in the gym, a quiet and enjoying moments for meals in the club lounge. Outside the hotel, there are shopping malls, F & B outlets, nearby museums, public transport which are easily accessible. And the list goes on. Specially applaud the following staff who made my staycation most memorable. They are Front Office : Minh, Jia Yi and Yi Xuan Reservations : Ai Leng Club Lounge : Mark, Jane, Joyce, Jia Sheng, Ariannee, Brendan, Julie ,Jordan, Alam, Linda, Gym : Dila and Danish Housekeeper : Zhou Wei Hope to be back again.

title: Didn't start well but eventually won me over.
desc: My wife and I had initially issues with the USB plug was working, no ice machine and noise from kids running down the hall and slamming the door. Eventually it gotten better as our USB plug was fixed and had a bucket of ice delivered every day. As for the kids noise, well I guess there's only so such I can asked for. This hotel seems to cater to mainly two types of clients, business and families with children. Sometimes I don't know if I'm staying at a Hilton or Disney hotel. In the end, I would stay again due to the location and service from the staff.

title: Five Star Service from Exceptional Professionals
desc: What an incredible experience. From the second we arrived until the moment we left, we received nothing but 5-star service from everyone working in this hotel. I cannot recommend this hotel enough. Absolute perfection for my five days in Singapore. Thank you to all of you for such a wonderful stay.

title: Wonderful experience in Singapore
desc: We arrived at the hotel at 6:30am after a 19 hour flight and were warmly greeted by Daniel at the front desk. We were surprised and thrilled to find that our room was available. We were celebrating our 61st wedding anniversary and found our room decorated with flowers for the occasion. The room, on the 31st floor had a spectacular view. The executive lounge was down the hall . We had breakfast and later cocktails. The staff was outstanding at the hotel, always smiling and anxious to make you feel special. The concierge, Mohammad , went out of his way to help us on several occasions. We would definitely recommend this hotel for its friendly staff, beautiful rooms and excellent location in Singapore

title: Revisit to the Conrad.
desc: I stayed at the Conrad more than 2 years ago and went there again recently. Now more environmentally conscious with water in cartons and not plastic bottles and toilet roll made from recycled materials. Nice modern decor, clean and smelt good. Conveniently located close go the airport and Marina Bays Sands.

title: Great Hotel!!!
desc: The staff are very nice... room is very clean. We enjoyed our stay for 3 nights. The Breakfast Buffet is great!!! Hats off to the Front Desk Staff.. very accommodating. Looking forward for another stay next year!!!

title: Could not have been better
desc: We really loved this hotel. As a Diamond member, I received an upgrade to a spacious suite that was very comfortable and beautifully decorated. The breakfast buffet was superb, with a large range of choices. The pool deck was lovely, never had a problem getting a chair and there was shade available. Service, including housekeeping was excellent. Friendly and efficient. It was very easy to arrange for taxis which is helpful in the Singapore heat.

title: Fantastic hotel.
desc: Expensive but a stunning hotel and wonderful room. Everything was perfect and 110% of what I'd expect from a Hilton. Centrally located, comfortable mattress good breakfast, good wifi, clean rooms. The bathtub was huge and water always hot.

title: Serious Security Breach at the Conrad Centennial Singapore
desc: My recent stay at the Conrad Centennial Singapore was a mixed experience. On one hand, the hotel is located in a prime location with easy access to shopping and dining options. Additionally, the rooms are spacious and well-appointed, with all the amenities one could ask for. Most of the staff members were friendly and helpful. However, my stay was marred by a serious security breach. During my stay, uninvited guests were able to locate my room and gain access to my floor without a keycard for the lift. This is a serious breach of security and privacy, and it is concerning that the hotel staff may have been involved in this incident. I hope that the hotel takes immediate action to investigate this incident and takes steps to prevent similar incidents from occurring in the

title: Best Bellman
desc: Today is Wednesday 24th may 2023 , i’m not a hotel guest but i was waiting for taxi at hotel’s lobby! Thanks to a young bellman at 10pm 24th May 2023 i did not know his name , thanks to his kindness and good service to help us get a taxi ! You are really professional and nice person ! Best regards to Conrad , you had a great staff with you !

title: Exceptional stay and experience
desc: My recent stay at Conrad Centennial was nothing short of amazing. I arrived at 4pm on Saturday and was warmly attended to by Chiharu at the front desk. She made the check-in process smooth, and also swiftly arranged for my additional requests to be fulfilled. I was very pleased with my room on the 26th floor, as the scenic city view was spectacular and the state of the room, spotless. I went for my Sundown 42km Marathon that night, and was back the next morning where the concierge and staff warmly checked-in on me and enquired about my run. Their warmth and concern made me feel at home, especially when the staff went the extra mile to make my evening memorable. I slept in the afternoon after having a relieving massage at the Conrad Spa, and went out in the evening to the

title: Is it good to choose Conrad?
desc: I arrived at 3pm and the check in is smooth. There’s no long queue. The concierge will try their best to help handling your luggage. The loddy is grand and spacious. I was arranged to 28/F. The view is city view not the marina bay view which I don’t think it’s necessary as I will visit there. It’s about 15-20 walks to garden by the bay. However, I chose to take MRT as the weather is hot in Singapore. MRT is just next to the hotel (yellow line). The room is spacious and good enough to open my 2 luggages without difficulties. There are Conrad’s signature teddy bear on the bed and rubber duck in bath room waiting for you. If you stay here with kids, I guess they will be happy. There are shopping centres and a lot of different restaurants nearby, so you don’t worry

title: Great location , horrible food - food poisoning alert
desc: So we are staying at conrad me my husband and toddler . Since the time we reached , we have eaten hotel food . My toddler who just ate dosa and pancake some dal rice is suffering from food poisoning . I escalated matter to CEO after which they’ve tried to provide eus support , called a doctor earlier they said we need to pay our expense , later the GM instructed them the bill will be on the house , inspite of which all kept asking us for bill the hotel didn’t inform the doctor that bill will be on them but later sorted out . There is no coordination between the departments , the chef keeps telling me they don’t have kitchen styled for Indian food and he has to cancel his leave and come hotel because of us . Even after so much issue the chef provided raw dal . The dosa batter

title: Traditional hospitality at your service
desc: Even in Asia, a rare hotel where the tradition of hospitality still prevails. Convenient location close to many attractions including Marina Bay attractions, Financial District and Chinatown. Easy access from/to Changi Airport. Well-run hotel where experience and professionalism are very apparent. Comfortable rooms with attention to detail. Very attentive staff, particularly at the Executive Lounge. Great place to stay in this part of Singapore.

title: Excellent Location, Lounge, & Breakfast
desc: Stayed for 5 nights and six days in June with my mother. We very much enjoyed our visit. The Suntec center is a great location, especially if using the hop-on hop-off bus. As a Diamond member we had access to the lounge which has excellent views and a great staff! The ambassadors in the lobby were also very friendly and helpful with directions or lending us an umbrella when needed! The breakfast in the first floor restaurant was very good with A LOT of choices! My mother got to try mangosteen for the first time! Do go early as there can be a long line/wait as the morning progresses! The room was nice but could have been a little bit bigger.

title: A recommended hotel downtown
desc: A stay for an early fly next day. The hotel is recommended. Stayed with the family and the room was enough for 3 adults. An extra bed was set later but comfortable enough for the night sleep. The bathroom is spacious , the room carpet is in good conditions with amenities and drinks.There are many restaurant and caffes options around. A nice place if you want to refresh yourself and have moments of peace.

title: Great Location and Views, but Disappointing Service at Conrad Singapore
desc: Hotel location is excellent, and as a Diamond card member, I was upgraded to a room with a view of Marina Bay, which was very lucky as I got to see the National Day rehearsal. The hotel staff were polite and friendly, and the turn-down service in the room even provided ice without request. However, apart from these positive aspects, my overall impression is that this Conrad hotel is currently undergoing cost-cutting measures, and the service has significantly declined. They are very stingy in various aspects. This is the worst Conrad hotel I have ever stayed in. Firstly, the lounge is very small, and the food and beverage options during afternoon tea and happy hour are extremely limited and of poor quality. Similarly, the breakfast is also subpar. I stayed at The Westin hotel

title: Recommend it
desc: Traveled as a young family of four. Fantastic staff who were always helpful. Comfortable and good sized room. Buffet breakfast was THE hit for all of us. Close proximity to the main attractions. Countless shopping and food options. We couldn’t be happier.

title: Conrad lives up to its brand image 100%
desc: A true 5 star hotel experience. The people at the reception are so kind and professional. Before we arrived at the hotel i had placed a few requests to the hotel through email and they responded very quickly. Everything I had mentioned in the email was fulfilled which was very nice thing as this does not happen at many hotels. Our housekeeper Dhima cleans the rooms everyday without fail and the way she cleans and arranges everything in the room really impressed us all. She went the extra mile to arrange everything neatly which was placed in the rooms. We were on the 23rd floor and Dhima was in charge of our floor. A special mention and appreciation to Dhima as she was so kind and professional. I’ve never seen such a wonderful housekeeper in my entire hotel travel history till

title: Disappointing stay
desc: While staff were generally friendly and helpful, especially concierge, I requested a late check out because my flight was not until the evening. Generally Diamond members can get a late check out until 4 pm because of the amount of traveling we do. I was told 2 pm. Fine, I thought, I’d wait in the lounge. This request was denied “when you check out at 2 pm you need to leave the hotel, you can’t stay in the lounge.” Because I had luggage and my airline flight’s check in counter doesn’t open until 3 hours before departure, I sat in the Changi ticketing hall for hours. Beautiful facilities, but at the end of the day, customer service matters most of all, and here it was deficient. I simply needed a place to work. I wasn’t looking for free food and drink, which was how I was

title: I love EVERYTHING about Conrad
desc: The height of professionalism in the industry. The lounge is amazing, and worth paying for if you don't have status benefit. Staff including Jane, Rose and Mark are gems. Breakfast at Oscars is amazing and , again, worth paying for if you don't get in your rate.

title: Great Stay at Conrad
desc: We had a great SG vacation at Conrad Centennial. The beds are so comfy, we always had a restful sleep after our daily activities. The staff are very courteous & accomodating. Oscar’s sumptuous breakfast buffet is a must☺️

title: Thank you for the wonderful experience.
desc: My wife and I had our wedding anniversary stay last Sat and we told ourselves we MUST write in to express our thanks for the wonderful service and experience the team at Conrad Centennial provided. From the moment we stepped into the lobby, we were warmly greeted by the bellman (apologies we didn’t get his name) & he walked us to the front desk. He made small talk with us and introduced the hotel’s facilities while we were waiting for our turn to check-in. The check-in was the part that really wowed us and we have Peggy to thank for that. She was professional, patient & meticulous during the entire process. My wife & I travels quite frequently & have had staycations in a number of hotels in SG before but we have not experienced such great service like the one Peggy provided.

title: Great hotel - Super location
desc: Lovely hotel in a great location. The service was impeccable and responsive. The hotel staff was always helpful. Dining at any hotel is expensive and this was the case here. However, the dinner buffet was exceptional - and definitely worth the price. The fitness center is a bit small and tucked away - hard to find. I had a very quiet room which I really appreciated. The room staff was excellent - really professional, thorough and helpful. I would stay here again.

title: Staycation done right
desc: I wrote to the hotel to communicate my requests and Raine was happy to assist. When I arrived for check-in, the front desk Associate, Chiharu attended to me with a genuine smile. I was given a nice room #1410 looking out to the bay area and small touches like providing cookies and chocolates are on point. Pity the teddy bear is no longer available. Guests can also use the Hilton Honors app to schedule housekeeping or chat with Guest Services (thanks to Jane Goh) for sending me more cookies).

title: A marvellous Business Hotel
desc: We had stayed at the Conrad numerous times before Covid, but tried some other hotels over the last 18 months in Singapore. We simply wanted to compare some different chains. We found that we missed the Conrad and was glad to return. We love the executive club on the 31st floor. The staff was very kind, helpful and pleasant. We also ate at the lobby lounge and the beautiful Chinese restaurant (2 times) and found the food excellent and the service outstanding. Wonderful stay at a terrific hotel in a great location. Thank you very much!

title: Best of the Best
desc: Had been to SG for multiple times and had previously stayed in Ritz Carlton and Mandarin Oriental, all I can say is Conrad simply stood out as “Best of the Best”. Thanks to all staff who made every single person walking into the hotel feel welcomed. Great job Conrad team, will definitely be back!

title: Good Location
desc: The location of the hotel was good. It was close to the Marina Bay Merlion Status and there were serval large malls right next to the hotel. Lots of restaurants and bars around the hotel as well. The Hotel lobby was very inviting; however, the reception area was locating at the back of the hotel with minimal décor. Upon arrival, we were welcome by the lobby ambassadors. The entire team of the lobby ambassadors were courteous and engaging all through. A special shout out was Khai, he was outstanding, he set a high bar for the example of exceptional customer service. Our room was clean and big overlook the bay on the 26th floor with an absolutely spectacular view. Bed was comfy and bathroom was super clean. The breakfast buffet has adequate choices. The Executive Lounge has a very

title: My booking with a confirmation number 3879522636 was unjustly canceled
desc: My booking was canceled twice by this hotel for no reasons. They ask me two times to update my credit cards even though it is the right card used for all my booking. I can see no reason but to give the rooms to higher bidders as people are booking with them now and they are getting higher demands. Initially, they declined my request for extra bed by saying they are all out. Now they cancel.. The reputation of a 5 star can’t be taken for granted. You should treat your customers with dignity, honesty and mutual respect.. very bad.. This is a bad hotel with terrible management.. I rate this hotel as a zero-star hotel. Glad, I didn’t ruin my holiday staying with them.. Period.. I really regret evert booked with this one.. I used their other hotels in Conrad Dalian and Conrad Saudi

title: A wonderful Hotel with great costumer service !
desc: This hotel is not only a visual experience, it is also great in terms of customer service . Already at check-in we were greeted by the employee Mrs Chai especially friendly.She made a lot of effort to explain everything to us exactly. A big praise! The rooms are very clean and nicely decorated, we will surely come back soon!

title: Singapore Bliss
desc: The service at Conrad was amazing… starting before the trip to coordinate our rooms, so they were connecting, celebrating our celebrations in our room, and offering an amazing breakfast buffet at Oscars. Excellent location as well Top Notch ?

title: have to call for turn down service
desc: we have to call always for turn down service & ice, rooms with kids are messy but house keep never clean up to put things in order, all over the floors, couch everything was as is we kids leave, don't feel like housekeeping is done well, person who deliver ice don't want to keep in the place rather want us to collect from her

title: Excellent
desc: I specifically selected this Hilton chain at Marina Bay for a reason, its location. Very conveniently located to all access of the island. The hotel staff was amazing! very helpful and professional, always smiling! My room was spacious since I had the Centennial Twin Suite. The Executive Lounge located on 31st floor was a plus! Serving breakfast, Afternoon Tea and Open bar till 8pm. View was amazing but the only draw back, you can't see Marina Bay Sands cause it's blocked by another hotel. You can choose to have your breakfast at the Executive lounge or at the restaurant (Oscars) Obviously the restaurant has more selection, its more then a breakfast its like having brunch! The cleanliness of the hotel is top notch! Very impressive! Overall, I highly recommend this

title: I enjoyed my stay
desc: Excellent Conrad hotel at the heart of Singapore. Staff is extremely nice. The rooms are well appointed. The bathroom is wonderful. Service is reliable. I used the gym which was extremely well equipped. I would love to return there. As HHonors Gold I was upgraded to a premium room on higher floors. Very nice view.

title: Quiet luxury
desc: Understated, quiet luxury. Walking in the ambience was relaxed and quiet. Our room was huge, perfect for my husband who had to work from the room for part of the time we were there. Our view from the 22 floor was fantastic, a large window with electronic sheer and drape curtains that you could easily adjust as need be. Bed was comfy, bathroom very spacious with a large bath. The bathroom products that were provided were top quality too. Breakfast buffet was a great variety but could get busy - ask for an outside table and you will get seated quicker in busy times. Location is very handy, close to MRT and shops. Lots of bars and a few restaurants close by - expect to see lots of luxury cars parked outside!

title: Welcome return
desc: Outstanding return after 3 years away from Singapore due to the global outbreak of paranoid hypochondria. This hotel has only gotten better, from a very high base. Service was 11/10 throughout - arrival, reception, Exec Lounge, Oscar's, housekeeping - you name it. Couldn't fault a thing. Cannot recommend highly enough, my favourite hotel in Singapore and one of my top 5 globally.

title: A very good stay but a few issues
desc: I didn’t mind this hotel, but it was a little impersonal It has a good location very close to Promenade station and a shopping centre which was handy. I have gold Hilton status and platinum Amex and that was recognised at check in with a room upgrade and hotel credit. The spa massage I had was excellent. Breakfast selection was ok - not as good as nearby resorts - and I missed having a marina view and had a view of other hotels only. I requested a quiet room and this initially wasn’t honoured, I was moved to a quiet room but the next day a large family was booked in the rooms next to and across from me so spent a lot of time chatting outside my room. I didn’t let reception know but they didn’t respond on that The room itself was nice and had everything I needed, it

title: The best of the best!!
desc: Staying so many Conrad and every Conrad is significant and never let me down. It has been a while since the pandemic and visited for staying again. Amazing stay, all the staff from the check-in, the dining room, the lounge, to the lounge, all the service is absolutely fantastic. I forgot the young man's name to help me check in, and he shared his experience from the house keeping service to the check in service, and I can see his enthusiasm and try his best to help and provide the info he can. In the lounge, I requested for the late check out due to the meetings, due to the summer vacation my room couldn't be extended for the late check out. Joyce tried her best to coordinate with the duty manager and help me to complete the "mission impossible." I truly see Joyce and the

title: An amazing stay!
desc: Absolutely phenomenal experience. Everything was perfect. The service- exceptional. Every single person I came across greeted me. Those in higher positions spoke with me, how was your day? Offered tips to see different things. Cleaning staff would stop what they are doing and greet me. I loved my welcome basket. We got an array of chocolates and nibbles, along with drinks and a lovely personal welcome card. The room- I was fortunate enough to be upgraded to a corner suite. I got a complete lounge and separate bedroom. It was incredibly spacious and the views were incredible. The bed was extremely comfortable and the amenities were wonderful. I even had a Dyson hair dryer in the room! I loved how the deep bathtub can with a rubber ducky and bath salts. The breakfast was great

title: Consistently Wonderful
desc: Fifth, stay in this five-star hotel and it didn't disappointment. Even though the Conrad was full due to the Singapore F1 Grand Priz with many drivers and teams choosing it, there was no feeling of being busy. The hotel staff are always attentive, friendly and obliging. The room on 31st floor was comfortable, spacious and well appointed with good views. Large bathroom, two basins, two person shower with raindrop shower head and all the necessaries provided. Consistent turn down service. Access to Executive Lounge which is comfortable, great views, great food, great breakfast chef..always got it right and wonderful lounge staff. This is the place to stay in Singapore..handy to everything and hard to leave.

title: 5-star hotel, really?
desc: I was at your bar on 7 Oct 23 for a late night snack, and there was an event going on at the second floor. The noise insulation was so bad that it was hard to have a conversation, not to mention that the ambience is unbecoming of a 5 star hotel. We ordered satay which came in a disposal cardboard tray -- this made us feel that we are in a hawker center with a nearby 7-month getai, except that the price is much higher. And your waiter cleared our remaining satay WITHOUT asking for our approval. And by the way, please remind your workers to conduct themselves properly in the toilet (next to Oscar's). What happened to you, Conrad? You were not like that pre-covid.
